name: Stuck Jar Lid
description: Player encounters a stubborn jar that needs opening at a friend's dinner party.

scene:
<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- ESTABLISHING SHOT - DINNER PARTY -->

    <radialGradient id="tablecloth" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#f5e1c9;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#e6c9a8;stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="warmGlow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="10" result="blur" />
      <feColorMatrix in="blur" type="matrix" values="1 0 0 0 0.95  0 1 0 0 0.8  0 0 1 0 0.5  0 0 0 1 0" result="glow" />
      <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="glow" mode="normal" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="softShadow" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />

        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="#f8f4e9" />
  
  <!-- Walls -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="300" fill="#e8d8c3" />

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- INSERT SHOT - THE JAR CLOSE-UP -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="jarGlass" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#ffffff;stop-opacity:0.9" />
      <stop offset="25%" style="stop-color:#d9f9f9;stop-opacity:0.8" />
      <stop offset="50%" style="stop-color:#a8e6e6;stop-opacity:0.7" />
      <stop offset="75%" style="stop-color:#d9f9f9;stop-opacity:0.8" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#ffffff;stop-opacity:0.9" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="jarContents" cx="50%" cy="40%" r="60%" fx="40%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#ff6b4a;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="70%" style="stop-color:#d93a22;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#a82a18;stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="glassHighlight" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="5" result="blur" />
      <feSpecularLighting in="blur" specularExponent="20" lighting-color="#ffffff" result="specular">
        <fePointLight x="250" y="100" z="200" />
      </feSpecularLighting>
      <feComposite in="specular" in2="SourceAlpha" operator="in" result="specular" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="specular" operator="arithmetic" k1="0" k2="1" k3="1" k4="0" result="highlight" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="tableTexture" x="0%" y="0%" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise" />
      <feColorMatrix in="noise" type="matrix" values="0 0 0 0 0.8 0 0 0 0 0.7 0 0 0 0 0.6 0 0 0 0.1 0" result="colorNoise" />
      <feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="colorNoise" mode="multiply" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background table surface -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="#e6d9c9" filter="url(#tableTexture)" />
  
  <!-- Dramatic spotlight effect -->
  <radialGradient id="spotlight">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="0.7" />
    <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f9e9d9" stop-opacity="0.3" />
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#e6d9c9" stop-opacity="0" />
  </radialGradient>
  <circle cx="225" cy="400" r="200" fill="url(#spotlight)" />
  
  <!-- Jar base -->
  <path d="M150,500 Q150,550 225,550 Q300,550 300,500 L300,300 Q300,250 225,250 Q150,250 150,300 Z" fill="url(#jarGlass)" filter="url(#glassHighlight)" />
  
  <!-- Jar contents -->
  <path d="M160,490 Q160,540 225,540 Q290,540 290,490 L290,310 Q290,270 225,270 Q160,270 160,310 Z" fill="url(#jarContents)" />
  
  <!-- Jar threads -->
  <path d="M160,300 Q160,280 225,280 Q290,280 290,300" fill="none" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="4" />
  <path d="M160,290 Q160,270 225,270 Q290,270 290,290" fill="none" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="4" />
  
  <!-- Jar lid -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="250" rx="75" ry="25" fill="#a8a8a8" />
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="240" rx="65" ry="20" fill="#c0c0c0" />
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="250" rx="60" ry="15" fill="#d8d8d8" />
  
  <!-- Lid details -->
  <path d="M190,250 A60,15 0 0,0 260,250" fill="none" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="1" />
  <path d="M180,250 A60,15 0 0,0 270,250" fill="none" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="1" />
  <circle cx="225" cy="240" r="20" fill="#a8a8a8" />
  <circle cx="225" cy="240" r="15" fill="#c0c0c0" />
  <path d="M215,240 L235,240" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" />
  <path d="M225,230 L225,250" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" />
  
  <!-- Jar label -->
  <rect x="175" y="380" width="100" height="80" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#f8f4e9" />
  <path d="M175,380 L200,370 L275,370 L275,450 L250,460 L175,460 Z" fill="#f8f4e9" opacity="0.8" />
  
  <!-- Label text -->
  <text x="225" y="410" font-family="Brush Script MT, cursive" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333333">Homemade</text>
  <text x="225" y="435" font-family="Brush Script MT, cursive" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333333">Special Sauce</text>
  
  <!-- Light reflections on jar -->

  <!-- Phone frame -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" rx="30" ry="30" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="10" />
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="225" y="700" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333333">Homemade Special Sauce</text>
  <text x="225" y="730" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#666666">A closely guarded family recipe</text>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

  <!-- Background -->

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- MEDIUM SHOT - HOST STRUGGLING -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="roomGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#f5e1c9;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#e6c9a8;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="sweatDrop">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="1" result="blur" />
      <feSpecularLighting in="blur" specularExponent="20" lighting-color="#ffffff" result="specular">
        <fePointLight x="0" y="50" z="200" />

      <feComposite in="specular" in2="SourceAlpha" operator="in" result="specular" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="specular" operator="arithmetic" k1="0" k2="1" k3="1" k4="0" />

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- CLOSE-UP - HAND TRANSFER -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="tableGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#d9b38c;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#c99d73;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="softShadow" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>

      <feOffset dx="1" dy="1" result="offsetblur" />

        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.3" />

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- MONTAGE SHOT - CIRCULAR COMPOSITION -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#f8f4e9;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#e6d9c9;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="clockShadow" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="5" />
      <feOffset dx="3" dy="3" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="failureMark" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">

        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.7" />

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- DRAMATIC ANGLED SHOT - JAR APPROACHING PLAYER -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="tableGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#d9b38c;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#c99d73;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="spotlightGradient" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#ffffff;stop-opacity:0.7" />
      <stop offset="70%" style="stop-color:#f9e9d9;stop-opacity:0.3" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#e6d9c9;stop-opacity:0" />
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="jarGlow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="10" result="blur" />
      <feFlood flood-color="#f9d479" flood-opacity="0.5" result="color" />
      <feComposite in="color" in2="blur" operator="in" result="glow" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="glow" operator="over" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="dramaticShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="10" />
      <feOffset dx="5" dy="10" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="#1a1a1a" />
  
  <!-- Dramatic lighting -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="400" rx="220" ry="250" fill="url(#spotlightGradient)" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Table -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="450" height="300" fill="url(#tableGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Other guests leaning back (silhouettes) -->
  <!-- Guest 1 (left) -->
  <path d="M50,400 Q100,350 150,400 L150,500 L50,500 Z" fill="#333333" />
  <circle cx="100" cy="350" r="40" fill="#333333" />
  
  <!-- Guest 2 (left center) -->
  <path d="M150,420 Q175,370 200,420 L200,500 L150,500 Z" fill="#333333" />
  <circle cx="175" cy="370" r="35" fill="#333333" />
  
  <!-- Guest 3 (right center) -->
  <path d="M250,420 Q275,370 300,420 L300,500 L250,500 Z" fill="#333333" />
  <circle cx="275" cy="370" r="35" fill="#333333" />
  
  <!-- Guest 4 (right) -->
  <path d="M300,400 Q350,350 400,400 L400,500 L300,500 Z" fill="#333333" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="350" r="40" fill="#333333" />
  
  <!-- Dramatic jar placement -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="460" rx="60" ry="20" fill="#000000" filter="url(#dramaticShadow)" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- The Jar -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="450" rx="50" ry="20" fill="#a8a8a8" filter="url(#jarGlow)" />
  <path d="M175,450 L175,550 Q175,580 225,580 Q275,580 275,550 L275,450" fill="#d9f9f9" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#jarGlow)" />
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="550" rx="50" ry="20" fill="#d9f9f9" opacity="0.9" />
  <path d="M185,490 L265,490" fill="none" stroke="#ff6b4a" stroke-width="40" stroke-opacity="0.7" />
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="450" rx="40" ry="15" fill="#c0c0c0" />
  <path d="M215,450 L235,450" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" />
  <path d="M225,440 L225,460" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" />
  
  <!-- Light reflections on jar -->
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="500" rx="5" ry="30" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.3" />
  <ellipse cx="250" cy="500" rx="3" ry="20" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.4" />
  
  <!-- Spotlight on jar -->
  <circle cx="225" cy="450" r="100" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.1" />
  
  <!-- Spotlight on empty space (player's position) -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="650" rx="100" ry="50" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.2" />
  
  <!-- Dramatic angled perspective lines -->
  <line x1="100" y1="600" x2="150" y2="500" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  <line x1="350" y1="600" x2="300" y2="500" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  <line x1="50" y1="700" x2="150" y2="500" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  <line x1="400" y1="700" x2="300" y2="500" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  
  <!-- Converging attention lines from guests to jar -->
  <line x1="100" y1="350" x2="225" y2="450" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" />
  <line x1="175" y1="370" x2="225" y2="450" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" />
  <line x1="275" y1="370" x2="225" y2="450" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" />
  <line x1="350" y1="350" x2="225" y2="450" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" />
  
  <!-- Suspense lines around jar -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="450" rx="70" ry="30" fill="none" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="450" rx="80" ry="35" fill="none" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" />
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="450" rx="90" ry="40" fill="none" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.1" />
  
  <!-- Tension lines connecting jar to player position -->
  <line x1="225" y1="580" x2="225" y2="620" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Fourth wall breaking effect -->
  <path d="M175,650 L275,650" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.5" />
  <path d="M175,660 L275,660" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.4" />

  <!-- Background -->

  <!-- Radial blur effect background -->

  <path d="M175,490 L275,490" fill="none" stroke="#ff6b4a" stroke-width="40" stroke-opacity="0.7" />
  
  <!-- Jar lid turning -->
  <g transform="rotate(15, 225, 450)">

  <!-- Motion blur lines -->
  <path d="M175,450 A50,15 0 0,0 275,450" stroke="#c0c0c0" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="5,3" opacity="0.7" filter="url(#radialBlur)" />
  <path d="M175,447 A50,15 0 0,0 275,447" stroke="#c0c0c0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" opacity="0.6" filter="url(#radialBlur)" />
  <path d="M175,444 A50,15 0 0,0 275,444" stroke="#c0c0c0" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#radialBlur)" />
  
  <!-- "POP!" text effect -->
  <text x="225" y="350" font-family="Impact" font-size="60" text-anchor="middle" fill="#ff6b4a" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" filter="url(#popEffect)">POP!</text>
  
  <!-- Air bubbles escaping -->
  <circle cx="210" cy="430" r="3" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#bubbleGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="cy" from="450" to="400" dur="1.5s" begin="0s" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" from="0.8" to="0" dur="1.5s" begin="0s" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="230" cy="425" r="5" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#bubbleGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="cy" from="450" to="380" dur="1.2s" begin="0.1s" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" from="0.8" to="0" dur="1.2s" begin="0.1s" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="245" cy="435" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#bubbleGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="cy" from="450" to="410" dur="1.3s" begin="0.2s" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" from="0.8" to="0" dur="1.3s" begin="0.2s" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="200" cy="440" r="4" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#bubbleGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="cy" from="450" to="390" dur="1.4s" begin="0.3s" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" from="0.8" to="0" dur="1.4s" begin="0.3s" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="220" cy="430" r="3" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#bubbleGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="cy" from="450" to="400" dur="1.1s" begin="0.4s" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" from="0.8" to="0" dur="1.1s" begin="0.4s" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="235" cy="435" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#bubbleGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="cy" from="450" to="410" dur="1.6s" begin="0.5s" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" from="0.8" to="0" dur="1.6s" begin="0.5s" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="250" cy="440" r="3" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#bubbleGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="cy" from="450" to="395" dur="1.3s" begin="0.6s" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" from="0.8" to="0" dur="1.3s" begin="0.6s" />
  </circle>
  
  <!-- Vacuum release visualization -->
  <path d="M225,440 Q235,430 245,440" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6">

  <path d="M205,440 Q215,430 225,440" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6">

  <path d="M330,550 Q310,520 280,510 Q250,500 230,520" fill="#e8c9a8" opacity="0.8" />

  <circle cx="225" cy="450" r="80" fill="none" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.3">
    <animate attributeName="r" from="40" to="80" dur="1s" repeatCount="1" begin="0.2s" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" from="0.5" to="0" dur="1s" repeatCount="1" begin="0.2s" />
  </circle>
  
  <!-- Phone frame -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" rx="30" ry="30" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="10" />
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <rect x="50" y="650" width="350" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#4a8c69" opacity="0.9" />
  <text x="225" y="690" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#ffffff">SUCCESS! IT'S OPENING!</text>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- SUCCESS 3: TRIUMPHANT REVEAL -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#f5e1c9;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#e6c9a8;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="heroLight" cx="50%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#ffffff;stop-opacity:0.8" />
      <stop offset="40%" style="stop-color:#f9e9d9;stop-opacity:0.5" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#f5e1c9;stop-opacity:0" />
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="glow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="10" result="blur" />
      <feFlood flood-color="#f9d479" flood-opacity="0.7" result="color" />
      <feComposite in="color" in2="blur" operator="in" result="glow" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="glow" operator="over" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="shadow" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="5" />
      <feOffset dx="3" dy="5" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#bgGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Heroic backlight -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="250" rx="200" ry="150" fill="url(#heroLight)" />
  
  <!-- Upward angle perspective lines -->
  <line x1="50" y1="700" x2="100" y2="500" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  <line x1="400" y1="700" x2="350" y2="500" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  <line x1="150" y1="700" x2="150" y2="500" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  <line x1="300" y1="700" x2="300" y2="500" stroke="#a8a8a8" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3" />
  
  <!-- Player's right hand holding jar -->
  <path d="M150,550 Q170,500 200,480 Q230,460 250,480 Q270,500 260,550 Q250,600 220,620 Q190,640 170,610 Q150,580 150,550 Z" fill="#e8c9a8" filter="url(#shadow)" />
  
  <!-- Player's left hand holding lid -->

  <!-- The Jar (in right hand) -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="550" rx="50" ry="15" fill="#d9f9f9" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#shadow)" />
  <path d="M175,550 L175,650 Q175,680 225,680 Q275,680 275,650 L275,550" fill="#d9f9f9" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#shadow)" />
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="650" rx="50" ry="15" fill="#d9f9f9" opacity="0.9" />
  <path d="M185,590 L265,590" fill="none" stroke="#ff6b4a" stroke-width="40" stroke-opacity="0.7" />
  
  <!-- The Lid (in left hand) -->
  <ellipse cx="350" cy="450" rx="50" ry="15" fill="#c0c0c0" filter="url(#shadow)" />
  <path d="M340,450 L360,450" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" />
  <path d="M350,440 L350,460" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" />
  
  <!-- Success glow around opened jar -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="600" rx="80" ry="100" fill="none" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="3" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#glow)" />
  
  <!-- Steam/aroma from opened jar -->
  <path d="M215,550 Q210,530 215,510 Q220,490 215,470" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.5" />
  <path d="M225,550 Q220,520 225,490 Q230,460 225,430" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.5" />
  <path d="M235,550 Q230,530 235,510 Q240,490 235,470" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Success sparkles -->
  <path d="M200,520 L205,530 L215,530 L207,535 L210,545 L200,540 L190,545 L193,535 L185,530 L195,530 Z" fill="#f9d479" opacity="0.8" />
  <path d="M250,530 L255,540 L265,540 L257,545 L260,555 L250,550 L240,555 L243,545 L235,540 L245,540 Z" fill="#f9d479" opacity="0.8" />
  <path d="M225,480 L230,490 L240,490 L232,495 L235,505 L225,500 L215,505 L218,495 L210,490 L220,490 Z" fill="#f9d479" opacity="0.8" />
  <path d="M350,420 L355,430 L365,430 L357,435 L360,445 L350,440 L340,445 L343,435 L335,430 L345,430 Z" fill="#f9d479" opacity="0.8" />
  
  <!-- Subtle motion lines indicating upward movement -->
  <path d="M170,650 L160,670" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" opacity="0.5" />
  <path d="M280,650 L290,670" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" opacity="0.5" />
  <path d="M320,500 L310,520" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" opacity="0.5" />
  <path d="M380,500 L390,520" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Triumphant light rays -->
  <path d="M225,400 L225,350" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.3" />

  <path d="M225,400 L150,400" stroke="#f9d479" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.3" />
  
  <!-- Phone frame -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" rx="30" ry="30" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="10" />
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <rect x="50" y="700" width="350" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#4a8c69" opacity="0.9" />
  <text x="225" y="740" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#ffffff">TRIUMPHANT VICTORY!</text>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- SUCCESS 4: REACTION MONTAGE -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="panelGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#f5f5f5;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#e8e8e8;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="panelShadow" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />

    </filter>

    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="#f8f4e9" />
  
  <!-- Comic panel layout -->
  <!-- Panel 1 - Top left -->

  <circle cx="140" cy="110" r="3" fill="#ffffff" />

  <path d="M160,120 Q180,110 170,100" stroke="#e8c9a8" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
  <path d="M100,180 L95,200" stroke="#a36a8f" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M140,180 L145,200" stroke="#a36a8f" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
  
  <!-- Clapping motion lines -->
  <path d="M60,120 L50,120" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" filter="url(#applauseLines)" />
  <path d="M60,110 L50,105" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" filter="url(#applauseLines)" />
  <path d="M60,130 L50,135" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" filter="url(#applauseLines)" />
  <path d="M180,120 L190,120" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" filter="url(#applauseLines)" />
  <path d="M180,110 L190,105" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" filter="url(#applauseLines)" />
  <path d="M180,130 L190,135" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" filter="url(#applauseLines)" />
  
  <!-- Panel 2 - Top right -->
  <rect x="235" y="50" width="190" height="200" rx="10" ry="10" fill="url(#panelGradient)" filter="url(#panelShadow)" />
  
  <!-- Guest 2 - Impressed man -->
  <circle cx="330" cy="120" r="50" fill="#d9b38c" />
  <ellipse cx="310" cy="110" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#5d4037" />
  <ellipse cx="350" cy="110" rx="8" ry="5" fill="#5d4037" />
  <path d="M310,110 L310,115" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="2" />
  <path d="M350,110 L350,115" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="2" />
  <path d="M310,140 Q330,150 350,140" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  <circle cx="310" cy="110" r="2" fill="#ffffff" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="110" r="2" fill="#ffffff" />
  <path d="M290,120 Q270,130 280,140" stroke="#d9b38c" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
  <path d="M370,120 Q390,130 380,140" stroke="#d9b38c" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
  <path d="M310,180 L305,200" stroke="#6a8fa3" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M350,180 L355,200" stroke="#6a8fa3" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
  
  <!-- Raised glass toast -->
  <path d="M370,130 Q370,120 360,115 Q350,120 350,130 L350,140 Q360,145 370,140 Z" fill="#f9f9f9" opacity="0.8" />
  <ellipse cx="360" cy="130" rx="10" ry="3" fill="#a8324b" opacity="0.7" />
  
  <!-- Panel 3 - Middle left -->
  <rect x="25" y="270" width="190" height="200" rx="10" ry="10" fill="url(#panelGradient)" filter="url(#panelShadow)" />
  
  <!-- Guest 3 - Relieved host -->
  <circle cx="120" cy="340" r="50" fill="#e8c9a8" />
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="330" rx="8" ry="10" fill="#5d4037" />
  <ellipse cx="140" cy="330" rx="8" ry="10" fill="#5d4037" />
  <path d="M100,330 L100,325" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="2" />
  <path d="M140,330 L140,325" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="2" />
  <path d="M100,350 Q120,370 140,350" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  <path d="M80,340 Q60,330 70,320" stroke="#e8c9a8" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
  <path d="M160,340 Q180,330 170,320" stroke="#e8c9a8" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
  <path d="M100,400 L95,420" stroke="#a36a6a" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M140,400 L145,420" stroke="#a36a6a" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
  
  <!-- Wiping brow relief motion -->
  <path d="M80,310 Q90,300 100,310" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2" />
  
  <!-- Speech bubble -->
  <path d="M150,300 Q170,290 190,300 Q210,310 190,320 Q170,330 150,320 Q130,310 150,300 Z" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="170" y="315" font-family="Comic Sans MS" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333333">Phew!</text>
  
  <!-- Panel 4 - Middle right -->
  <rect x="235" y="270" width="190" height="200" rx="10" ry="10" fill="url(#panelGradient)" filter="url(#panelShadow)" />
  
  <!-- Guest 4 - Enthusiastic applause -->
  <circle cx="330" cy="320" r="50" fill="#c99d73" />
  <ellipse cx="310" cy="315" rx="8" ry="8" fill="#5d4037" />
  <ellipse cx="350" cy="315" rx="8" ry="8" fill="#5d4037" />
  <path d="M320,335 Q330,345 340,335" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  <path d="M290,320 Q270,310 280,300" stroke="#c99d73" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
  <path d="M370,320 Q390,310 380,300" stroke="#c99d73" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
  <path d="M310,360 L300,390" stroke="#8fa36a" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M350,360 L360,390" stroke="#8fa36a" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
  
  <!-- Clapping hands -->
  <ellipse cx="270" cy="320" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#c99d73" />

  <path d="M390,310 L390,330" stroke="#888888" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
  
  <!-- Applause text -->
  <text x="330" y="280" font-family="Comic Sans MS" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333333">*clap clap*</text>
  
  <!-- Panel 5 - Bottom center wide -->
  <rect x="25" y="490" width="400" height="200" rx="10" ry="10" fill="url(#panelGradient)" filter="url(#panelShadow)" />
  
  <!-- Opened jar -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="550" rx="50" ry="15" fill="#d9f9f9" opacity="0.9" />
  <path d="M175,550 L175,600 Q175,630 225,630 Q275,630 275,600 L275,550" fill="#d9f9f9" opacity="0.8" />
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="600" rx="50" ry="15" fill="#d9f9f9" opacity="0.9" />
  <path d="M185,570 L265,570" fill="none" stroke="#ff6b4a" stroke-width="20" stroke-opacity="0.7" />
  
  <!-- Jar lid set aside -->
  <ellipse cx="325" cy="540" rx="40" ry="10" fill="#c0c0c0" />
  
  <!-- Sauce being served -->
  <path d="M225,550 Q225,530 235,520 Q245,510 245,490 Q245,470 235,460 Q225,450 215,460 Q205,470 205,490 Q205,510 215,520 Q225,530 225,550 Z" fill="#ff6b4a" opacity="0.9">
    <animate attributeName="d" values="M225,550 Q225,530 235,520 Q245,510 245,490 Q245,470 235,460 Q225,450 215,460 Q205,470 205,490 Q205,510 215,520 Q225,530 225,550 Z; M225,550 Q225,520 235,500 Q245,480 245,440 Q245,400 235,380 Q225,360 215,380 Q205,400 205,440 Q205,480 215,500 Q225,520 225,550 Z" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </path>
  
  <!-- Sauce landing on plate -->
  <circle cx="225" cy="650" r="40" fill="#ffffff" />
  <circle cx="225" cy="650" r="20" fill="#ff6b4a" opacity="0.9" />

name: Overhead Luggage
description: Player must lift a heavy suitcase into an airplane's overhead compartment while people wait.

  <!-- Elderly couple -->

  <rect x="435" y="0" width="15" height="800" fill="#1a1a2e" opacity="0.7"/>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background - Airplane floor -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="#2c3e50"/>
  
  <!-- Carpet texture pattern -->
  <pattern id="carpet" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="20" height="20">
    <rect width="20" height="20" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M0,0 L20,20 M20,0 L0,20" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="1" stroke-opacity="0.4"/>
  </pattern>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" fill="url(#carpet)"/>
  
  <!-- Ambient lighting gradient -->
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="ambientLight" cx="50%" cy="40%" r="60%" fx="50%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="0.2"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0.3"/>
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" fill="url(#ambientLight)"/>
  
  <!-- The vintage suitcase -->
  <g id="vintage-suitcase" transform="translate(225, 400)">
    <!-- Main body of suitcase -->
    <rect x="-150" y="-100" width="300" height="200" rx="20" ry="20" fill="#8B4513" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="5"/>
    
    <!-- Worn leather texture -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="30" height="30">
      <rect width="30" height="30" fill="#8B4513"/>
      <path d="M0,15 Q15,0 30,15 Q15,30 0,15" fill="#7C3C0C" opacity="0.3"/>
      <path d="M15,0 Q30,15 15,30 Q0,15 15,0" fill="#9A5D2D" opacity="0.3"/>
      <circle cx="15" cy="15" r="3" fill="#6D351D" opacity="0.4"/>
    </pattern>
    <rect x="-145" y="-95" width="290" height="190" rx="15" ry="15" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Weathered effects -->
    <path d="M-130,-80 L-110,-60 M-90,-70 L-70,-50 M-50,-85 L-30,-65" stroke="#6D351D" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M10,-80 L30,-60 M50,-70 L70,-50 M90,-85 L110,-65" stroke="#6D351D" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M-130,60 L-110,80 M-90,50 L-70,70 M-50,55 L-30,75" stroke="#6D351D" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M10,60 L30,80 M50,50 L70,70 M90,55 L110,75" stroke="#6D351D" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6"/>
    
    <!-- Decorative strips -->
    <rect x="-150" y="-50" width="300" height="10" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="-150" y="40" width="300" height="10" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Center divide -->
    <rect x="-5" y="-100" width="10" height="200" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Brass corners -->
    <circle cx="-130" cy="-80" r="10" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="130" cy="-80" r="10" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="-130" cy="80" r="10" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="130" cy="80" r="10" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Brass buckles -->
    <rect x="-100" y="-15" width="30" height="30" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="2"/>
    <rect x="70" y="-15" width="30" height="30" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="2"/>
    <rect x="-95" y="-10" width="20" height="20" rx="3" ry="3" fill="#AA8C2C"/>
    <rect x="75" y="-10" width="20" height="20" rx="3" ry="3" fill="#AA8C2C"/>
    <path d="M-85,-5 L-85,5" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M85,-5 L85,5" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="3"/>
    
    <!-- Straps -->
    <rect x="-120" y="-110" width="30" height="10" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="90" y="-110" width="30" height="10" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Main handle -->
    <path d="M-50,-110 Q0,-150 50,-110" fill="none" stroke="#6D351D" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M-45,-110 Q0,-145 45,-110" fill="none" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Handle shine -->
    <path d="M-30,-120 Q0,-140 30,-120" fill="none" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.7"/>
    
    <!-- Travel stickers -->
    
    <!-- Paris sticker -->
    <rect x="-120" y="-70" width="50" height="35" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#3498db" stroke="#2980b9" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="-95" y="-55" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">PARIS</text>
    <path d="M-105,-45 L-95,-25 L-85,-45" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Rome sticker -->
    <rect x="70" y="-80" width="55" height="40" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#e74c3c" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(10, 97.5, -60)"/>
    <text x="97" y="-65" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="white" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(10, 97.5, -60)">ROMA</text>
    <circle cx="97" cy="-50" r="10" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(10, 97.5, -60)"/>
    
    <!-- Tokyo sticker -->
    <rect x="-90" y="50" width="60" height="30" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#2ecc71" stroke="#27ae60" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(-5, -60, 65)"/>
    <text x="-60" y="70" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="white" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(-5, -60, 65)">TOKYO</text>
    <path d="M-75,60 L-45,60" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(-5, -60, 65)"/>
    
    <!-- Cairo sticker -->
    <rect x="40" y="45" width="50" height="35" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#f39c12" stroke="#d35400" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(15, 65, 62.5)"/>
    <text x="65" y="65" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="white" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(15, 65, 62.5)">CAIRO</text>
    <path d="M50,70 L80,70" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(15, 65, 62.5)"/>
    
    <!-- Luggage tag -->
    <g id="luggageTag" transform="translate(45, -110)">
      <rect x="0" y="0" width="30" height="20" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1"/>
      <text x="15" y="13" font-family="Arial" font-size="5" fill="#2c3e50" text-anchor="middle">SMITH</text>
      <rect x="10" y="-5" width="10" height="5" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1"/>
      <path d="M15,-5 L15,-15 Q15,-20 10,-20 L5,-20" fill="none" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1"/>
      
      <!-- Swing animation -->
      <animateTransform
        attributeName="transform"
        type="rotate"
        from="-5"
        to="5"
        begin="0s"
        dur="2s"
        repeatCount="indefinite"
        additive="sum"
      />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Wear and tear details -->
    <ellipse cx="-100" cy="30" rx="25" ry="15" fill="#6D351D" opacity="0.3"/>
    <ellipse cx="100" cy="-30" rx="20" ry="15" fill="#6D351D" opacity="0.3"/>
    <path d="M-140,-40 L-130,-30" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M130,40 L140,50" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Floor shadow -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="500" rx="160" ry="30" fill="#000000" opacity="0.4"/>
  
  <!-- Passenger feet in background -->
  <ellipse cx="150" cy="700" rx="15" ry="7" fill="#1a1a1a" opacity="0.7"/>
  <rect x="145" y="680" width="10" height="20" fill="#34495e" opacity="0.7" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  
  <ellipse cx="300" cy="720" rx="15" ry="7" fill="#1a1a1a" opacity="0.7"/>
  <rect x="295" y="700" width="10" height="20" fill="#2c3e50" opacity="0.7" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  
  <!-- Airplane aisle edge hints -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="75" height="800" fill="#1e2b3a" opacity="0.5"/>
  <rect x="375" y="0" width="75" height="800" fill="#1e2b3a" opacity="0.5"/>
  
  <!-- Vignette effect -->
  <radialGradient id="vignette" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="65%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="85%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#vignette)"/>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background - Airplane interior from low angle -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="cabinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#1a1a2e"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2c3e50"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="lightGlow" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="0.9"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <filter id="celestialGlow">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="10" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" intercept="0" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background fill -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#cabinGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Airplane ceiling structure -->
  <path d="M0,0 L0,300 C0,350 50,400 100,400 L350,400 C400,400 450,350 450,300 L450,0 Z" fill="#2a3b4d"/>
  
  <!-- Ceiling panels -->
  <rect x="50" y="50" width="350" height="100" fill="#34495e" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  <rect x="60" y="60" width="330" height="80" fill="#2c3e50" rx="3" ry="3"/>
  
  <!-- Ceiling lights -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="100" rx="150" ry="30" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.1"/>
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="100" rx="120" ry="20" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.2"/>
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="100" rx="100" ry="15" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.3"/>
  
  <!-- Main light fixture -->
  <rect x="200" y="80" width="50" height="40" fill="#ecf0f1" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  <rect x="205" y="85" width="40" height="30" fill="#ffffff" rx="3" ry="3"/>
  
  <!-- Light beams -->
  <path d="M200,120 L150,800 M250,120 L300,800" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.1"/>
  <path d="M210,120 L170,800 M240,120 L280,800" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.1"/>
  <path d="M220,120 L190,800 M230,120 L260,800" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.1"/>
  
  <!-- Overhead bin structure -->
  <path d="M75,150 L375,150 L375,300 L75,300 Z" fill="#1e2b3a" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="3"/>
  
  <!-- Overhead bin opening -->
  <path d="M125,200 L325,200 L325,280 L125,280 Z" fill="#121a24" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Celestial halo effect around bin opening -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="240" rx="100" ry="40" fill="url(#lightGlow)" filter="url(#celestialGlow)"/>
  
  <!-- Interior of open bin with lighting effect -->
  <rect x="128" y="203" width="194" height="74" fill="#0e131a" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  <rect x="130" y="205" width="190" height="70" fill="#121a24" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  
  <!-- Place Luggage Here sticker -->
  <rect x="200" y="240" width="50" height="15" fill="#3498db" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  <text x="225" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="6" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">PLACE LUGGAGE HERE</text>
  
  <!-- Bin handles -->
  <rect x="200" y="190" width="50" height="5" fill="#34495e" rx="2.5" ry="2.5"/>
  <rect x="215" y="185" width="20" height="10" fill="#2c3e50" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  
  <!-- Exaggerated perspective elements -->
  
  <!-- Overhead bins receding in perspective -->
  <path d="M75,150 L25,50 L425,50 L375,150 Z" fill="#2a3b4d" opacity="0.7"/>
  <path d="M125,200 L100,150 L350,150 L325,200 Z" fill="#1e2b3a" opacity="0.8"/>
  
  <!-- Overhead bin sides in perspective -->
  <path d="M75,150 L75,300 L125,280 L125,200 L100,150 L75,150 Z" fill="#1a242f"/>
  <path d="M375,150 L375,300 L325,280 L325,200 L350,150 L375,150 Z" fill="#1a242f"/>
  
  <!-- Airplane wall panels -->
  <rect x="0" y="300" width="75" height="500" fill="#2c3e50"/>
  <rect x="375" y="300" width="75" height="500" fill="#2c3e50"/>
  
  <!-- Wall panel details -->
  <rect x="10" y="350" width="55" height="100" fill="#34495e" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  <rect x="10" y="470" width="55" height="100" fill="#34495e" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  <rect x="10" y="590" width="55" height="100" fill="#34495e" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  
  <rect x="385" y="350" width="55" height="100" fill="#34495e" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  <rect x="385" y="470" width="55" height="100" fill="#34495e" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  <rect x="385" y="590" width="55" height="100" fill="#34495e" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  
  <!-- Airplane aisle -->
  <rect x="75" y="300" width="300" height="500" fill="#2c3e50"/>
  
  <!-- Carpet texture pattern -->
  <pattern id="carpet" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="20" height="20">
    <rect width="20" height="20" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M0,0 L20,20 M20,0 L0,20" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="1" stroke-opacity="0.4"/>
  </pattern>
  <rect x="75" y="300" width="300" height="500" fill="url(#carpet)"/>
  
  <!-- Distant player silhouette -->
  <g transform="translate(225, 700)" opacity="0.7">
    <rect x="-15" y="-50" width="30" height="70" fill="#2c3e50" rx="5" ry="5"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="-65" r="15" fill="#34495e"/>
    <rect x="-25" y="-30" width="15" height="5" fill="#2c3e50" rx="2.5" ry="2.5"/>
    <rect x="10" y="-30" width="15" height="5" fill="#2c3e50" rx="2.5" ry="2.5"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Distant suitcase silhouette -->
  <rect x="190" y="750" width="70" height="40" fill="#1a1a1a" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  
  <!-- Exaggerated distance effect -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#cabinGradient)" opacity="0.3"/>
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="450" height="300" fill="url(#cabinGradient)" opacity="0.3"/>
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="200" fill="url(#cabinGradient)" opacity="0.3"/>
  
  <!-- Vignette effect -->
  <radialGradient id="vignette" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="75%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="85%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000" stop-opacity="0.8"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#vignette)"/>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background gradient -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2c3e50"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#1a1a2e"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <filter id="sweatDrop">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <radialGradient id="handleShine" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="30%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#d4b483" stop-opacity="1"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#8b4513" stop-opacity="1"/>
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#bgGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Ambient airplane lighting -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="100" rx="200" ry="100" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.1"/>
  
  <!-- Suitcase body (partial view, focused on handles) -->
  <rect x="50" y="400" width="350" height="300" rx="20" ry="20" fill="#8B4513" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="5"/>
  
  <!-- Worn leather texture -->
  <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="30" height="30">
    <rect width="30" height="30" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <path d="M0,15 Q15,0 30,15 Q15,30 0,15" fill="#7C3C0C" opacity="0.3"/>
    <path d="M15,0 Q30,15 15,30 Q0,15 15,0" fill="#9A5D2D" opacity="0.3"/>
    <circle cx="15" cy="15" r="3" fill="#6D351D" opacity="0.4"/>
  </pattern>
  <rect x="55" y="405" width="340" height="290" rx="15" ry="15" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Decorative strips -->
  <rect x="50" y="500" width="350" height="10" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="1"/>
  <rect x="50" y="600" width="350" height="10" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="1"/>
  
  <!-- Center divide -->
  <rect x="220" y="400" width="10" height="300" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="1"/>
  
  <!-- Brass corners -->
  <circle cx="80" cy="430" r="15" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="2"/>
  <circle cx="370" cy="430" r="15" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Brass buckles -->
  <rect x="120" y="450" width="40" height="40" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="2"/>
  <rect x="290" y="450" width="40" height="40" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="2"/>
  <rect x="125" y="455" width="30" height="30" rx="3" ry="3" fill="#AA8C2C"/>
  <rect x="295" y="455" width="30" height="30" rx="3" ry="3" fill="#AA8C2C"/>
  <path d="M140,460 L140,480" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="3"/>
  <path d="M310,460 L310,480" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="3"/>
  
  <!-- Main handles (highlighted) -->
  <path d="M150,400 Q225,350 300,400" fill="none" stroke="#6D351D" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <path d="M155,400 Q225,355 295,400" fill="none" stroke="url(#handleShine)" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  
  <!-- Handle shine -->
  <path d="M170,385 Q225,350 280,385" fill="none" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.8"/>
  
  <!-- Left hand approaching -->
  <g id="leftHand" transform="translate(160, 300) rotate(15)">
    <!-- Wrist -->
    <path d="M-20,60 C-25,40 -25,20 -20,0 C-15,-20 0,-30 15,-25 C30,-20 35,0 30,20 C25,40 15,50 0,60 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Fingers -->
    <path d="M-5,0 C-8,-10 -5,-20 0,-25 C5,-30 15,-30 20,-25 C25,-20 25,-10 20,0 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M10,-5 C8,-15 12,-25 18,-30 C24,-35 34,-35 40,-30 C46,-25 46,-15 40,-5 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M25,-10 C23,-20 27,-30 33,-35 C39,-40 49,-40 55,-35 C61,-30 61,-20 55,-10 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M40,-15 C38,-25 42,-35 48,-40 C54,-45 64,-45 70,-40 C76,-35 76,-25 70,-15 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M-15,25 C-22,20 -25,10 -20,0 C-15,-10 -5,-15 5,-10 C15,-5 20,5 15,15 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Trembling effect -->
    <animateTransform
      attributeName="transform"
      type="translate"
      values="160,300; 162,301; 160,302; 159,300; 160,300"
      dur="0.5s"
      repeatCount="indefinite"
      additive="sum"
    />
    
    <!-- Sweat on wrist -->
    <circle cx="-10" cy="50" r="3" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#sweatDrop)">
      <animate
        attributeName="cy"
        values="50;55;60"
        dur="2s"
        repeatCount="indefinite"
      />
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Right hand approaching -->
  <g id="rightHand" transform="translate(290, 300) rotate(-15)">
    <!-- Wrist -->
    <path d="M20,60 C25,40 25,20 20,0 C15,-20 0,-30 -15,-25 C-30,-20 -35,0 -30,20 C-25,40 -15,50 0,60 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Fingers -->
    <path d="M5,0 C8,-10 5,-20 0,-25 C-5,-30 -15,-30 -20,-25 C-25,-20 -25,-10 -20,0 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M-10,-5 C-8,-15 -12,-25 -18,-30 C-24,-35 -34,-35 -40,-30 C-46,-25 -46,-15 -40,-5 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M-25,-10 C-23,-20 -27,-30 -33,-35 C-39,-40 -49,-40 -55,-35 C-61,-30 -61,-20 -55,-10 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M-40,-15 C-38,-25 -42,-35 -48,-40 C-54,-45 -64,-45 -70,-40 C-76,-35 -76,-25 -70,-15 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M15,25 C22,20 25,10 20,0 C15,-10 5,-15 -5,-10 C-15,-5 -20,5 -15,15 Z" fill="#e8d0b0" stroke="#d1b494" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Trembling effect -->
    <animateTransform
      attributeName="transform"
      type="translate"
      values="290,300; 288,301; 290,302; 291,300; 290,300"
      dur="0.5s"
      repeatCount="indefinite"
      additive="sum"
    />
    
    <!-- Sweat on wrist -->
    <circle cx="10" cy="50" r="3" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#sweatDrop)">
      <animate
        attributeName="cy"
        values="50;55;60"
        dur="2.5s"
        repeatCount="indefinite"
      />
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Perfect grip indicator highlights -->
  <ellipse cx="180" cy="380" rx="20" ry="10" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.2">
    <animate
      attributeName="opacity"
      values="0.2;0.4;0.2"
      dur="1.5s"
      repeatCount="indefinite"
    />
  </ellipse>
  
  <ellipse cx="270" cy="380" rx="20" ry="10" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.2">
    <animate
      attributeName="opacity"
      values="0.2;0.4;0.2"
      dur="1.5s"
      repeatCount="indefinite"
    />
  </ellipse>
  
  <!-- Cabin lighting effects -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="200" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.05"/>
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="0" rx="200" ry="100" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.1"/>
  
  <!-- Additional sweat drops -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="320" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#sweatDrop)">
    <animate
      attributeName="cy"
      values="320;330;340"
      dur="3s"
      repeatCount="indefinite"
    />
  </circle>
  
  <circle cx="300" cy="310" r="2" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#sweatDrop)">
    <animate
      attributeName="cy"
      values="310;320;330"
      dur="2.7s"
      repeatCount="indefinite"
    />
  </circle>
  
  <!-- Perfect grip zone highlights -->
  <path d="M170,380 Q180,375 190,380" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  <path d="M260,380 Q270,375 280,380" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  
  <!-- Vignette effect -->
  <radialGradient id="vignette" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="65%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="85%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#vignette)"/>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="#1a1a2e"/>
  
  <!-- Split screen dividers -->
  <rect x="0" y="266" width="450" height="2" fill="#ffffff"/>
  <rect x="0" y="532" width="450" height="2" fill="#ffffff"/>
  <rect x="225" y="0" width="2" height="800" fill="#ffffff"/>
  
  <!-- Frame 1: Businessman with watch -->
  <g id="businessman" transform="translate(112.5, 133)">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect x="-112.5" y="-133" width="225" height="266" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Businessman body -->
    <rect x="-40" y="-20" width="80" height="120" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#34495e"/>
    
    <!-- Shirt and tie -->
    <rect x="-25" y="-20" width="50" height="90" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#ecf0f1"/>
    <path d="M0,-20 L-10,20 L0,70 L10,20 L0,-20 Z" fill="#e74c3c"/>
    
    <!-- Suit details -->
    <rect x="-40" y="-20" width="15" height="120" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <rect x="25" y="-20" width="15" height="120" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <rect x="-40" y="70" width="80" height="15" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-50" r="30" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-30,-60 Q-10,-90 30,-60" fill="#34495e"/>
    <path d="M-30,-60 Q0,-75 30,-60" fill="#34495e"/>
    
    <!-- Face -->
    <ellipse cx="-12" cy="-55" rx="5" ry="6" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <ellipse cx="12" cy="-55" rx="5" ry="6" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M-10,-35 Q0,-30 10,-35" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows raised in impatience -->
    <path d="M-17,-65 Q-12,-70 -7,-65" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M7,-65 Q12,-70 17,-65" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="-65" y="-10" width="25" height="15" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" fill="#34495e"/>
    <rect x="40" y="-10" width="25" height="15" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" fill="#34495e"/>
    
    <!-- Left arm checking watch -->
    <g transform="rotate(-30, -65, -2.5)">
      <rect x="-90" y="-7.5" width="25" height="10" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#34495e"/>
      <circle cx="-90" cy="-2.5" r="10" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
      
      <!-- Watch -->
      <circle cx="-90" cy="-2.5" r="7" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="-90" cy="-2.5" r="5" fill="#3498db" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="-90" y1="-2.5" x2="-90" y2="-7.5" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="-90" y1="-2.5" x2="-86" y2="-2.5" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      
      <!-- Watch checking animation -->
      <animateTransform
        attributeName="transform"
        type="rotate"
        from="0 -90 -2.5"
        to="360 -90 -2.5"
        dur="3s"
        repeatCount="indefinite"
        additive="sum"
      />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Impatient expression -->
    <path d="M-5,-45 L5,-45" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Thought bubble with clock -->
    <circle cx="50" cy="-80" r="20" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="30" cy="-60" r="10" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="20" cy="-50" r="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Clock in thought bubble -->
    <circle cx="50" cy="-80" r="15" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="50" y1="-80" x2="50" y2="-70" stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="50" y1="-80" x2="58" y2="-80" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Clock animation -->
    <g transform="translate(50, -80)">
      <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="-10" stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="2">
        <animateTransform
          attributeName="transform"
          type="rotate"
          from="0 0 0"
          to="360 0 0"
          dur="3s"
          repeatCount="indefinite"
        />
      </line>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Frame 2: Flight attendant -->
  <g id="flightAttendant" transform="translate(337.5, 133)">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect x="-112.5" y="-133" width="225" height="266" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Flight attendant body -->
    <rect x="-30" y="-20" width="60" height="120" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#2980b9"/>
    
    <!-- Uniform details -->
    <rect x="-20" y="-20" width="40" height="90" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#3498db"/>
    <rect x="-30" y="50" width="60" height="20" fill="#2980b9"/>
    <path d="M-30,50 L30,50 L20,70 L-20,70 Z" fill="#ecf0f1"/>
    
    <!-- Scarf -->
    <path d="M-20,-20 L20,-20 L10,-10 L-10,-10 Z" fill="#e74c3c"/>
    <path d="M-10,-10 L10,-10 L0,10 Z" fill="#e74c3c"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-50" r="30" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    
    <!-- Hair in bun -->
    <path d="M-20,-65 Q0,-75 20,-65" fill="#4a2c0f"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="-70" r="15" fill="#4a2c0f"/>
    
    <!-- Face -->
    <ellipse cx="-12" cy="-55" rx="5" ry="6" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <ellipse cx="12" cy="-55" rx="5" ry="6" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Professional smile (strained) -->
    <path d="M-15,-35 Q0,-25 15,-35" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M-15,-35 Q0,-32 15,-35" stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows slightly raised -->
    <path d="M-17,-65 Q-12,-67 -7,-65" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M7,-65 Q12,-67 17,-65" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="-55" y="-10" width="25" height="15" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" fill="#2980b9"/>
    <rect x="30" y="-10" width="25" height="15" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" fill="#2980b9"/>
    
    <!-- Clipboard -->
    <g transform="rotate(10, 30, -2.5)">
      <rect x="40" y="-20" width="30" height="40" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
      <line x1="45" y1="-10" x2="65" y2="-10" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
      <line x1="45" y1="0" x2="65" y2="0" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
      <line x1="45" y1="10" x2="65" y2="10" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="40" cy="-20" r="5" fill="#e74c3c"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Thought bubble with passengers -->
    <circle cx="-50" cy="-80" r="20" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="-30" cy="-60" r="10" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="-20" cy="-50" r="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- People silhouettes in thought bubble -->
    <g transform="translate(-50, -80) scale(0.5)">
      <circle cx="-10" cy="0" r="5" fill="#2c3e50"/>
      <rect x="-15" y="5" width="10" height="15" fill="#2c3e50"/>
      <circle cx="10" cy="0" r="5" fill="#2c3e50"/>
      <rect x="5" y="5" width="10" height="15" fill="#2c3e50"/>
      <circle cx="0" cy="-5" r="5" fill="#2c3e50"/>
      <rect x="-5" y="0" width="10" height="15" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Frame 3: Elderly woman -->
  <g id="elderlyWoman" transform="translate(112.5, 399)">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect x="-112.5" y="-133" width="225" height="266" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Elderly woman body -->
    <rect x="-35" y="-20" width="70" height="110" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#8e44ad"/>
    
    <!-- Cardigan -->
    <rect x="-35" y="-20" width="70" height="40" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#9b59b6"/>
    <rect x="-25" y="-20" width="50" height="80" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#ecf0f1"/>
    
    <!-- Pearls -->
    <circle cx="-15" cy="0" r="3" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="-5" cy="0" r="3" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="5" cy="0" r="3" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="15" cy="0" r="3" fill="#ecf0f1" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-50" r="30" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    
    <!-- Grey hair -->
    <path d="M-30,-60 Q0,-85 30,-60" fill="#bdc3c7"/>
    <path d="M-30,-60 Q0,-75 30,-60" fill="#ecf0f1"/>
    
    <!-- Face -->
    <ellipse cx="-12" cy="-55" rx="4" ry="5" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <ellipse cx="12" cy="-55" rx="4" ry="5" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Wrinkles -->
    <path d="M-20,-40 L-10,-40" stroke="#a39489" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M10,-40 L20,-40" stroke="#a39489" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M-15,-30 L15,-30" stroke="#a39489" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Disapproving expression -->
    <path d="M-10,-35 Q0,-40 10,-35" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Arched eyebrows of disapproval -->
    <path d="M-20,-65 Q-12,-72 -5,-65" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M5,-65 Q13,-72 20,-65" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Glasses -->
    <rect x="-22" y="-58" width="18" height="12" rx="3" ry="6" fill="none" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="4" y="-58" width="18" height="12" rx="3" ry="6" fill="none" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="-4" y1="-52" x2="4" y2="-52" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="-60" y="-10" width="25" height="15" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" fill="#9b59b6"/>
    <rect x="35" y="-10" width="25" height="15" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" fill="#9b59b6"/>
    
    <!-- Handbag -->
    <rect x="-70" y="5" width="30" height="25" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#34495e" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M-65,5 L-65,-10 L-45,-10 L-45,5" fill="none" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Thought bubble with question marks -->
    <circle cx="50" cy="-80" r="20" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="30" cy="-60" r="10" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="20" cy="-50" r="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Question mark in thought bubble -->
    <text x="50" y="-75" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#e74c3c" text-anchor="middle">?</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Frame 4: Additional passenger -->
  <g id="additionalPassenger" transform="translate(337.5, 399)">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect x="-112.5" y="-133" width="225" height="266" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Additional passenger body -->
    <rect x="-30" y="-20" width="60" height="120" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#16a085"/>
    
    <!-- Shirt -->
    <rect x="-20" y="-20" width="40" height="80" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#1abc9c"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-50" r="30" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-25,-60 Q0,-90 25,-60" fill="#7f8c8d"/>

    <!-- Thought bubble with exclamation -->
    <circle cx="-50" cy="-80" r="20" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="-30" cy="-60" r="10" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="-20" cy="-50" r="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Exclamation in thought bubble -->
    <text x="-50" y="-75" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#e74c3c" text-anchor="middle">!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Frame 5: Young traveler -->
  <g id="youngTraveler" transform="translate(112.5, 665)">

    <rect x="-112.5" y="-133" width="225" height="266" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Young traveler body -->
    <rect x="-30" y="-20" width="60" height="120" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#d35400"/>

    <path d="M-30,-20 L30,-20 L25,30 L-25,30 Z" fill="#e67e22"/>

    <path d="M35,-50 Q40,-30 30,-30 L20,-30 L20,-50 Q20,-60 30,-60 Q35,-60 35,-50 Z" fill="#7f8c8d"/>
    <path d="M-20,-55 L20,-55" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="5"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->

    <ellipse cx="12" cy="-55" rx="5" ry="6" fill="#2c3e50"/>

    <path d="M-10,-35 L10,-35" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Looking at phone -->

    <rect x="-15" y="45" width="30" height="40" fill="#3498db"/>
    <rect x="-10" y="90" width="20" height="5" rx="2.5" ry="2.5" fill="#ecf0f1"/>
    
    <!-- Thought bubble with loading icon -->
    <circle cx="50" cy="-80" r="20" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="30" cy="-60" r="10" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="20" cy="-50" r="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Loading spinner in thought bubble -->
    <g transform="translate(50, -80)">
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="10" fill="none" stroke="#3498db" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="40 60" stroke-dashoffset="0">
        <animateTransform
          attributeName="transform"
          type="rotate"
          from="0 0 0"
          to="360 0 0"
          dur="1s"
          repeatCount="indefinite"
        />
      </circle>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Frame 6: Child passenger -->
  <g id="childPassenger" transform="translate(337.5, 665)">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect x="-112.5" y="-133" width="225" height="266" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    
    <!-- Child passenger body -->
    <rect x="-25" y="-10" width="50" height="90" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#f1c40f"/>
    
    <!-- Shirt -->
    <rect x="-20" y="-10" width="40" height="60" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#f39c12"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="10" r="10" fill="#e67e22"/>
    <text x="0" y="13" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">5</text>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-40" r="25" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-20,-50 Q0,-70 20,-50" fill="#e67e22"/>
    <path d="M-20,-50 Q0,-60 20,-50" fill="#d35400"/>
    
    <!-- Face -->
    <ellipse cx="-10" cy="-45" rx="4" ry="5" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <ellipse cx="10" cy="-45" rx="4" ry="5" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M-5,-30 Q0,-25 5,-30" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Impatient/curious expression -->
    <path d="M-14,-55 Q-10,-58 -6,-55" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M6,-55 Q10,-58 14,-55" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>

    <rect x="-45" y="0" width="20" height="12" rx="6" ry="6" fill="#f39c12"/>
    <rect x="25" y="0" width="20" height="12" rx="6" ry="6" fill="#f39c12"/>

    <animateTransform

      values="337.5,665; 339.5,663; 337.5,667; 335.5,665; 337.5,665"
      dur="0.8s"
      repeatCount="indefinite"
    />
    
    <!-- Thought bubble with airplane -->
    <circle cx="-50" cy="-80" r="20" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="-30" cy="-60" r="10" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="-20" cy="-50" r="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Simple airplane in thought bubble -->
    <g transform="translate(-50, -80) scale(0.5) rotate(45)">
      <path d="M-20,0 L20,0 L10,5 L-10,5 Z" fill="#3498db"/>
      <rect x="-5" y="-20" width="10" height="40" fill="#3498db"/>
      <path d="M-20,-10 L-5,-5 L-5,5 L-20,10 Z" fill="#3498db"/>
      <path d="M20,-10 L5,-5 L5,5 L20,10 Z" fill="#3498db"/>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Ticking clock overlay -->
  <g id="tickingClock" transform="translate(225, 400)">
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="50" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.1" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="45" fill="none" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Clock numbers -->
    <text x="0" y="-30" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">12</text>
    <text x="30" y="0" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">3</text>
    <text x="0" y="30" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">6</text>
    <text x="-30" y="0" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">9</text>
    
    <!-- Clock hands -->
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="-25" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2">
      <animateTransform
        attributeName="transform"
        type="rotate"
        from="0 0 0"
        to="360 0 0"
        dur="60s"
        repeatCount="indefinite"
      />
    </line>
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="20" y2="0" stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="2">
      <animateTransform
        attributeName="transform"
        type="rotate"
        from="0 0 0"
        to="360 0 0"
        dur="5s"
        repeatCount="indefinite"
      />
    </line>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="3" fill="#ffffff"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- "Mounting Pressure" text -->
  <text x="225" y="780" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">MOUNTING PRESSURE</text>
  
  <!-- Vignette effect -->
  <radialGradient id="vignette" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="75%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="85%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#vignette)"/>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background - Airplane interior -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="floorGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2c3e50"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#1a1a2e"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="wallGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#1a1a2e"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2a3b4d"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <filter id="shadowEffect">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background fill -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="#1a1a2e"/>
  
  <!-- Airplane floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="200" fill="url(#floorGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Carpet texture pattern -->
  <pattern id="carpet" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="20" height="20">
    <rect width="20" height="20" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M0,0 L20,20 M20,0 L0,20" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="1" stroke-opacity="0.4"/>
  </pattern>
  <rect x="75" y="600" width="300" height="200" fill="url(#carpet)"/>
  
  <!-- Airplane walls -->
  <path d="M0,0 L0,600 L75,600 L75,100 C75,50 100,0 150,0 L300,0 C350,0 375,50 375,100 L375,600 L450,600 L450,0 Z" fill="url(#wallGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Ceiling lights -->
  <rect x="215" y="50" width="20" height="550" fill="#e0e0e0" rx="2" ry="2" opacity="0.7"/>
  <rect x="210" y="50" width="30" height="550" fill="#ffffff" opacity="0.1"/>
  
  <!-- Overhead bins -->
  <rect x="75" y="150" width="125" height="80" fill="#1e2b3a" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="2" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  <rect x="250" y="150" width="125" height="80" fill="#1e2b3a" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="2" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  
  <!-- Open overhead bin -->
  <rect x="75" y="250" width="125" height="20" fill="#1e2b3a" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="2" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  <path d="M75,250 L75,330 L200,330 L200,250 Z" fill="#121a24" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="2"/>
  <rect x="75" y="250" width="125" height="20" fill="#1c2733" opacity="0.8"/>
  
  <!-- Interior of open bin with lighting effect -->
  <rect x="78" y="273" width="119" height="54" fill="#0e131a" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  <rect x="80" y="275" width="115" height="50" fill="#121a24" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  
  <!-- Place Luggage Here sticker -->
  <rect x="112" y="300" width="50" height="15" fill="#3498db" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  <text x="137" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="6" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">PLACE LUGGAGE HERE</text>
  
  <!-- Bin handles -->
  <rect x="135" y="190" width="30" height="5" fill="#34495e" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  <rect x="310" y="190" width="30" height="5" fill="#34495e" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  <rect x="135" y="290" width="30" height="5" fill="#34495e" rx="2" ry="2"/>
  
  <!-- Seat outlines -->
  <rect x="30" y="550" width="40" height="50" fill="#2c3e50" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="1" rx="3" ry="3"/>
  <rect x="380" y="550" width="40" height="50" fill="#2c3e50" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="1" rx="3" ry="3"/>
  
  <!-- The vintage suitcase -->
  <g id="vintage-suitcase" transform="translate(225, 650)">
    <!-- Main body of suitcase -->
    <rect x="-75" y="-50" width="150" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#8B4513" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="3"/>
    
    <!-- Worn leather texture -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="20" height="20">
      <rect width="20" height="20" fill="#8B4513"/>
      <path d="M0,10 Q10,0 20,10 Q10,20 0,10" fill="#7C3C0C" opacity="0.3"/>
      <path d="M10,0 Q20,10 10,20 Q0,10 10,0" fill="#9A5D2D" opacity="0.3"/>
      <circle cx="10" cy="10" r="2" fill="#6D351D" opacity="0.4"/>
    </pattern>
    <rect x="-72" y="-47" width="144" height="94" rx="8" ry="8" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Decorative strips -->
    <rect x="-75" y="-25" width="150" height="5" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <rect x="-75" y="20" width="150" height="5" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    
    <!-- Center divide -->
    <rect x="-2.5" y="-50" width="5" height="100" fill="#6D351D" stroke="#5D2906" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    
    <!-- Brass corners -->
    <circle cx="-65" cy="-40" r="5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="65" cy="-40" r="5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="-65" cy="40" r="5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="65" cy="40" r="5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    
    <!-- Brass buckles -->
    <rect x="-50" y="-7.5" width="15" height="15" rx="2.5" ry="2.5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="35" y="-7.5" width="15" height="15" rx="2.5" ry="2.5" fill="#D4AF37" stroke="#AA8C2C" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="-47.5" y="-5" width="10" height="10" rx="1.5" ry="1.5" fill="#AA8C2C"/>
    <rect x="37.5" y="-5" width="10" height="10" rx="1.5" ry="1.5" fill="#AA8C2C"/>
    <path d="M-42.5,-2.5 L-42.5,2.5" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <path d="M42.5,-2.5 L42.5,2.5" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Main handle -->
    <path d="M-25,-50 Q0,-65 25,-50" fill="none" stroke="#6D351D" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M-22.5,-50 Q0,-62.5 22.5,-50" fill="none" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Handle shine -->
    <path d="M-15,-55 Q0,-62.5 15,-55" fill="none" stroke="#D4AF37" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.7"/>
    
    <!-- Travel stickers (simplified) -->
    <rect x="-60" y="-35" width="25" height="17.5" rx="1" ry="1" fill="#3498db" stroke="#2980b9" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <rect x="35" y="-40" width="27.5" height="20" rx="1" ry="1" fill="#e74c3c" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="0.5" transform="rotate(5, 48.75, -30)"/>
    <rect x="-45" y="25" width="30" height="15" rx="1" ry="1" fill="#2ecc71" stroke="#27ae60" stroke-width="0.5" transform="rotate(-2.5, -30, 32.5)"/>
    <rect x="20" y="22.5" width="25" height="17.5" rx="1" ry="1" fill="#f39c12" stroke="#d35400" stroke-width="0.5" transform="rotate(7.5, 32.5, 31.25)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character in lifting position -->
  <g id="player">
    <!-- Legs bent -->
    <rect x="210" y="620" width="12" height="50" fill="#2c3e50" rx="6" ry="6" transform="rotate(15, 210, 620)"/>
    <rect x="228" y="620" width="12" height="50" fill="#2c3e50" rx="6" ry="6" transform="rotate(-15, 228, 620)"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="670" rx="12" ry="6" fill="#1a1a1a"/>
    <ellipse cx="250" cy="670" rx="12" ry="6" fill="#1a1a1a"/>
    
    <!-- Body with back straight -->
    <rect x="210" y="550" width="30" height="70" fill="#3498db" rx="8" ry="8"/>
    
    <!-- Arms gripping suitcase -->
    <rect x="195" y="550" width="15" height="50" fill="#3498db" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" transform="rotate(-15, 195, 550)"/>
    <rect x="240" y="550" width="15" height="50" fill="#3498db" rx="7.5" ry="7.5" transform="rotate(15, 240, 550)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands on suitcase handles -->
    <circle cx="185" cy="590" r="8" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    <circle cx="265" cy="590" r="8" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="225" cy="530" r="20" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M205,525 Q225,505 245,525" fill="#4a2c0f"/>
    <path d="M205,525 Q225,515 245,525" fill="#4a2c0f"/>
    
    <!-- Face with determined expression -->
    <ellipse cx="215" cy="525" rx="3" ry="4" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <ellipse cx="235" cy="525" rx="3" ry="4" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M215,535 Q225,540 235,535" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows showing determination -->
    <path d="M212,520 L218,518" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <path d="M232,520 L238,518" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Slight uncertainty in eyes -->
    <circle cx="215" cy="525" r="1" fill="#ffffff"/>
    <circle cx="235" cy="525" r="1" fill="#ffffff"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dotted line trajectory -->
  <path d="M225,600 C225,500 175,400 137,300" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" fill="none"/>
  
  <!-- Arrow at end of trajectory -->
  <polygon points="137,300 132,310 142,310" fill="#ffffff"/>
  
  <!-- Queue of passengers behind -->
  
  <!-- First passenger -->
  <g transform="translate(300, 700)" opacity="0.9">
    <rect x="-15" y="-50" width="30" height="70" fill="#34495e" rx="5" ry="5"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="-65" r="15" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    <ellipse cx="-5" cy="-67" rx="2" ry="3" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <ellipse cx="5" cy="-67" rx="2" ry="3" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M-5,-60 L5,-60" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="-10" y="-50" width="20" height="30" fill="#ecf0f1"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Second passenger -->
  <g transform="translate(330, 730)" opacity="0.85">
    <rect x="-15" y="-50" width="30" height="70" fill="#8e44ad" rx="5" ry="5"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="-65" r="15" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    <ellipse cx="-5" cy="-67" rx="2" ry="3" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <ellipse cx="5" cy="-67" rx="2" ry="3" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M-5,-60 Q0,-58 5,-60" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Third passenger -->
  <g transform="translate(360, 760)" opacity="0.8">
    <rect x="-15" y="-50" width="30" height="70" fill="#16a085" rx="5" ry="5"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="-65" r="15" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
    <ellipse cx="-5" cy="-67" rx="2" ry="3" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <ellipse cx="5" cy="-67" rx="2" ry="3" fill="#2c3e50"/>
    <path d="M-5,-60 L5,-60" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Fourth passenger -->
  <g transform="translate(390, 790)" opacity="0.75">
    <rect x="-15" y="-50" width="30" height="70" fill="#d35400" rx="5" ry="5"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="-65" r="15" fill="#e8d0b0"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- More passengers extending beyond frame (just hints) -->
  <g transform="translate(420, 820)" opacity="0.6">
    <rect x="-15" y="-50" width="30" height="30" fill="#7f8c8d" rx="5" ry="5"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Strength meter in corner -->
  <g transform="translate(50, 750)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="100" height="20" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#34495e" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="50" y="15" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ecf0f1" text-anchor="middle">STRENGTH</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Vignette effect -->
  <radialGradient id="vignette" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="65%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="85%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#vignette)"/>
</svg>
