  <!-- Doorway size comparison visual -->

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Skin gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Sweat droplet -->
    <linearGradient id="sweatGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.9"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Glow for phone -->
    <radialGradient id="phoneGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#80C9FF" stop-opacity="0.8"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#80C9FF" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </radialGradient>
    
    <!-- Hallway light -->
    <linearGradient id="hallwayLight" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F8F8FF" stop-opacity="0.1"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#F8F8FF" stop-opacity="0.3"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#F8F8FF" stop-opacity="0.1"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Anxiety lines filter -->
    <filter id="anxietyLines" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" seed="5" />
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="2" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background hallway -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="#E8E3D9"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway perspective -->
  <polygon points="100,200 350,200 300,600 150,600" fill="#D9CDB8"/>
  <polygon points="100,200 150,600 150,800 100,800" fill="#D1C5B0"/>
  <polygon points="350,200 300,600 300,800 350,800" fill="#D1C5B0"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway floor -->
  <polygon points="150,600 300,600 300,800 150,800" fill="#C9B797"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway lighting effect -->
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="250" height="600" fill="url(#hallwayLight)" opacity="0.5"/>
  
  <!-- Alex's face close-up -->
  <g id="alexFace">
    <!-- Head shape -->
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="400" rx="150" ry="180" fill="url(#skinGradient)"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M75,400 Q225,200 375,400" fill="#000000"/>
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="300" rx="150" ry="100" fill="#000000"/>
    
    <!-- Forehead worry lines -->
    <path d="M150,250 Q225,270 300,250" fill="none" stroke="#D2B48C" stroke-width="2"/>

      <ellipse cx="330" cy="300" rx="8" ry="12" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>

      <ellipse cx="310" cy="280" rx="6" ry="10" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Cheek stress lines -->
    <path d="M150,400 Q160,410 150,420" fill="none" stroke="#D2B48C" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M300,400 Q290,410 300,420" fill="none" stroke="#D2B48C" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Ear left -->
    <path d="M75,350 Q65,375 75,400 Q85,425 95,400 Q105,380 95,360 Z" fill="url(#skinGradient)" stroke="#D2B48C" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M80,365 Q75,375 80,385" fill="none" stroke="#D2B48C" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Ear right -->
    <path d="M375,350 Q385,375 375,400 Q365,425 355,400 Q345,380 355,360 Z" fill="url(#skinGradient)" stroke="#D2B48C" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M370,365 Q375,375 370,385" fill="none" stroke="#D2B48C" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M175,500 L175,550 L275,550 L275,500" fill="url(#skinGradient)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Phone in hand (partially visible) -->
  <g id="phone">
    <rect x="150" y="550" width="150" height="200" rx="10" fill="#1A1A1A" filter="url(#shadow)"/>
    <rect x="160" y="570" width="130" height="160" rx="5" fill="#80C9FF"/>
    <circle cx="225" cy="550" r="10" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="225" cy="550" r="100" fill="url(#phoneGlow)" opacity="0.2"/>

    <rect x="180" y="590" width="90" height="20" fill="white" opacity="0.9"/>

    <rect x="170" y="620" width="110" height="100" fill="white" opacity="0.7"/>
    <line x1="180" y1="640" x2="270" y2="640" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="180" y1="660" x2="270" y2="660" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="180" y1="680" x2="270" y2="680" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="180" y1="700" x2="270" y2="700" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <text x="175" y="635" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#1A1A1A"> Pack boxes</text>
    <text x="175" y="655" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#1A1A1A"> Rent truck</text>
    <text x="175" y="675" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#1A1A1A"> Load small items</text>
    <text x="175" y="695" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#1A1A1A"> Move sofa</text>
    <text x="175" y="715" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#FF0000" font-weight="bold">!! MEASURE DOORWAYS !!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Hallway details in background (blurred) -->
  <g opacity="0.3" filter="url(#shadow)">
    <!-- Door frame -->
    <rect x="120" y="300" width="60" height="150" fill="#A68B5B"/>
    <rect x="130" y="310" width="40" height="140" fill="#C19A6B"/>
    
    <!-- Door number -->
    <rect x="145" y="290" width="20" height="10" fill="#B8860B"/>
    <text x="155" y="298" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">504</text>
    
    <!-- Door handle -->
    <circle cx="160" cy="380" r="5" fill="#B8860B"/>
    
    <!-- Wall sconce -->

    <path d="M245,250 L275,250 L265,230 L255,230 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    <ellipse cx="260" cy="240" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.7"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Light reflection in eyes -->
  <circle cx="170" cy="345" r="3" fill="white" opacity="0.7"/>
  <circle cx="270" cy="345" r="3" fill="white" opacity="0.7"/>
  
  <!-- Anxiety lines around face -->
  <g opacity="0.2" filter="url(#anxietyLines)">
    <path d="M50,350 L85,350" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M40,370 L85,370" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M45,390 L85,390" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <path d="M365,350 L400,350" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M365,370 L410,370" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M365,390 L405,390" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dramatic lighting effect -->
  <circle cx="225" cy="350" r="150" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.05"/>
  
  <!-- Thought bubble (subtle) -->
  <g opacity="0.4">
    <circle cx="350" cy="250" r="10" fill="white" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="330" cy="230" r="15" fill="white" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    <circle cx="300" cy="200" r="25" fill="white" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa silhouette in thought bubble -->
    <rect x="280" y="190" width="40" height="20" rx="5" fill="#8B0000" opacity="0.5"/>
    <rect x="275" y="195" width="50" height="10" rx="5" fill="#8B0000" opacity="0.7"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Vignette effect -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#hallwayLight)" opacity="0.1"/>
  
  <!-- Radial vignette -->
  <radialGradient id="vignette" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="65%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0"/>
    <stop offset="90%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#vignette)"/>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Leather texture for sofa -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="50" height="50">
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="20" fill="#800000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="15" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="10" fill="#800000"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Sofa button pattern -->
    <pattern id="sofaButtons" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Highlights for leather -->
    <linearGradient id="leatherHighlight" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#A52A2A" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#8B0000" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#800000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Floor texture -->
    <pattern id="woodFloor" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="20">
      <rect width="100" height="20" fill="#DEB887"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="100" y2="0" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="20" x2="100" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="25" y1="0" x2="25" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="50" y1="0" x2="50" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="75" y1="0" x2="75" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Wall texture -->
    <pattern id="wallTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#F5F5F5"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#EAEAEA" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Sweat droplet -->
    <linearGradient id="sweatGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.9"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Skin gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Muscle strain effect -->
    <filter id="muscleStrain">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.01" numOctaves="1" seed="5"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="2"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background wall -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="650" width="450" height="150" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- Apartment doorway -->
  <rect x="100" y="100" width="250" height="550" fill="#D9CDB8" stroke="#A68B5B" stroke-width="4"/>
  <rect x="125" y="125" width="200" height="525" fill="#2F2F2F"/>
  
  <!-- The burgundy leather sofa -->
  <g id="sofa" filter="url(#shadow)">
    <!-- Main sofa body -->
    <rect x="75" y="400" width="300" height="150" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa back -->
    <rect x="75" y="350" width="300" height="70" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="80" y="355" width="290" height="60" rx="8" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa arms -->
    <rect x="75" y="350" width="50" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="325" y="350" width="50" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa cushions -->
    <rect x="135" y="410" width="80" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="235" y="410" width="80" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Cushion details -->
    <rect x="135" y="410" width="80" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    <rect x="235" y="410" width="80" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa feet -->
    <rect x="90" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="340" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="175" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="255" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Leather highlights -->
    <rect x="75" y="350" width="300" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherHighlight)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Seam details -->
    <line x1="135" y1="410" x2="215" y2="410" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="235" y1="410" x2="315" y2="410" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="125" y1="350" x2="125" y2="550" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="325" y1="350" x2="325" y2="550" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player Character (crouching at heavier end) -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Legs in crouching position -->
    <path d="M50,650 Q75,600 100,650" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    <path d="M100,650 Q125,600 150,650" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="40" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#000000" rx="5"/>
    <rect x="130" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#000000" rx="5"/>
    
    <!-- Torso (bent forward) -->
    <path d="M75,500 L125,500 L125,600 L75,600 Z" fill="#555555"/>
    
    <!-- Arms positioned under sofa -->
    <path d="M75,500 Q50,525 75,550" fill="#555555" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    <path d="M125,500 Q150,525 125,550" fill="#555555" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands under sofa -->
    <ellipse cx="75" cy="550" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    <ellipse cx="125" cy="550" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Neck (strained) -->
    <path d="M90,470 L110,470 L110,500 L90,500 Z" fill="#FFDAB9" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Head (looking down at sofa) -->
    <ellipse cx="100" cy="450" rx="25" ry="30" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M75,440 Q100,420 125,440" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <ellipse cx="100" cy="430" rx="25" ry="15" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="90" cy="450" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="110" cy="450" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="90" cy="450" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="110" cy="450" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (strained) -->
    <path d="M80,440 L95,435" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M105,435 L120,440" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (strain) -->
    <path d="M90,465 Q100,470 110,465" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Strain lines -->
    <path d="M80,430 L85,435" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <path d="M120,430 L115,435" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <path d="M75,500 L80,510" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="0.5" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    <path d="M125,500 L120,510" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="0.5" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Sweat -->
    <ellipse cx="75" cy="445" rx="5" ry="7" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
    <ellipse cx="125" cy="445" rx="5" ry="7" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Alex (at lighter end) -->
  <g id="alex">
    <!-- Legs in position -->
    <path d="M300,650 Q325,600 350,650" fill="#4B0082"/>
    <path d="M350,650 Q375,600 400,650" fill="#4B0082"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="290" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#8B4513" rx="5"/>
    <rect x="380" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#8B4513" rx="5"/>
    
    <!-- Torso (bent forward) -->
    <path d="M325,520 L375,520 L375,600 L325,600 Z" fill="#32CD32"/>
    
    <!-- Arms gripping sofa -->
    <path d="M325,520 Q300,540 325,560" fill="#32CD32" stroke="#228B22" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    <path d="M375,520 Q400,540 375,560" fill="#32CD32" stroke="#228B22" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands gripping sofa -->
    <ellipse cx="325" cy="560" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    <ellipse cx="375" cy="560" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M340,490 L360,490 L360,520 L340,520 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <ellipse cx="350" cy="470" rx="20" ry="25" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M330,460 Q350,440 370,460" fill="#000000"/>
    <ellipse cx="350" cy="450" rx="20" ry="15" fill="#000000"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="340" cy="470" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="470" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="340" cy="470" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="360" cy="470" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (strained) -->
    <path d="M330,455 L345,450" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M355,450 L370,455" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (strain) -->
    <path d="M340,485 Q350,490 360,485" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Sweat beads -->
    <ellipse cx="330" cy="455" rx="3" ry="5" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
    <ellipse cx="370" cy="455" rx="3" ry="5" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
    <ellipse cx="350" cy="440" rx="4" ry="6" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Count of three indicators -->
  <g id="countOfThree" opacity="0.7">
    <circle cx="225" cy="300" r="30" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="225" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#1A1A1A" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">3</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Positioning guides (subtle) -->
  <line x1="100" y1="550" x2="350" y2="550" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <line x1="100" y1="350" x2="100" y2="650" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <line x1="350" y1="350" x2="350" y2="650" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  
  <!-- Force/effort indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.5">
    <path d="M50,500 L75,500" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="5,3">
      <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="8" to="0" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M125,500 L150,500" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="5,3">
      <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="8" to="0" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M300,520 L325,520" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3">
      <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="8" to="0" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M375,520 L400,520" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3">
      <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" from="8" to="0" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Muscle tension indicators -->
  <path d="M75,525 Q100,500 125,525" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1" fill="none" opacity="0.3"/>
  <path d="M325,535 Q350,510 375,535" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1" fill="none" opacity="0.3"/>
  
  <!-- Room details -->
  <!-- Light fixture -->
  <circle cx="225" cy="100" r="30" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.3"/>
  <path d="M215,50 L235,50 L230,100 L220,100 Z" fill="#B8B8B8" stroke="#A9A9A9" stroke-width="1"/>
  <line x1="225" y1="0" x2="225" y2="50" stroke="#A9A9A9" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Light effect -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="400" rx="200" ry="300" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.05"/>
  
  <!-- Doorway details -->
  <rect x="100" y="100" width="250" height="4" fill="#A68B5B"/>
  <rect x="100" y="100" width="4" height="550" fill="#A68B5B"/>
  <rect x="346" y="100" width="4" height="550" fill="#A68B5B"/>
  <rect x="100" y="646" width="250" height="4" fill="#A68B5B"/>
  
  <!-- Shadows -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="660" rx="50" ry="10" fill="#000000" opacity="0.2"/>
  <ellipse cx="350" cy="660" rx="50" ry="10" fill="#000000" opacity="0.2"/>
  
  <!-- Motion lines for upcoming lift -->

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>

    <!-- Shadow filter -->

    <!-- Sweat droplet -->

    <!-- Muscle strain effect -->

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

    <!-- Wall texture -->

      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#F5F5F5"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#EAEAEA" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Hallway wall texture -->
    <pattern id="hallwayTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#E8E3D9"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#DFD8CC" opacity="0.5"/>

    <!-- Shadow filter -->

    <!-- Sweat droplet -->

    <!-- Relief expression -->

  <!-- Neighbor peeking out (from above view) -->

    <ellipse cx="330" cy="255" rx="3" ry="2" fill="white"/> <!-- Eye -->
  </g>
  
  <!-- Hallway details -->
  <!-- Baseboard trim -->

  <rect x="295" y="0" width="5" height="800" fill="#8B7355"/>

  <rect x="150" y="500" width="20" height="100" fill="#A68B5B"/>

  <!-- Clearance indicators -->

  </g>
  
  <!-- Measurement guides -->

    <line x1="155" y1="370" x2="165" y2="370" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="155" y1="430" x2="165" y2="430" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="145" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(90, 145, 400)">36"</text>
    
    <line x1="290" y1="370" x2="290" y2="430" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="285" y1="370" x2="295" y2="370" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="285" y1="430" x2="295" y2="430" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="305" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(90, 305, 400)">36"</text>
    
    <line x1="175" y1="450" x2="275" y2="450" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="175" y1="445" x2="175" y2="455" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="275" y1="445" x2="275" y2="455" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="225" y="465" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle">84" (vertical)</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Direction arrows -->
  <g opacity="0.5">

  <!-- Light beams -->

  <polygon points="225,400 150,500 300,500" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.1"/>

</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Wall texture -->
    <pattern id="wallTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#E8E3D9"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#DFD8CC" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Floor texture -->
    <pattern id="floorPattern" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#D2C0A0"/>
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="#C9B797"/>
      <rect x="50" y="50" width="50" height="50" fill="#C9B797"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Dramatic lighting effects -->
    <radialGradient id="cornerSpotlight" cx="225" cy="400" r="300" fx="225" fy="400">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.3"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </radialGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="dramaticShadow" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0.3"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Glow filter for ominous corner -->
    <filter id="cornerGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="5" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="blur" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Skin gradient -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="200" fill="url(#floorPattern)"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway walls -->
  <polygon points="0,0 0,800 150,600 150,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  <polygon points="450,0 450,800 300,600 300,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway floor -->
  <polygon points="150,600 300,600 300,800 150,800" fill="url(#floorPattern)"/>
  
  <!-- Baseboard trim -->
  <polygon points="0,600 150,600 150,610 0,610" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="450,600 300,600 300,610 450,610" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <rect x="150" y="600" width="150" height="10" fill="#8B7355"/>
  
  <!-- The dramatic corner -->
  <g id="dramaticCorner">
    <!-- Corner wall -->
    <polygon points="225,0 225,600 300,600 450,450 450,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)" opacity="0.95"/>
    
    <!-- Corner edge highlight -->
    <line x1="225" y1="0" x2="225" y2="600" stroke="#ADA08C" stroke-width="3"/>
    
    <!-- Dramatic shadow on corner -->
    <polygon points="225,0 225,600 300,600 450,450 450,0" fill="url(#dramaticShadow)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Corner glow effect -->
    <line x1="225" y1="0" x2="225" y2="600" stroke="#ADA08C" stroke-width="5" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#cornerGlow)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dramatic low-angle lighting -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" fill="url(#cornerSpotlight)" opacity="0.5"/>
  
  <!-- Fluorescent ceiling light -->
  <rect x="175" y="100" width="100" height="30" rx="5" fill="#F5F5F5" stroke="#CCCCCC" stroke-width="1"/>
  <rect x="180" y="105" width="90" height="20" rx="3" fill="#FFFFFF"/>
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="115" rx="50" ry="20" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.2"/>
  
  <!-- Light reflections on floor -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="600" rx="100" ry="50" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.1"/>
  
  <!-- Neighbor peeking out -->
  <g id="neighbor">
    <!-- Door frame -->
    <rect x="350" y="300" width="60" height="150" fill="#A68B5B" stroke="#8B7355" stroke-width="2"/>
    <rect x="355" y="305" width="50" height="140" fill="#C19A6B"/>
    
    <!-- Door handle -->
    <circle cx="365" cy="375" r="5" fill="#B8860B"/>
    
    <!-- Door opening slightly -->
    <rect x="355" y="305" width="50" height="140" fill="#2F2F2F" opacity="0.8"/>
    
    <!-- Neighbor's face -->
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="375" rx="15" ry="20" fill="url(#skinGradient)"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M345,365 Q360,350 375,365" fill="#A0522D"/>
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="360" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#A0522D"/>
    
    <!-- Eyes -->
    <ellipse cx="355" cy="370" rx="3" ry="4" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="365" cy="370" rx="3" ry="4" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="355" cy="370" r="1.5" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="365" cy="370" r="1.5" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (skeptical) -->
    <path d="M352,365 L358,363" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M362,363 L368,366" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (skeptical) -->
    <path d="M355,380 Q360,378 365,380" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Door number -->
    <rect x="375" y="290" width="20" height="15" rx="2" fill="#B8860B"/>
    <text x="385" y="302" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">506</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Hallway details -->
  <!-- Wall sconce -->
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="20" height="30" fill="#B87333"/>
  <path d="M95,200 L125,200 L115,180 L105,180 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
  <ellipse cx="110" cy="190" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.7"/>
  
  <!-- Wall art -->
  <rect x="50" y="300" width="60" height="80" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#A68B5B" stroke-width="3" filter="url(#shadow)"/>
  <rect x="55" y="305" width="50" height="70" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
  
  <!-- Fire extinguisher -->
  <rect x="120" y="400" width="30" height="50" fill="#FF0000" stroke="#8B0000" stroke-width="1"/>
  <rect x="130" y="395" width="10" height="5" fill="#8B0000"/>
  <text x="135" y="425" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">FIRE</text>
  
  <!-- Corner warning sign -->
  <polygon points="215,350 235,350 225,330" fill="#FFFF00" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="225" y="347" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#000000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">!</text>
  
  <!-- Dramatic low-angle view of corner -->
  <g id="cornerHighlight">
    <!-- Corner edge dramatic highlight -->
    <line x1="225" y1="0" x2="225" y2="600" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5"/>
    
    <!-- Corner shadow -->
    <polygon points="225,0 225,600 150,600 0,450 0,0" fill="#000000" opacity="0.1"/>
    
    <!-- Corner dramatic lighting -->
    <polygon points="225,0 225,600 300,600 450,450 450,0" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.05"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Perspective lines -->
  <line x1="0" y1="450" x2="150" y2="600" stroke="#ADA08C" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3"/>
  <line x1="450" y1="450" x2="300" y2="600" stroke="#ADA08C" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3"/>
  
  <!-- Floor scuff marks -->
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="600" rx="30" ry="10" fill="#8B4513" opacity="0.1" transform="rotate(-10, 200, 600)"/>
  <ellipse cx="250" cy="600" rx="25" ry="8" fill="#8B4513" opacity="0.1" transform="rotate(15, 250, 600)"/>
  
  <!-- Wall scuff marks -->
  <path d="M220,350 L230,355 L220,360" fill="none" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <path d="M220,400 L230,405 L220,410" fill="none" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.2"/>
  <path d="M220,450 L230,455 L220,460" fill="none" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.2"/>
  
  <!-- Dramatic corner measurement visualization -->
  <g id="cornerMeasurements" opacity="0.4">
    <!-- 90-degree angle indicator -->
    <path d="M225,500 L245,500 A20,20 0 0,0 245,480 L225,480" fill="none" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="255" y="495" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FF0000">90</text>
    
    <!-- Width measurements -->
    <line x1="225" y1="550" x2="300" y2="550" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="260" y="545" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle">36"</text>
    
    <line x1="225" y1="450" x2="150" y2="450" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="190" y="445" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle">36"</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Impossible corner visualization -->
  <g id="impossibleCorner" opacity="0.3">
    <!-- Sofa width indicator -->
    <path d="M175,400 A50,50 0 0,0 225,350 A50,50 0 0,0 275,400" fill="none" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="225" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle">84"</text>
    
    <!-- Impossible path indicator -->
    <path d="M150,500 Q225,450 300,500" fill="none" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="10,10"/>
    <text x="225" y="470" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">IMPOSSIBLE?</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dramatic vignette effect -->
  <radialGradient id="vignette" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="65%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0"/>
    <stop offset="90%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#vignette)"/>
  
  <!-- Dramatic spotlight on corner -->
  <radialGradient id="spotlight" cx="225" cy="400" r="200" fx="225" fy="400">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.2"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#spotlight)"/>
  
  <!-- Corner danger indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.7">
    <!-- Warning signs -->
    <polygon points="215,200 235,200 225,180" fill="#FFFF00" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="225" y="197" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#000000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">!</text>
    
    <polygon points="215,300 235,300 225,280" fill="#FFFF00" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="225" y="297" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#000000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">!</text>
    
    <polygon points="215,400 235,400 225,380" fill="#FFFF00" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="225" y="397" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#000000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">!</text>
    
    <polygon points="215,500 235,500 225,480" fill="#FFFF00" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="225" y="497" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#000000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">!</text>
  </g>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Leather texture for sofa -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="50" height="50">
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="20" fill="#800000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="15" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="10" fill="#800000"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Sofa button pattern -->
    <pattern id="sofaButtons" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Highlights for leather -->
    <linearGradient id="leatherHighlight" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#A52A2A" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#8B0000" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#800000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Floor texture -->
    <pattern id="woodFloor" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="20">
      <rect width="100" height="20" fill="#DEB887"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="100" y2="0" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="20" x2="100" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="25" y1="0" x2="25" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="50" y1="0" x2="50" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="75" y1="0" x2="75" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Wall texture -->
    <pattern id="wallTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#E8E3D9"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#DFD8CC" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Sweat droplet -->
    <linearGradient id="sweatGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.9"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Skin gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Muscle strain effect -->
    <filter id="muscleStrain">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.01" numOctaves="1" seed="5"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="2"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Tension effect -->
    <filter id="tensionBlur">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="0.5" />
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Dramatic lighting -->
    <radialGradient id="dramaticLight" cx="225" cy="400" r="300" fx="225" fy="400">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.4"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background wall -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="650" width="450" height="150" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>

  <polygon points="0,0 0,800 150,650 150,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>

  <!-- Hallway floor -->
  <polygon points="150,650 300,650 300,800 150,800" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- The corner -->
  <line x1="225" y1="0" x2="225" y2="650" stroke="#ADA08C" stroke-width="3"/>
  
  <!-- Baseboard trim -->
  <polygon points="0,650 150,650 150,660 0,660" fill="#8B7355"/>

  <polygon points="150,650 225,650 225,660 150,660" fill="#8B7355"/>

  <!-- The burgundy leather sofa (wedged at corner) -->
  <g id="sofa" filter="url(#shadow)">
    <!-- Main sofa body - wedged at the corner -->
    <rect x="125" y="400" width="250" height="150" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)" transform="rotate(-15, 225, 475)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa back -->
    <rect x="125" y="350" width="250" height="70" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)" transform="rotate(-15, 225, 425)"/>
    <rect x="130" y="355" width="240" height="60" rx="8" fill="url(#leatherTexture)" transform="rotate(-15, 225, 425)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa arms -->
    <rect x="125" y="350" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)" transform="rotate(-15, 145, 450)"/>
    <rect x="335" y="350" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)" transform="rotate(-15, 355, 450)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa cushions -->
    <rect x="175" y="410" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)" transform="rotate(-15, 210, 470)"/>

    <!-- Cushion details -->

    <rect x="255" y="410" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3" transform="rotate(-15, 290, 470)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa feet -->
    <rect x="135" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513" transform="rotate(-15, 145, 555)"/>
    <rect x="325" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513" transform="rotate(-15, 335, 555)"/>
    <rect x="195" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513" transform="rotate(-15, 205, 555)"/>

    <line x1="335" y1="350" x2="335" y2="550" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(-15, 335, 450)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa pressure points and strain -->
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="475" rx="30" ry="20" fill="#600000" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#tensionBlur)"/>
    <ellipse cx="145" cy="450" rx="20" ry="30" fill="#600000" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#tensionBlur)"/>
    <ellipse cx="355" cy="450" rx="20" ry="30" fill="#600000" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#tensionBlur)"/>
    
    <!-- Tension lines -->
    <path d="M225,450 L225,500" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3" opacity="0.5"/>
    <path d="M200,450 L200,500" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3" opacity="0.5"/>
    <path d="M250,450 L250,500" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3" opacity="0.5"/>
    
    <!-- Creaking sound visualization -->
    <g opacity="0.5">

      </path>
      <path d="M225,420 Q235,410 245,420" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1">
        <animate attributeName="d" values="M225,420 Q235,410 245,420;M225,420 Q235,405 245,420;M225,420 Q235,410 245,420" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" begin="0.1s"/>

  <!-- Player Character -->

    <circle cx="80" cy="350" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="100" cy="350" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>

    <!-- Sweat -->

    <ellipse cx="90" cy="320" rx="4" ry="6" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Alex -->
  <g id="alex">

    <path d="M320,650 L350,650 L360,580 L330,580 Z" fill="#4B0082"/>
    <path d="M370,650 L400,650 L390,580 L360,580 Z" fill="#4B0082"/>

    <ellipse cx="325" cy="350" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#F5DEB3" transform="rotate(-20, 325, 350)"/>

    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M345,420 L375,420 L375,450 L345,450 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>

    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M340,390 Q360,370 380,390" fill="#000000"/>
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="380" rx="20" ry="15" fill="#000000"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="350" cy="400" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="370" cy="400" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="350" cy="400" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="370" cy="400" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>

    <path d="M365,380 L380,385" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>

    <ellipse cx="380" cy="385" rx="3" ry="5" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="370" rx="4" ry="6" fill="url(#sweatGradient)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Eye contact between characters -->
  <path d="M100,350 L350,400" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.3"/>
  
  <!-- Neighbor peeking out -->
  <g id="neighbor">

    <rect x="350" y="150" width="60" height="150" fill="#A68B5B" stroke="#8B7355" stroke-width="2"/>
    <rect x="355" y="155" width="50" height="140" fill="#C19A6B"/>
    
    <!-- Door handle -->

    <path d="M362,213 L368,216" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="1"/>

    <path d="M355,230 Q360,228 365,230" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="1"/>

    <path d="M362,225 L368,225" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="0.5"/>

  <!-- Wall sconce -->
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="20" height="30" fill="#B87333"/>
  <path d="M95,200 L125,200 L115,180 L105,180 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
  <ellipse cx="110" cy="190" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.7"/>
  
  <!-- Wall art trembling -->
  <g>
    <rect x="50" y="300" width="60" height="80" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#A68B5B" stroke-width="3" filter="url(#shadow)">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="300;298;302;300" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </rect>
    <rect x="55" y="305" width="50" height="70" fill="#F5DEB3">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="305;303;307;305" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </rect>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dramatic lighting effect -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" fill="url(#dramaticLight)"/>
  
  <!-- Strategic challenge visualization -->
  <g opacity="0.4">
    <!-- Possible solution paths -->
    <path d="M225,400 Q300,350 350,400" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="300" y="365" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#00FF00">Rotate?</text>
    
    <path d="M225,400 Q225,300 300,250" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="260" y="280" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#00FF00">Vertical?</text>
    
    <path d="M225,400 Q175,350 150,400" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="170" y="365" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#00FF00">Back up?</text>
    
    <!-- Current problem indicators -->
    <path d="M225,450 L225,500" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <path d="M150,450 L225,450" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <path d="M225,450 L300,450" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="225" y="520" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">STUCK!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Moment of truth indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.5">
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="200" rx="50" ry="30" fill="#FFFFFF">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.1;0.3;0.1" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>

    <text x="225" y="205" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#000000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">MOMENT OF TRUTH</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Force arrows -->
  <g opacity="0.6">
    <path d="M100,350 L150,375" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.6;1;0.6" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M360,400 L310,425" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrowhead)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.6;1;0.6" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Arrowhead marker -->
  <defs>
    <marker id="arrowhead" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="7" refX="10" refY="3.5" orient="auto">
      <polygon points="0 0, 10 3.5, 0 7" fill="#FF0000"/>
    </marker>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Measurement guides -->
  <g opacity="0.3">
    <line x1="150" y1="600" x2="300" y2="600" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="225" y="595" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">36" hallway</text>
    
    <path d="M125,450 L325,450" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5" transform="rotate(-15, 225, 450)"/>
    <text x="225" y="440" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(-15, 225, 440)">84" sofa</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Game challenge established indicator -->
  <g opacity="0.7">
    <rect x="125" y="700" width="200" height="40" rx="10" fill="#4682B4"/>
    <text x="225" y="725" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">CHALLENGE ESTABLISHED</text>
  </g>
</svg>

    <rect x="335" y="350" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>

    <rect x="255" y="410" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Cushion details -->
