    <rect x="255" y="410" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa feet -->
    <rect x="135" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="325" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="195" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="265" y="550" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Leather highlights -->
    <rect x="125" y="350" width="250" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherHighlight)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Seam details -->
    <line x1="175" y1="410" x2="245" y2="410" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="255" y1="410" x2="325" y2="410" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="165" y1="350" x2="165" y2="550" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="335" y1="350" x2="335" y2="550" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player Character with lightbulb moment -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="50" y="550" width="20" height="100" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    <rect x="80" y="550" width="20" height="100" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="45" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#000000" rx="5"/>
    <rect x="75" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#000000" rx="5"/>
    
    <!-- Torso -->
    <rect x="40" y="400" width="70" height="150" fill="#555555"/>
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="40" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#555555"/>
    <rect x="90" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#555555"/>
    
    <!-- Right arm pointing up (gesture to Alex) -->
    <rect x="90" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#555555" transform="rotate(-45, 100, 400)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <ellipse cx="50" cy="500" rx="10" ry="7" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    <ellipse cx="130" cy="350" rx="10" ry="7" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="60" y="370" width="30" height="30" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <ellipse cx="75" cy="340" rx="25" ry="30" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M50,330 Q75,300 100,330" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <ellipse cx="75" cy="320" rx="25" ry="15" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="65" cy="335" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="85" cy="335" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="65" cy="335" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="85" cy="335" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (raised in realization) -->
    <path d="M60,320 L70,315" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M80,315 L90,320" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (excited) -->
    <path d="M65,350 Q75,360 85,350" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Lightbulb effect above head -->
    <circle cx="75" cy="280" r="15" fill="#FFFF99" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="75" cy="280" r="30" fill="url(#lightbulbGlow)" opacity="0.7" filter="url(#glow)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.7;0.9;0.7" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </circle>
    <path d="M70,280 L80,280 M75,275 L75,285" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M75,295 L75,300" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M72,297 L78,297" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="1"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Alex -->
  <g id="alex">
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="350" y="550" width="20" height="100" fill="#4B0082"/>
    <rect x="380" y="550" width="20" height="100" fill="#4B0082"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="345" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#8B4513" rx="5"/>
    <rect x="375" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#8B4513" rx="5"/>
    
    <!-- Torso -->
    <rect x="340" y="400" width="70" height="150" fill="#32CD32"/>
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="340" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#32CD32"/>
    <rect x="390" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#32CD32"/>
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <ellipse cx="350" cy="500" rx="10" ry="7" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    <ellipse cx="400" cy="500" rx="10" ry="7" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="360" y="370" width="30" height="30" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <ellipse cx="375" cy="340" rx="25" ry="30" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M350,330 Q375,300 400,330" fill="#000000"/>
    <ellipse cx="375" cy="320" rx="25" ry="15" fill="#000000"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="365" cy="335" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="385" cy="335" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="365" cy="335" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="385" cy="335" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (curious) -->
    <path d="M360,325 L370,320" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M380,320 L390,325" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (attentive) -->
    <path d="M365,350 Q375,355 385,350" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Gesture lines from Player to Sofa -->
  <path d="M130,350 Q175,300 225,300" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.7"/>
  <path d="M225,300 Q275,300 325,350" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.7"/>
  
  <!-- Vertical rotation visualization -->
  <g opacity="0.4">
    <path d="M225,400 C225,350 225,300 225,250" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M225,400 C225,350 225,300 225,250;M225,400 C175,350 175,300 175,250;M225,400 C225,350 225,300 225,250" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M225,400 C225,350 225,300 225,250" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" transform="scale(-1,1) translate(-450,0)">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M225,400 C225,350 225,300 225,250;M225,400 C275,350 275,300 275,250;M225,400 C225,350 225,300 225,250" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Idea text -->
  <g opacity="0.9">
    <rect x="125" y="200" width="200" height="40" rx="20" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="225" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#000000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">TURN IT VERTICALLY!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wall sconce -->
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="20" height="30" fill="#B87333"/>
  <path d="M95,200 L125,200 L115,180 L105,180 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
  <ellipse cx="110" cy="190" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.7"/>
  
  <!-- Vertical sofa outline preview -->
  <g opacity="0.3">
    <rect x="200" y="200" width="50" height="300" rx="10" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="225" y="180" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#00FF00" text-anchor="middle">VERTICAL</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Success indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.5">
    <circle cx="75" cy="280" r="40" fill="#00FF00" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#glow)">
      <animate attributeName="r" values="40;50;40" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </circle>
    <circle cx="225" cy="400" r="100" fill="#00FF00" opacity="0.1">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.1;0.2;0.1" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Precise movement indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.6">
    <path d="M125,400 L125,350" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
    <path d="M375,400 L375,350" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
    <path d="M225,350 L225,300" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
    <path d="M225,450 L225,500" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Calculated solution indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.4">
    <rect x="125" y="400" width="250" height="150" rx="10" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5" fill="none"/>
    <text x="250" y="475" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">84" length</text>
    <line x1="125" y1="475" x2="375" y2="475" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    
    <line x1="225" y1="400" x2="225" y2="550" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="240" y="475" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(90, 240, 475)">36" width</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Well-calculated solution text -->
  <g opacity="0.8">
    <rect x="75" y="700" width="300" height="40" rx="20" fill="#4682B4"/>
    <text x="225" y="725" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">A WELL-CALCULATED SOLUTION</text>
  </g>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Leather texture for sofa -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="50" height="50">
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="20" fill="#800000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="15" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="10" fill="#800000"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Sofa button pattern -->
    <pattern id="sofaButtons" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Highlights for leather -->
    <linearGradient id="leatherHighlight" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#A52A2A" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#8B0000" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#800000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Floor texture -->
    <pattern id="woodFloor" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="20">
      <rect width="100" height="20" fill="#DEB887"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="100" y2="0" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="20" x2="100" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="25" y1="0" x2="25" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="50" y1="0" x2="50" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="75" y1="0" x2="75" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Wall texture -->
    <pattern id="wallTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#E8E3D9"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#DFD8CC" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Glow filter -->
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="5" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="blur" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Motion blur -->
    <filter id="motionBlur" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Skin gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Muscle strain effect -->
    <filter id="muscleStrain">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.01" numOctaves="1" seed="5"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="1"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background wall -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="650" width="450" height="150" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway walls -->
  <polygon points="0,0 0,800 150,650 150,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  <polygon points="450,0 450,800 300,650 300,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway floor -->
  <polygon points="150,650 300,650 300,800 150,800" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- The corner -->
  <line x1="225" y1="0" x2="225" y2="650" stroke="#ADA08C" stroke-width="3"/>
  
  <!-- Baseboard trim -->
  <polygon points="0,650 150,650 150,660 0,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="450,650 300,650 300,660 450,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="150,650 225,650 225,660 150,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="225,650 300,650 300,660 225,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  
  <!-- The burgundy leather sofa (rotating to vertical) -->
  <g id="sofa" filter="url(#shadow)" transform="rotate(70, 225, 400)">
    <!-- Main sofa body -->
    <rect x="100" y="325" width="250" height="150" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa back -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="250" height="70" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="105" y="280" width="240" height="60" rx="8" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa arms -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="310" y="275" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa cushions -->
    <rect x="150" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="230" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Cushion details -->
    <rect x="150" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    <rect x="230" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa feet -->
    <rect x="110" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="300" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="170" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="240" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Leather highlights -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="250" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherHighlight)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Seam details -->
    <line x1="150" y1="335" x2="220" y2="335" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="230" y1="335" x2="300" y2="335" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="140" y1="275" x2="140" y2="475" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="310" y1="275" x2="310" y2="475" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion blur effect for rotating sofa -->
  <g opacity="0.2" filter="url(#motionBlur)">
    <rect x="150" y="325" width="150" height="150" rx="10" fill="#8B0000" transform="rotate(40, 225, 400)"/>
    <rect x="175" y="325" width="100" height="150" rx="10" fill="#8B0000" transform="rotate(20, 225, 400)"/>
    <rect x="175" y="325" width="100" height="150" rx="10" fill="#8B0000" transform="rotate(55, 225, 400)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player Character (lifting/rotating sofa) -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Legs in braced position -->
    <path d="M50,650 L80,650 L90,550 L60,550 Z" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    <path d="M100,650 L130,650 L120,550 L90,550 Z" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="40" y="650" width="45" height="15" fill="#000000" rx="5"/>
    <rect x="115" y="650" width="45" height="15" fill="#000000" rx="5"/>
    
    <!-- Torso (lifting stance) -->
    <path d="M60,400 L120,400 L120,550 L60,550 Z" fill="#555555" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Arms lifting sofa -->
    <path d="M60,400 Q40,350 75,300" fill="#555555" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    <path d="M120,400 Q140,350 125,300" fill="#555555" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands on sofa -->
    <ellipse cx="75" cy="300" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#FFDAB9" transform="rotate(-20, 75, 300)"/>
    <ellipse cx="125" cy="300" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#FFDAB9" transform="rotate(20, 125, 300)"/>
    
    <!-- Neck (strained) -->
    <path d="M75,370 L105,370 L105,400 L75,400 Z" fill="#FFDAB9" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Head (looking up at sofa) -->
    <ellipse cx="90" cy="350" rx="25" ry="30" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M65,340 Q90,320 115,340" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <ellipse cx="90" cy="330" rx="25" ry="15" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="80" cy="350" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="100" cy="350" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="80" cy="350" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="100" cy="350" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (focused) -->
    <path d="M70,335 L85,330" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M95,330 L110,335" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (strain) -->
    <path d="M80,365 Q90,375 100,365" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Strain lines -->
    <path d="M65,335 L70,340" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    <path d="M115,335 L110,340" stroke="#1A1A1A" stroke-width="0.5"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Alex (lifting/rotating sofa) -->
  <g id="alex">
    <!-- Legs in braced position -->
    <path d="M320,650 L350,650 L360,580 L330,580 Z" fill="#4B0082"/>
    <path d="M370,650 L400,650 L390,580 L360,580 Z" fill="#4B0082"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="310" y="650" width="45" height="15" fill="#8B4513" rx="5"/>
    <rect x="385" y="650" width="45" height="15" fill="#8B4513" rx="5"/>
    
    <!-- Torso (lifting stance) -->
    <path d="M330,450 L390,450 L390,580 L330,580 Z" fill="#32CD32" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Arms lifting sofa -->
    <path d="M330,450 Q310,400 325,350" fill="#32CD32" stroke="#228B22" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    <path d="M390,450 Q410,400 375,350" fill="#32CD32" stroke="#228B22" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands on sofa -->
    <ellipse cx="325" cy="350" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#F5DEB3" transform="rotate(-20, 325, 350)"/>
    <ellipse cx="375" cy="350" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#F5DEB3" transform="rotate(20, 375, 350)"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M345,420 L375,420 L375,450 L345,450 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Head (looking at sofa) -->
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="400" rx="20" ry="25" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M340,390 Q360,370 380,390" fill="#000000"/>
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="380" rx="20" ry="15" fill="#000000"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="350" cy="400" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="370" cy="400" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="350" cy="400" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="370" cy="400" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (focused) -->
    <path d="M340,385 L355,380" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M365,380 L380,385" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (strain) -->
    <path d="M350,415 Q360,425 370,415" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dynamic action indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.6">
    <!-- Rotation arrows -->
    <path d="M225,300 A100,100 0 0,1 325,400" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="3" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="10,5">
      <animate attributeName="stroke-dashoffset" values="0;15" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <polygon points="325,400 315,385 335,385" fill="#4682B4"/>
    
    <!-- Force indicators -->
    <line x1="90" y1="300" x2="120" y2="280" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2">
      <animate attributeName="x2" values="120;130;120" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
      <animate attributeName="y2" values="280;270;280" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </line>
    <line x1="360" y1="350" x2="330" y2="330" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2">
      <animate attributeName="x2" values="330;320;330" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
      <animate attributeName="y2" values="330;320;330" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </line>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wall sconce -->
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="20" height="30" fill="#B87333"/>
  <path d="M95,200 L125,200 L115,180 L105,180 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
  <ellipse cx="110" cy="190" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.7"/>
  
  <!-- Rotation angle indicator -->
  <g opacity="0.4">
    <path d="M225,400 L225,300" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <path d="M225,400 L325,400" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <path d="M225,400 Q240,370 270,370 Q300,370 325,400" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="270" y="365" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">70</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Effort indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.5">
    <!-- Player character strain lines -->
    <path d="M40,400 L60,400" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="3">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.8;0.5" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M120,400 L140,400" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="3">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.8;0.5" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    
    <!-- Alex strain lines -->
    <path d="M310,450 L330,450" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.8;0.5" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M390,450 L410,450" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.8;0.5" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Success indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.5">
    <circle cx="225" cy="400" r="150" fill="#00FF00" opacity="0.1">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.1;0.2;0.1" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Measurement guides -->
  <g opacity="0.3">
    <line x1="150" y1="600" x2="300" y2="600" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="225" y="595" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">36" hallway</text>
    
    <line x1="225" y1="250" x2="225" y2="550" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="240" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(90, 240, 400)">84" sofa (vertical)</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Directional arrows -->
  <g opacity="0.7">
    <polygon points="225,250 240,270 210,270" fill="#4682B4"/>
    <rect x="215" y="270" width="20" height="40" fill="#4682B4"/>
    <polygon points="225,550 240,530 210,530" fill="#4682B4"/>
    <rect x="215" y="490" width="20" height="40" fill="#4682B4"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Coordinated movement text -->
  <g opacity="0.8">
    <rect x="75" y="700" width="300" height="40" rx="20" fill="#4682B4"/>
    <text x="225" y="725" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">ROTATING TO VERTICAL POSITION</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Leather catching light effect -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="400" rx="125" ry="100" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.1" transform="rotate(70, 225, 400)"/>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Leather texture for sofa -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="50" height="50">
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="20" fill="#800000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="15" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="10" fill="#800000"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Sofa button pattern -->
    <pattern id="sofaButtons" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Highlights for leather -->
    <linearGradient id="leatherHighlight" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#A52A2A" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#8B0000" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#800000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Floor texture -->
    <pattern id="woodFloor" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="20">
      <rect width="100" height="20" fill="#DEB887"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="100" y2="0" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="20" x2="100" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="25" y1="0" x2="25" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="50" y1="0" x2="50" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="75" y1="0" x2="75" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Wall texture -->
    <pattern id="wallTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#E8E3D9"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#DFD8CC" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Glow filter -->
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="5" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="blur" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Skin gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Muscle strain effect -->
    <filter id="muscleStrain">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.01" numOctaves="1" seed="5"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="1"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Success glow -->
    <radialGradient id="successGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#00FF00" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#00FF00" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background wall -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="650" width="450" height="150" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway walls -->
  <polygon points="0,0 0,800 150,650 150,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  <polygon points="450,0 450,800 300,650 300,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway floor -->
  <polygon points="150,650 300,650 300,800 150,800" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- The corner -->
  <line x1="225" y1="0" x2="225" y2="650" stroke="#ADA08C" stroke-width="3"/>
  
  <!-- Baseboard trim -->
  <polygon points="0,650 150,650 150,660 0,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="450,650 300,650 300,660 450,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="150,650 225,650 225,660 150,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="225,650 300,650 300,660 225,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  
  <!-- The burgundy leather sofa (now vertical and passing through the corner) -->
  <g id="sofa" filter="url(#shadow)" transform="rotate(90, 225, 400)">
    <!-- Main sofa body -->
    <rect x="100" y="325" width="250" height="150" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa back -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="250" height="70" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="105" y="280" width="240" height="60" rx="8" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa arms -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="310" y="275" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa cushions -->
    <rect x="150" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="230" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Cushion details -->
    <rect x="150" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    <rect x="230" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa feet -->
    <rect x="110" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="300" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="170" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="240" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Leather highlights -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="250" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherHighlight)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Seam details -->
    <line x1="150" y1="335" x2="220" y2="335" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="230" y1="335" x2="300" y2="335" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="140" y1="275" x2="140" y2="475" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="310" y1="275" x2="310" y2="475" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player Character (navigating the corner) -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Legs in walking position -->
    <rect x="160" y="550" width="20" height="100" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    <rect x="190" y="550" width="20" height="100" fill="#1E90FF" transform="rotate(15, 200, 650)"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="155" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#000000" rx="5"/>
    <rect x="185" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#000000" rx="5" transform="rotate(15, 200, 650)"/>
    
    <!-- Torso (moving stance) -->
    <rect x="150" y="400" width="70" height="150" fill="#555555"/>
    
    <!-- Arms guiding sofa -->
    <rect x="150" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#555555" transform="rotate(-15, 160, 400)"/>
    <rect x="200" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#555555" transform="rotate(15, 210, 400)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands on sofa -->
    <ellipse cx="145" cy="310" rx="10" ry="7" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="310" rx="10" ry="7" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="170" y="370" width="30" height="30" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Head (looking at the corner) -->
    <ellipse cx="185" cy="340" rx="25" ry="30" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M160,330 Q185,300 210,330" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <ellipse cx="185" cy="320" rx="25" ry="15" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="175" cy="335" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="195" cy="335" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="175" cy="335" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="195" cy="335" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (focused) -->
    <path d="M170,325 L180,320" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M190,320 L200,325" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (focused) -->
    <path d="M175,350 Q185,355 195,350" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Alex (at the other end, looking surprised/relieved) -->
  <g id="alex">
    <!-- Legs in walking position -->
    <rect x="240" y="550" width="20" height="100" fill="#4B0082"/>
    <rect x="270" y="550" width="20" height="100" fill="#4B0082" transform="rotate(-15, 280, 650)"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="235" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#8B4513" rx="5"/>
    <rect x="265" y="650" width="30" height="10" fill="#8B4513" rx="5" transform="rotate(-15, 280, 650)"/>
    
    <!-- Torso -->
    <rect x="230" y="400" width="70" height="150" fill="#32CD32"/>
    
    <!-- Arms guiding sofa -->
    <rect x="230" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#32CD32" transform="rotate(-15, 240, 400)"/>
    <rect x="280" y="400" width="20" height="100" rx="10" fill="#32CD32" transform="rotate(15, 290, 400)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands on sofa -->
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="310" rx="10" ry="7" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    <ellipse cx="305" cy="310" rx="10" ry="7" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="250" y="370" width="30" height="30" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Head (looking surprised) -->
    <ellipse cx="265" cy="340" rx="20" ry="25" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M245,330 Q265,300 285,330" fill="#000000"/>
    <ellipse cx="265" cy="320" rx="20" ry="15" fill="#000000"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="255" cy="335" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="275" cy="335" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="255" cy="335" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="275" cy="335" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (surprised) -->
    <path d="M250,320 L260,315" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M270,315 L280,320" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (surprised relief) -->
    <path d="M255,350 Q265,360 275,350" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wall sconce -->
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="20" height="30" fill="#B87333"/>
  <path d="M95,200 L125,200 L115,180 L105,180 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
  <ellipse cx="110" cy="190" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.7"/>
  
  <!-- Window at end of hall (light source) -->
  <rect x="175" y="50" width="100" height="120" fill="#87CEEB" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="5"/>
  <line x1="225" y1="50" x2="225" y2="170" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="5"/>
  <line x1="175" y1="110" x2="275" y2="110" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="5"/>
  
  <!-- Sunlight streaming through window -->
  <polygon points="175,50 275,50 300,200 150,200" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.2"/>
  <polygon points="175,170 275,170 300,300 150,300" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.1"/>
  
  <!-- Clearance visualization -->
  <g opacity="0.4">
    <!-- Narrowest point -->
    <rect x="215" y="225" width="20" height="350" fill="#00FF00" opacity="0.2"/>
    <line x1="215" y1="225" x2="215" y2="575" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <line x1="235" y1="225" x2="235" y2="575" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="205" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#00FF00" text-anchor="middle" transform="rotate(90, 205, 400)">JUST CLEARED!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Tracking shot indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.3">
    <path d="M50,400 L400,400" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="10,5"/>
    <polygon points="400,400 390,395 390,405" fill="#4682B4"/>
    <text x="225" y="390" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#4682B4" text-anchor="middle">TRACKING SHOT</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Success indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.5">
    <circle cx="225" cy="400" r="100" fill="url(#successGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.7;0.5" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Measurement guides -->
  <g opacity="0.3">
    <line x1="150" y1="400" x2="300" y2="400" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="225" y="395" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">36" hallway</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Smooth navigation text -->
  <g opacity="0.8">
    <rect x="75" y="700" width="300" height="40" rx="20" fill="#4682B4"/>
    <text x="225" y="725" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">SMOOTHLY NAVIGATING THE CORNER</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Neighbor peeking out (impressed) -->
  <g id="neighbor">
    <!-- Door frame -->
    <rect x="350" y="150" width="60" height="150" fill="#A68B5B" stroke="#8B7355" stroke-width="2"/>
    <rect x="355" y="155" width="50" height="140" fill="#C19A6B"/>
    
    <!-- Door handle -->
    <circle cx="365" cy="225" r="5" fill="#B8860B"/>
    
    <!-- Door opening slightly -->
    <rect x="355" y="155" width="50" height="140" fill="#2F2F2F" opacity="0.8"/>
    
    <!-- Neighbor's face -->
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="225" rx="15" ry="20" fill="url(#skinGradient)"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M345,215 Q360,200 375,215" fill="#A0522D"/>
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="210" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#A0522D"/>
    
    <!-- Eyes (impressed) -->
    <ellipse cx="355" cy="220" rx="4" ry="5" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="365" cy="220" rx="4" ry="5" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="355" cy="220" r="2" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="365" cy="220" r="2" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (raised/impressed) -->
    <path d="M350,210 L360,205" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M360,205 L370,210" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (surprised) -->
    <circle cx="360" cy="230" r="3" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="1"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Inches to spare visualization -->
  <g opacity="0.6">
    <line x1="225" y1="275" x2="235" y2="275" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="225" y1="275" x2="225" y2="285" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="235" y1="275" x2="235" y2="285" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="230" y="295" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#00FF00" text-anchor="middle">2"</text>
    
    <line x1="225" y1="475" x2="235" y2="475" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="225" y1="465" x2="225" y2="475" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="235" y1="465" x2="235" y2="475" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="230" y="460" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#00FF00" text-anchor="middle">2"</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Satisfaction indicators -->
  <g>
    <ellipse cx="265" cy="300" rx="20" ry="12" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.5"/>
    <text x="265" y="303" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#000000" text-anchor="middle">Wow!</text>
  </g>
</svg>

    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Glow filter -->
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="5" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="blur" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Skin gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />

    <!-- Sunbeam gradient -->
    <linearGradient id="sunbeamGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">

      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFACD" stop-opacity="0.1"/>

  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background wall -->

    <rect x="240" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>

  <!-- Player Character (lowering sofa) -->

    <!-- Mouth (focused) -->

  <!-- Alex (lowering sofa) -->
  <g id="alex">

    <path d="M280,320 L290,325" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (focused) -->
    <path d="M265,350 Q275,355 285,350" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Rotation indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.4">

    <path d="M225,400 A80,80 0 0,1 305,400" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="5,5" transform="rotate(110, 225, 400)"/>
    <polygon points="305,400 295,390 310,385" fill="#4682B4" transform="rotate(110, 225, 400)"/>
    
    <!-- Rotation angle indicator -->
    <path d="M225,400 L325,400" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
    <path d="M225,400 L275,325" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
    <path d="M275,400 A50,50 0 0,0 275,325" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="1" fill="none" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
    <text x="285" y="365" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle">20</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Fluid movement indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.5">
    <path d="M175,310 Q225,280 275,310" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    <text x="225" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#4682B4" text-anchor="middle">FLUID MOVEMENT</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Coordination indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.4">
    <line x1="175" y1="400" x2="175" y2="350" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>
    <line x1="275" y1="400" x2="275" y2="350" stroke="#00FF00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,3"/>

    <text x="225" y="360" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#00FF00" text-anchor="middle">COORDINATED</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Light at the end of the tunnel effect -->
  <ellipse cx="225" cy="125" rx="75" ry="50" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#glow)"/>
  
  <!-- Wall art -->
  <g opacity="0.8">
    <rect x="50" y="300" width="60" height="80" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#A68B5B" stroke-width="3" filter="url(#shadow)"/>
    <rect x="55" y="305" width="50" height="70" fill="#F5DEB3"/>

    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Light at the end of the tunnel text -->

  </g>
  
  <!-- Fluid and coordinated movement text -->

  </g>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Leather texture for sofa -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="50" height="50">
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="20" fill="#800000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="15" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="10" fill="#800000"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Sofa button pattern -->
    <pattern id="sofaButtons" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Highlights for leather -->
    <linearGradient id="leatherHighlight" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#A52A2A" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#8B0000" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#800000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Floor texture -->
    <pattern id="woodFloor" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="20">
      <rect width="100" height="20" fill="#DEB887"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="100" y2="0" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="20" x2="100" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="25" y1="0" x2="25" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="50" y1="0" x2="50" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="75" y1="0" x2="75" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Wall texture -->
    <pattern id="wallTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#F5F5F5"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#EAEAEA" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Carpet texture -->
    <pattern id="carpetTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#8B4513" opacity="0.3"/>
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="#A0522D" opacity="0.1"/>
      <rect x="50" y="50" width="50" height="50" fill="#A0522D" opacity="0.1"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Glow filter -->
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="5" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="blur" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Skin gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Sunbeam gradient -->
    <linearGradient id="sunbeamGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFACD" stop-opacity="0.8"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFACD" stop-opacity="0.1"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- High five sparkle -->
    <radialGradient id="highFiveSparkle" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0.9"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FFFFFF" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background wall -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="650" width="450" height="150" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- Large area rug -->

  <!-- Sunlight streaming through windows -->

    <!-- Sunlight patch on sofa -->

  <!-- Coffee table -->

  <!-- Side table -->

    <!-- Door handle -->
    <circle cx="365" cy="225" r="5" fill="#B8860B"/>
    
    <!-- Door opening slightly -->
    <rect x="355" y="155" width="50" height="140" fill="#2F2F2F" opacity="0.8"/>

    <ellipse cx="360" cy="225" rx="15" ry="20" fill="url(#skinGradient)"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->

    <ellipse cx="360" cy="210" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#A0522D"/>
    
    <!-- Eyes -->
    <ellipse cx="355" cy="220" rx="3" ry="4" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="365" cy="220" rx="3" ry="4" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="355" cy="220" r="1.5" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="365" cy="220" r="1.5" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (concerned) -->
    <path d="M352,215 L358,213" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M362,213 L368,216" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (concerned) -->
    <path d="M355,230 Q360,228 365,230" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="1"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wall sconce trembling -->
  <g>
    <rect x="100" y="200" width="20" height="30" fill="#B87333">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="100;101;99;100" dur="0.2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </rect>
    <path d="M95,200 L125,200 L115,180 L105,180 Z" fill="#F5DEB3">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="95;96;94;95" dur="0.2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <ellipse cx="110" cy="190" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="110;111;109;110" dur="0.2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </ellipse>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Effort indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.7">
    <!-- Player character strain lines -->
    <path d="M40,400 L60,400" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="3">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.7;1;0.7" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M120,400 L140,400" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="3">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.7;1;0.7" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    
    <!-- Alex strain lines -->
    <path d="M310,450 L330,450" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.7;1;0.7" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
    <path d="M390,450 L410,450" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.7;1;0.7" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wedged indicators -->
  <g opacity="0.6">
    <text x="225" y="250" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FF0000" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">WEDGED!</text>
    <path d="M225,260 L225,300" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
    
    <!-- Wedge points -->
    <circle cx="225" cy="375" r="10" fill="#FF0000" opacity="0.5">
      <animate attributeName="r" values="10;15;10" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </circle>
    <circle cx="120" cy="375" r="8" fill="#FF0000" opacity="0.5">
      <animate attributeName="r" values="8;12;8" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" begin="0.3s"/>
    </circle>
    <circle cx="330" cy="375" r="8" fill="#FF0000" opacity="0.5">
      <animate attributeName="r" values="8;12;8" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" begin="0.6s"/>
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Building pressure text -->
  <g opacity="0.8">
    <rect x="75" y="700" width="300" height="40" rx="20" fill="#FF0000"/>
    <text x="225" y="725" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">PRESSURE BUILDING!</text>
  </g>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Leather texture for sofa -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="50" height="50">
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="20" fill="#800000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="15" fill="#8B0000"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="10" fill="#800000"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Sofa button pattern -->
    <pattern id="sofaButtons" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="25" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="25" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="75" cy="75" r="3" fill="#600000" stroke="#500000" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Highlights for leather -->
    <linearGradient id="leatherHighlight" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#A52A2A" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#8B0000" stop-opacity="0.5"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#800000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Floor texture -->
    <pattern id="woodFloor" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="20">
      <rect width="100" height="20" fill="#DEB887"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="100" y2="0" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="0" y1="20" x2="100" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="25" y1="0" x2="25" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="50" y1="0" x2="50" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="75" y1="0" x2="75" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Wall texture -->
    <pattern id="wallTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#E8E3D9"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#DFD8CC" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Skin gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skinGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#F5DEB3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Muscle strain effect -->
    <filter id="muscleStrain">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.01" numOctaves="1" seed="5"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="2"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Motion blur -->
    <filter id="motionBlur" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background wall -->
  <rect width="450" height="800" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="650" width="450" height="150" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway walls -->
  <polygon points="0,0 0,800 150,650 150,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  <polygon points="450,0 450,800 300,650 300,0" fill="url(#wallTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Hallway floor -->
  <polygon points="150,650 300,650 300,800 150,800" fill="url(#woodFloor)"/>
  
  <!-- The corner -->
  <line x1="225" y1="0" x2="225" y2="650" stroke="#ADA08C" stroke-width="3"/>
  
  <!-- Baseboard trim -->
  <polygon points="0,650 150,650 150,660 0,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="450,650 300,650 300,660 450,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="150,650 225,650 225,660 150,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  <polygon points="225,650 300,650 300,660 225,660" fill="#8B7355"/>
  
  <!-- Wall sconce -->
  <g opacity="0.9">
    <rect x="100" y="200" width="20" height="30" fill="#B87333"/>
    <path d="M95,200 L125,200 L115,180 L105,180 Z" fill="#F5DEB3"/>
    <ellipse cx="110" cy="190" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#FFFACD" opacity="0.7"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wall art (shaking) -->
  <g>
    <rect x="50" y="300" width="60" height="80" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#A68B5B" stroke-width="3" filter="url(#shadow)">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="50;55;45;50" dur="0.2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </rect>
    <rect x="55" y="305" width="50" height="70" fill="#F5DEB3">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="55;60;50;55" dur="0.2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </rect>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player Character (pushing too hard) -->
  <g id="playerCharacter" filter="url(#motionBlur)">
    <!-- Legs in pushing position -->
    <path d="M50,650 L80,650 L90,550 L60,550 Z" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    <path d="M100,650 L130,650 L120,550 L90,550 Z" fill="#1E90FF"/>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="40" y="650" width="45" height="15" fill="#000000" rx="5"/>

    <!-- Torso (pushing stance) -->

    <!-- Arms pushing sofa -->
    <path d="M60,400 Q40,350 75,300" fill="#555555" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    <path d="M120,400 Q140,350 125,300" fill="#555555" stroke="#444444" stroke-width="1" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands on sofa -->

    <ellipse cx="125" cy="300" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#FFDAB9" transform="rotate(20, 125, 300)"/>
    
    <!-- Neck (strained) -->
    <path d="M75,370 L105,370 L105,400 L75,400 Z" fill="#FFDAB9" filter="url(#muscleStrain)"/>
    
    <!-- Head (straining) -->
    <ellipse cx="90" cy="350" rx="25" ry="30" fill="#FFDAB9"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M65,340 Q90,320 115,340" fill="#8B4513"/>

    <!-- Mouth (straining) -->

  </g>
  
  <!-- Alex (losing grip) -->
  <g id="alex" transform="translate(10, 20)" filter="url(#motionBlur)">

    <path d="M320,650 L350,650 L360,580 L330,580 Z" fill="#4B0082" transform="rotate(10, 335, 615)"/>
    <path d="M370,650 L400,650 L390,580 L360,580 Z" fill="#4B0082" transform="rotate(10, 385, 615)"/>

    <!-- Torso (falling backward) -->
    <path d="M330,450 L390,450 L390,580 L330,580 Z" fill="#32CD32" transform="rotate(10, 360, 515)"/>
    
    <!-- Arms losing grip -->
    <path d="M330,450 Q310,400 325,350" fill="#32CD32" stroke="#228B22" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(10, 330, 450)"/>
    <path d="M390,450 Q410,400 375,350" fill="#32CD32" stroke="#228B22" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(10, 390, 450)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands losing grip -->
    <ellipse cx="325" cy="350" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#F5DEB3" transform="rotate(-10, 325, 350)"/>
    <ellipse cx="375" cy="350" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#F5DEB3" transform="rotate(30, 375, 350)"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M345,420 L375,420 L375,450 L345,450 Z" fill="#F5DEB3" transform="rotate(10, 360, 435)"/>
    
    <!-- Head (alarmed) -->
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="400" rx="20" ry="25" fill="#F5DEB3" transform="rotate(10, 360, 400)"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M340,390 Q360,370 380,390" fill="#000000" transform="rotate(10, 360, 390)"/>
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="380" rx="20" ry="15" fill="#000000" transform="rotate(10, 360, 380)"/>
    
    <!-- Face details -->
    <ellipse cx="350" cy="400" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white" transform="rotate(10, 350, 400)"/>
    <ellipse cx="370" cy="400" rx="5" ry="7" fill="white" transform="rotate(10, 370, 400)"/>

    <circle cx="370" cy="400" r="3" fill="#1A1A1A" transform="rotate(10, 370, 400)"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (alarmed) -->

    <path d="M365,380 L380,385" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(10, 372, 382)"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (alarmed) -->
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="415" rx="5" ry="7" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(10, 360, 415)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- The burgundy leather sofa (tilting unpredictably) -->
  <g id="sofa" filter="url(#shadow)" transform="rotate(-20, 225, 400)">

    <rect x="100" y="325" width="250" height="150" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa back -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="250" height="70" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="105" y="280" width="240" height="60" rx="8" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa arms -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="310" y="275" width="40" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa cushions -->
    <rect x="150" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    <rect x="230" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Cushion details -->
    <rect x="150" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    <rect x="230" y="335" width="70" height="120" rx="10" fill="url(#sofaButtons)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Sofa feet -->
    <rect x="110" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="300" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="170" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    <rect x="240" y="475" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8B4513"/>
    
    <!-- Leather highlights -->
    <rect x="100" y="275" width="250" height="200" rx="10" fill="url(#leatherHighlight)" opacity="0.3"/>
    
    <!-- Seam details -->
    <line x1="150" y1="335" x2="220" y2="335" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="230" y1="335" x2="300" y2="335" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="140" y1="275" x2="140" y2="475" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
    <line x1="310" y1="275" x2="310" y2="475" stroke="#600000" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion blur trails for sofa -->
  <g opacity="0.3" filter="url(#motionBlur)">

    <rect x="100" y="325" width="250" height="150" rx="10" fill="#8B0000" transform="rotate(-5, 225, 400)"/>

  <!-- Wall sconce trembling -->

      <animate attributeName="cx" values="110;115;105;110" dur="0.2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/>
    </ellipse>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Neighbor peeking out (more concerned) -->

    <rect x="350" y="150" width="60" height="150" fill="#A68B5B" stroke="#8B7355" stroke-width="2"/>
    <rect x="355" y="155" width="50" height="140" fill="#C19A6B"/>
    
    <!-- Door handle -->

    <!-- Hair -->

    <ellipse cx="360" cy="210" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#A0522D"/>
    
    <!-- Eyes (alarmed) -->
    <ellipse cx="355" cy="220" rx="4" ry="5" fill="white"/>
    <ellipse cx="365" cy="220" rx="4" ry="5" fill="white"/>
    <circle cx="355" cy="220" r="2" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    <circle cx="365" cy="220" r="2" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (alarmed) -->

    <path d="M360,205 L370,210" stroke="#A0522D" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (alarmed) -->
    <ellipse cx="360" cy="230" r="3" fill="none" stroke="#A52A2A" stroke-width="1"/>

  <!-- Effort indicators -->

    <path d="M120,400 L140,400" stroke="#FF0000" stroke-width="4">

  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion lines -->

  </g>
  
  <!-- Wall sconce about to become collateral damage -->

    <ellipse cx="110" cy="190" rx="20" ry="10" fill="#FF0000" opacity="0.2">

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Leather texture for sofa -->
    <pattern id="leatherTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="50" height="50">

    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Sofa button pattern -->
    <pattern id="sofaButtons" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">

      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#800000" stop-opacity="0.7"/>
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Floor texture -->
    <pattern id="woodFloor" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="20">
      <rect width="100" height="20" fill="#DEB887"/>

      <line x1="25" y1="0" x2="25" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="50" y1="0" x2="50" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="75" y1="0" x2="75" y2="20" stroke="#CD853F" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Wall texture -->
    <pattern id="wallTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="100" height="100">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#E8E3D9"/>
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="#DFD8CC" opacity="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    
    <!-- Shadow filter -->
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="4" flood-opacity="0.3"/>
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Skin gradients -->

      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D2B48C" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Motion blur -->
    <filter id="motionBlur" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">

    </filter>
    
    <!-- Glass shatter effect -->
    <filter id="glassShatter" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">

    <!-- Dutch angle effect -->

      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#000000" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </linearGradient>

  <!-- Background wall (tilted for Dutch angle) -->

  <!-- The burgundy leather sofa (captured mid-fall) -->

  <!-- Motion blur trails for falling sofa -->
  <g opacity="0.3" filter="url(#motionBlur)">

  <!-- Player Character (falling/grabbing for sofa) -->

      <circle cx="25" cy="25" r="15" fill="#8B0000"/>

      <polygon points="0,100 25,75 50,100" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.7"/>

  </g>
  
  <!-- Player (right) - slumped in seat -->
  <g transform="translate(280, 400)">

    <rect x="-30" y="0" width="60" height="100" fill="#2e5c8c" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(10, 0, 50)"/>
    
    <!-- Arms - hanging down -->
    <line x1="-30" y1="30" x2="-50" y2="70" stroke="#2e5c8c" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" transform="rotate(10, 0, 50)"/>
    <line x1="30" y1="30" x2="50" y2="70" stroke="#2e5c8c" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" transform="rotate(10, 0, 50)"/>
    
    <!-- Hands -->

    <path d="M50,70 C60,80 70,80 80,70 C90,60 90,50 80,40 C70,30 60,30 50,40 C40,50 40,60 50,70" fill="#f2d2b6" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(10, 0, 50)"/>

    <line x1="20" y1="100" x2="20" y2="150" stroke="#6b4423" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" transform="rotate(10, 0, 50)"/>
    
    <!-- Head - hanging down -->

      <ellipse cx="10" cy="-55" rx="5" ry="4" fill="#331800"/>

      <path d="M-10,-40 C-5,-35 5,-35 10,-40" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2" fill="none" transform="scale(1, -1) translate(0, -110)"/>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Patrons laughing -->
  <g transform="translate(50, 350)">
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#e8c4a2" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="-10" y="15" width="20" height="40" fill="#8c6b3d" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>

    <line x1="10" y1="25" x2="25" y2="15" stroke="#8c6b3d" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round"/>

    <ellipse cx="-5" cy="-5" rx="3" ry="2" fill="#331800"/>
    <ellipse cx="5" cy="-5" rx="3" ry="2" fill="#331800"/>
    <path d="M-8,-10 C-5,-12 -2,-12 0,-10" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M8,-10 C5,-12 2,-12 0,-10" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M-5,5 C0,10 5,10 10,5" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Laughter lines -->
    <text x="15" y="-15" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">Ha!</text>
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(350, 350)">
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#e8c4a2" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="-10" y="15" width="20" height="40" fill="#6b3d8c" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="-10" y1="25" x2="-25" y2="15" stroke="#6b3d8c" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <line x1="10" y1="25" x2="25" y2="15" stroke="#6b3d8c" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Laughing face -->

    <ellipse cx="5" cy="-5" rx="3" ry="2" fill="#331800"/>
    <path d="M-8,-10 C-5,-12 -2,-12 0,-10" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M8,-10 C5,-12 2,-12 0,-10" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M-5,5 C0,10 5,10 10,5" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    
    <!-- Laughter lines -->
    <text x="-15" y="-15" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#ffffff">Heh!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Patrons offering sympathetic pats -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 300)">
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#e8c4a2" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="-10" y="15" width="20" height="40" fill="#3d5e8c" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1"/>
    <line x1="-10" y1="25" x2="-40" y2="40" stroke="#3d5e8c" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <line x1="10" y1="25" x2="25" y2="15" stroke="#3d5e8c" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Sympathetic face -->
    <ellipse cx="-5" cy="-5" rx="3" ry="2" fill="#331800"/>
    <ellipse cx="5" cy="-5" rx="3" ry="2" fill="#331800"/>
    <path d="M-8,-10 C-5,-12 -2,-12 0,-10" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M8,-10 C5,-12 2,-12 0,-10" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none"/>
    <path d="M-5,5 C0,0 5,0 10,5" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none" transform="scale(1, -1) translate(0, 10)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- "Better luck next time!" text -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 200)">
    <rect x="-140" y="-30" width="280" height="60" rx="15" ry="15" fill="#2e5c8c" stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="3"/>
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#ffffff" text-anchor="middle">Better luck next time!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Warm lighting effect -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="350" r="150" fill="#f7b731" opacity="0.1"/>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a80cc" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blur" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="steamFilter">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Hazard lights animation -->
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Hazard light blinking -->
    <animate id="blinkAnimation" 
             attributeName="opacity"
             values="1;0;1"
             dur="1s"
             repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background sky -->
  <rect width="450" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#roadGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road markings -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="700" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  
  <!-- Lane dividers -->
  <line x1="0" y1="450" x2="450" y2="450" stroke="white" stroke-width="5" stroke-dasharray="30 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="550" x2="450" y2="550" stroke="white" stroke-width="5" stroke-dasharray="30 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="650" x2="450" y2="650" stroke="white" stroke-width="5" stroke-dasharray="30 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="750" x2="450" y2="750" stroke="yellow" stroke-width="5" />

  <path d="M350,730 L400,760" fill="#000" opacity="0.2" />
  
  <!-- Lens flare -->
