  <circle cx="300" cy="300" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#blur)" />
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Definitions -->
  <defs>
    <!-- Car window gradient -->
    <linearGradient id="windowGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#a8d8ea" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#5a7d9a" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Dashboard gradient -->
    <linearGradient id="dashboardGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#34495e" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2c3e50" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Hazard light glow filter -->
    <filter id="hazardGlow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Sweat drop filter -->
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Car interior background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" fill="#1e3a5f" />
  
  <!-- Car door panel -->
  <rect x="0" y="100" width="100" height="600" fill="#2c3e50" />
  <rect x="100" y="100" width="350" height="600" fill="#34495e" />
  
  <!-- Window frame -->
  <rect x="50" y="150" width="300" height="350" rx="10" fill="#2c3e50" />
  
  <!-- Window view (what's outside) -->
  <rect x="70" y="170" width="260" height="310" rx="5" fill="url(#windowGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road visible through window -->
  <rect x="70" y="350" width="260" height="130" fill="#555555" />
  <line x1="70" y1="400" x2="330" y2="400" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="10 5" />
  
  <!-- Passing cars outside -->
  <g>
    <!-- Car 1 -->
    <rect x="120" y="380" width="30" height="12" rx="3" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <rect x="125" y="375" width="20" height="8" rx="2" fill="#c0392b" />
    <circle cx="125" cy="392" r="3" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <circle cx="145" cy="392" r="3" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Car 2 -->
    <rect x="220" y="370" width="35" height="14" rx="3" fill="#f1c40f" />
    <rect x="225" y="365" width="25" height="9" rx="2" fill="#f39c12" />
    <circle cx="225" cy="384" r="3" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <circle cx="250" cy="384" r="3" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Car 3 with animation -->
    <g>
      <rect x="80" y="390" width="28" height="12" rx="3" fill="#3498db">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="330;80;-30" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </rect>
      <rect x="85" y="385" width="18" height="8" rx="2" fill="#2980b9">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="335;85;-25" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </rect>
      <circle cx="85" cy="402" r="3" fill="#7f8c8d">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="335;85;-25" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </circle>
      <circle cx="103" cy="402" r="3" fill="#7f8c8d">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="353;103;-7" dur="5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </circle>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Steering wheel -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="550" r="70" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="8" fill="none" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="550" r="10" fill="#7f8c8d" />
  <line x1="150" y1="480" x2="150" y2="500" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="8" />
  <line x1="150" y1="600" x2="150" y2="620" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="8" />
  <line x1="80" y1="550" x2="100" y2="550" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="8" />
  <line x1="200" y1="550" x2="220" y2="550" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="8" />
  
  <!-- Driver's hands gripping wheel -->
  <ellipse cx="110" cy="520" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#e67e22" transform="rotate(-20,110,520)" />
  <ellipse cx="190" cy="520" rx="15" ry="10" fill="#e67e22" transform="rotate(20,190,520)" />
  
  <!-- Dashboard -->
  <rect x="50" y="650" width="350" height="100" rx="10" fill="url(#dashboardGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Dashboard elements -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="700" r="30" fill="#2c3e50" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="250" cy="700" r="30" fill="#2c3e50" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="2" />
  
  <!-- Speedometer -->
  <path d="M150,700 L170,680" stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="700" r="3" fill="#7f8c8d" />
  
  <!-- Fuel gauge -->
  <path d="M250,700 L230,690" stroke="#f1c40f" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="250" cy="700" r="3" fill="#7f8c8d" />
  
  <!-- Hazard light button glowing -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="680" r="10" fill="#ff9900">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0.5;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="200" cy="680" r="15" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.1;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  
  <!-- Rearview mirror -->
  <rect x="180" y="170" width="80" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="2" />
  <rect x="185" y="175" width="70" height="20" rx="3" fill="#7f8c8d" />
  
  <!-- Cars visible in rearview mirror -->
  <rect x="195" y="180" width="15" height="6" rx="1" fill="#e74c3c" />
  <rect x="220" y="182" width="12" height="5" rx="1" fill="#3498db" />
  <rect x="240" y="180" width="10" height="4" rx="1" fill="#2ecc71" />
  
  <!-- Driver's face reflection in rearview mirror -->
  <circle cx="215" cy="185" r="5" fill="#f5cba7" />
  <path d="M212,187 Q215,189 218,187" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="0.5" fill="none" />
  <line x1="213" y1="183" x2="214" y2="183" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="0.5" />
  <line x1="216" y1="183" x2="217" y2="183" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Driver's face (close-up) -->
  <g id="driverFace">
    <!-- Face shape -->
    <ellipse cx="220" cy="320" rx="50" ry="60" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M170,300 Q220,260 270,300" fill="#6c3483" />
    <path d="M170,300 Q180,320 170,340" fill="#6c3483" />
    <path d="M270,300 Q260,320 270,340" fill="#6c3483" />
    
    <!-- Eyes -->
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="310" rx="8" ry="5" fill="white" />
    <ellipse cx="240" cy="310" rx="8" ry="5" fill="white" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="310" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="240" cy="310" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (worried expression) -->
    <path d="M190,300 Q200,295 210,300" stroke="#6c3483" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    <path d="M230,300 Q240,295 250,300" stroke="#6c3483" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Nose -->
    <path d="M220,315 Q225,330 220,335" stroke="#d35400" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Mouth (anxious) -->
    <path d="M205,345 Q220,350 235,345" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Sweat drops -->
    <path d="M180,290 Q180,295 177,297" stroke="#a8d8ea" stroke-width="2" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <path d="M260,295 Q260,300 263,302" stroke="#a8d8ea" stroke-width="2" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    
    <!-- Worried lines on forehead -->
    <path d="M205,285 Q220,280 235,285" stroke="#d35400" stroke-width="0.5" fill="none" />
    <path d="M210,280 Q220,275 230,280" stroke="#d35400" stroke-width="0.5" fill="none" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Passenger seat items -->
  <rect x="300" y="500" width="100" height="150" rx="10" fill="#2980b9" /> <!-- Seat -->
  
  <!-- Grocery bag -->
  <path d="M320,520 L340,520 L350,540 L310,540 Z" fill="#e67e22" />
  <path d="M310,540 L350,540 L350,580 L310,580 Z" fill="#d35400" />
  
  <!-- Grocery items visible -->
  <circle cx="320" cy="550" r="8" fill="#e74c3c" /> <!-- Apple -->
  <rect x="330" cy="545" width="15" height="10" fill="#f1c40f" /> <!-- Box -->
  <path d="M340,560 Q345,550 350,560" stroke="#2ecc71" stroke-width="3" fill="none" /> <!-- Leafy vegetable -->
  
  <!-- Child's toy in back seat -->
  <rect x="330" y="600" width="40" height="30" rx="5" fill="#3498db" /> <!-- Toy base -->
  <circle cx="340" cy="610" r="5" fill="#e74c3c" />
  <circle cx="360" cy="610" r="5" fill="#f1c40f" />
  <circle cx="340" cy="625" r="5" fill="#2ecc71" />
  <circle cx="360" cy="625" r="5" fill="#9b59b6" />
  
  <!-- Glances to rearview mirror visualization -->
  <path d="M230,320 Q250,270 220,240" stroke="#f5cba7" stroke-width="1" fill="none" opacity="0.3">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;0.3;0" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </path>
  
  <!-- Window frame edge highlights -->
  <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="350" y2="150" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="50" y1="150" x2="50" y2="500" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="350" y1="150" x2="350" y2="500" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="50" y1="500" x2="350" y2="500" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="2" />
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a80cc" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="mirrorFrame" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#7f8c8d" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2c3e50" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="mirrorSurface" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#bdc3c7" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#95a5a6" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blurEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="hazardGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Car interior texture -->
    <pattern id="carInteriorTexture" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse" width="10" height="10">
      <rect width="10" height="10" fill="#2c3e50" />
      <path d="M0,0 L10,10 M10,0 L0,10" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="0.5" />
    </pattern>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Car interior background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="800" fill="url(#carInteriorTexture)" />
  
  <!-- Side mirror frame -->
  <rect x="75" y="250" width="300" height="300" rx="20" fill="url(#mirrorFrame)" />
  
  <!-- Side mirror surface -->
  <rect x="100" y="275" width="250" height="250" rx="10" fill="url(#mirrorSurface)" />
  
  <!-- Road visible in mirror -->
  <rect x="100" y="350" width="250" height="175" fill="#555555" />
  
  <!-- Road markings in mirror -->
  <rect x="100" y="425" width="250" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="100" y="475" width="250" height="5" fill="yellow" />
  
  <!-- Player character approaching in mirror -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="180" y="380" width="30" height="50" rx="8" fill="#3498db" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="195" cy="365" r="15" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M180,360 Q195,345 210,360" fill="#34495e" />
    
    <!-- Face features -->
    <circle cx="190" cy="362" r="2" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="362" r="2" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <path d="M190,370 Q195,373 200,370" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="170" y="390" width="10" height="30" rx="5" fill="#3498db" />
    <rect x="210" y="390" width="10" height="30" rx="5" fill="#3498db" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="180" y="430" width="12" height="40" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <rect x="198" y="430" width="12" height="40" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="178" y="470" width="16" height="5" rx="2" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <rect x="196" y="470" width="16" height="5" rx="2" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Concerned expression -->
    <line x1="188" y1="358" x2="192" y2="358" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="1" />
    <line x1="198" y1="358" x2="202" y2="358" stroke="#34495e" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Passing vehicles in mirror -->
  <g>
    <!-- Truck passing dangerously close -->
    <rect x="230" y="380" width="80" height="40" rx="5" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <rect x="230" y="360" width="40" height="20" rx="3" fill="#c0392b" />
    <rect x="240" y="365" width="20" height="10" rx="2" fill="#ecf0f1" />
    <circle cx="240" cy="420" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="260" cy="420" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="290" cy="420" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="310" cy="420" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Car passing -->
    <rect x="120" y="400" width="40" height="20" rx="5" fill="#2ecc71">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="350;120;-50" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="125" y="390" width="30" height="15" rx="3" fill="#27ae60">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="355;125;-45" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </rect>
    <circle cx="130" cy="420" r="5" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="360;130;-40" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="150" cy="420" r="5" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="380;150;-20" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Stalled car visible in mirror -->
  <rect x="140" y="350" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#3498db" />
  <rect x="145" y="340" width="40" height="15" rx="3" fill="#2980b9" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="370" r="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
  <circle cx="180" cy="370" r="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
  
  <!-- Hazard lights blinking in mirror -->
  <circle cx="145" cy="355" r="2" fill="#ff9900">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="185" cy="355" r="2" fill="#ff9900">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  
  <!-- Hazard light glow -->
  <circle cx="145" cy="355" r="4" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="185" cy="355" r="4" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  
  <!-- Car interior elements -->
  <!-- Dashboard edge -->
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="200" fill="#2c3e50" />
  
  <!-- Steering wheel (partially visible) -->
  <path d="M50,650 A100,100 0 0,1 150,750" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
  
  <!-- Driver's hand on wheel -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="700" rx="20" ry="15" fill="#f5cba7" transform="rotate(-20,100,700)" />
  
  <!-- Driver's shoulder (partially visible) -->
  <ellipse cx="40" cy="600" rx="40" ry="50" fill="#3498db" />
  
  <!-- Mirror mount -->
  <path d="M75,250 L50,200 L30,200" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
  
  <!-- Window frame edge -->
  <rect x="0" y="150" width="30" height="400" fill="#2c3e50" />
  
  <!-- Mirror reflection effects -->
  <rect x="100" y="275" width="250" height="250" rx="10" fill="white" opacity="0.1" />
  <line x1="100" y1="275" x2="350" y2="525" stroke="white" opacity="0.2" />
  <line x1="350" y1="275" x2="100" y2="525" stroke="white" opacity="0.2" />
  
  <!-- Text "Objects in mirror are closer than they appear" -->
  <text x="120" y="510" font-family="Arial" font-size="8" fill="white" opacity="0.7">Objects in mirror are closer than they appear</text>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a80cc" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="carBodyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3498db" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2980b9" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blurEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="hazardGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="steamEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="hornEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#roadGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road markings -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="700" width="450" height="5" fill="yellow" />
  
  <!-- Lane dividers -->
  <line x1="0" y1="450" x2="450" y2="450" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="550" x2="450" y2="550" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="650" x2="450" y2="650" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  
  <!-- Stalled car -->
  <g id="stalledCar">
    <!-- Car body -->
    <rect x="150" y="600" width="150" height="60" rx="15" fill="url(#carBodyGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Car roof -->
    <rect x="170" y="560" width="110" height="50" rx="10" fill="#2980b9" />
    
    <!-- Windows -->
    <rect x="180" y="570" width="90" height="30" rx="5" fill="#a8d8ea" />
    
    <!-- Door -->
    <rect x="170" y="600" width="50" height="60" rx="5" fill="#2980b9" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" />
    <rect x="190" y="620" width="10" height="20" rx="2" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Open window -->
    <rect x="180" y="570" width="30" height="30" rx="5" fill="#d6eaf8" />
    
    <!-- Wheels -->
    <circle cx="180" cy="660" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="180" cy="660" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="660" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="660" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Hazard lights -->
    <circle cx="155" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="295" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hazard light glow -->
    <circle cx="155" cy="610" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="295" cy="610" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Steam from hood -->
    <path d="M220,560 Q230,540 240,550 Q250,530 260,540" 
          stroke="white" stroke-width="5" fill="none" opacity="0.7" filter="url(#steamEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="d" 
               values="M220,560 Q230,540 240,550 Q250,530 260,540;
                      M220,560 Q230,535 240,545 Q250,525 260,535;
                      M220,560 Q230,540 240,550 Q250,530 260,540" 
               dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Driver in car -->
  <g id="driver">
    <!-- Driver's face visible through window -->
    <circle cx="195" cy="585" r="12" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M183,580 Q195,570 207,580" fill="#6c3483" />
    
    <!-- Eyes -->
    <ellipse cx="190" cy="583" rx="3" ry="2" fill="white" />
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="583" rx="3" ry="2" fill="white" />
    <circle cx="190" cy="583" r="1" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="583" r="1" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Mouth (worried) -->
    <path d="M190,590 Q195,592 200,590" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Hand gesturing toward hood -->
    <path d="M205,600 L220,580" stroke="#f5cba7" stroke-width="5" fill="none" />
    <circle cx="220" cy="580" r="5" fill="#f5cba7" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character approaching -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="100" y="580" width="40" height="80" rx="10" fill="#27ae60" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="120" cy="550" r="20" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M100,545 Q120,525 140,545" fill="#34495e" />
    
    <!-- Face features -->
    <circle cx="112" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="128" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <path d="M112,560 Q120,565 128,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="85" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#27ae60" />
    <rect x="140" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#27ae60" />
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <circle cx="85" cy="640" r="7" fill="#f5cba7" />
    <circle cx="155" cy="640" r="7" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="100" y="660" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <rect x="125" y="660" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="95" y="720" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <rect x="120" y="720" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Nodding head animation -->
    <animateTransform attributeName="transform"
                      attributeType="XML"
                      type="translate"
                      values="0,0; 0,-5; 0,0"
                      dur="2s"
                      repeatCount="indefinite"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Traffic -->
  <g id="traffic">
    <!-- Car 1 -->
    <rect x="350" y="450" width="80" height="30" rx="8" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <rect x="360" y="435" width="60" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b" />
    <circle cx="370" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="410" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Car 2 -->
    <rect x="50" y="500" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#f1c40f" />
    <rect x="60" y="485" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#f39c12" />
    <circle cx="65" cy="525" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="105" cy="525" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Truck with horn -->
    <rect x="300" y="520" width="100" height="40" rx="8" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <rect x="300" y="500" width="60" height="25" rx="5" fill="#95a5a6" />
    <circle cx="320" cy="560" r="10" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="350" cy="560" r="10" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="380" cy="560" r="10" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Horn sound visualization -->
    <path d="M400,510 Q420,500 400,490 Q420,480 400,470" stroke="#ecf0f1" stroke-width="2" fill="none" filter="url(#hornEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;1;0" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Car 3 -->
    <rect x="30" y="600" width="60" height="25" rx="7" fill="#9b59b6" />
    <rect x="40" y="585" width="40" height="20" rx="5" fill="#8e44ad" />
    <circle cx="45" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="75" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Car 4 with animation -->
    <g>
      <rect x="380" y="650" width="70" height="30" rx="8" fill="#2ecc71">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="450;380;-100" dur="10s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </rect>
      <rect x="390" y="635" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#27ae60">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="460;390;-90" dur="10s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </rect>
      <circle cx="395" cy="680" r="8" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="465;395;-85" dur="10s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </circle>
      <circle cx="435" cy="680" r="8" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="505;435;-45" dur="10s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </circle>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sun setting -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="40" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.8" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="60" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.3" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="80" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.1" />
  
  <!-- Lens flare -->
  <circle cx="300" cy="200" r="10" fill="white" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#blurEffect)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="150" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#blurEffect)" />
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">

      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>

  <!-- Sky background -->

  <path d="M0,700 C150,720 300,750 450,700" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  
  <!-- Stalled car -->

                      M220,560 Q230,535 240,545 Q250,525 260,535;
                      M220,560 Q230,540 240,550 Q250,530 260,540" 
               dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Safer shoulder area ahead -->

    <!-- Visual indicator of safety -->
    <rect x="380" y="500" width="40" height="200" fill="green" opacity="0.1" />
    <text x="385" y="600" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white" opacity="0.7" transform="rotate(90,385,600)">SAFE AREA</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- "No Stopping Any Time" sign -->
  <g id="noStoppingSign">
    <!-- Sign post -->
    <rect x="380" y="400" width="5" height="100" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Sign -->
    <rect x="350" y="350" width="65" height="65" rx="5" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <circle cx="382.5" cy="382.5" r="30" fill="white" />
    <rect x="380" y="360" width="5" height="45" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <circle cx="382.5" cy="382.5" r="25" fill="white" stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="5" />
    
    <!-- Text -->
    <text x="350" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" font-weight="bold" fill="white">NO STOPPING</text>
    <text x="357" y="430" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" font-weight="bold" fill="white">ANY TIME</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Traffic -->
  <g id="traffic">
    <!-- Car 1 -->
    <rect x="50" y="500" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <rect x="60" y="485" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b" />
    <circle cx="65" cy="525" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="105" cy="525" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Car 2 -->
    <rect x="250" y="450" width="80" height="30" rx="8" fill="#f1c40f" />
    <rect x="260" y="435" width="60" height="20" rx="5" fill="#f39c12" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="320" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Car 3 -->
    <rect x="100" y="650" width="65" height="25" rx="7" fill="#9b59b6" />
    <rect x="110" y="635" width="45" height="20" rx="5" fill="#8e44ad" />
    <circle cx="115" cy="675" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="155" cy="675" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Car 4 with animation -->
    <g>
      <rect x="380" y="700" width="70" height="30" rx="8" fill="#2ecc71">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="450;380;-100" dur="8s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </rect>
      <rect x="390" y="685" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#27ae60">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="460;390;-90" dur="8s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </rect>
      <circle cx="395" cy="730" r="8" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="465;395;-85" dur="8s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </circle>
      <circle cx="435" cy="730" r="8" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="505;435;-45" dur="8s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </circle>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="100" y="580" width="40" height="80" rx="10" fill="#27ae60" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="120" cy="550" r="20" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M100,545 Q120,525 140,545" fill="#34495e" />
    
    <!-- Face features -->

    <path d="M112,560 Q120,565 128,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />

    <rect x="85" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#27ae60" />
    <rect x="140" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#27ae60" />

    <circle cx="155" cy="640" r="7" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->

    <rect x="125" y="660" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" />

    <rect x="120" y="720" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" />

  <!-- Driver in car -->

    <ellipse cx="200" cy="583" rx="3" ry="2" fill="white" />
    <circle cx="190" cy="583" r="1" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="583" r="1" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Mouth (worried) -->
    <path d="M190,590 Q195,592 200,590" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />

  <!-- Uphill grade visualization -->
  <path d="M225,680 L225,720 M225,720 L215,705 M225,720 L235,705" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.7" />
  <text x="210" y="695" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="white" opacity="0.7">5%</text>

  <text x="420" y="450" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="white" opacity="0.5" transform="rotate(45,420,450)">Limited visibility</text>
  
  <!-- Distance indicator to safe area -->

  <text x="280" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="white">~30 feet</text>
  
  <!-- Sun setting -->

  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="60" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.3" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="80" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.1" />

</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a80cc" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="carBodyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3498db" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2980b9" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blurEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />

  <!-- Sky background -->

    <circle cx="295" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">

    <!-- Hazard light glow -->

    <!-- Steam from hood -->

      <animate attributeName="d" 
               values="M220,560 Q230,540 240,550 Q250,530 260,540;
                      M220,560 Q230,535 240,545 Q250,525 260,535;
                      M220,560 Q230,540 240,550 Q250,530 260,540" 
               dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />

  <!-- Driver looking back through rear window -->

    <!-- Hair -->

    <ellipse cx="230" cy="583" rx="3" ry="2" fill="white" />
    <circle cx="220" cy="583" r="1" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="230" cy="583" r="1" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Mouth (hopeful expression) -->
    <path d="M220,590 Q225,592 230,590" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Driver turned to look back -->

    <path d="M225,610 Q215,620 215,630" stroke="#3498db" stroke-width="8" fill="none" />

  <!-- Player character at back of car -->

    <!-- Arms in pushing position -->

    <path d="M132,560 Q140,565 148,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" transform="rotate(15,140,550)" />
    
    <!-- Sweat beads on forehead -->

    <circle cx="145" cy="532" r="2.5" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)" />
    <path d="M145,532 L143,529" stroke="#a8d8ea" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />

  <!-- Traffic -->

    <rect x="360" y="435" width="60" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b" />

    <circle cx="410" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />

    <circle cx="320" cy="580" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="365" cy="580" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

    <!-- Gradients -->

      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />

      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />

    <!-- Hazard light glow -->

      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />

    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="carBodyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3498db" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2980b9" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="shoulderGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#7f8c8d" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#95a5a6" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blurEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="hazardGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="sweatDropEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="motionBlur" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#roadGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Shoulder of road (safe area) -->
  <rect x="350" y="400" width="100" height="400" fill="url(#shoulderGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road markings -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="700" width="450" height="5" fill="yellow" />
  
  <!-- Lane dividers -->
  <line x1="0" y1="450" x2="450" y2="450" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="550" x2="450" y2="550" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="650" x2="450" y2="650" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  
  <!-- Car moving with momentum -->
  <g id="movingCar">
    <!-- Car body -->
    <rect x="250" y="600" width="150" height="60" rx="15" fill="url(#carBodyGradient)">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="150;200;250" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Car roof -->
    <rect x="270" y="560" width="110" height="50" rx="10" fill="#2980b9">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="170;220;270" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Windows -->
    <rect x="280" y="570" width="90" height="30" rx="5" fill="#a8d8ea">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="180;230;280" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Wheels with rotation animation -->
    <g>
      <circle cx="280" cy="660" r="15" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="180;230;280" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      </circle>
      <g>
        <circle cx="280" cy="660" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d">
          <animate attributeName="cx" values="180;230;280" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </circle>
        <line x1="280" y1="652" x2="280" y2="668" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2">
          <animate attributeName="x1" values="180;230;280" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="x2" values="180;230;280" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" from="0 280 660" to="720 280 660" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </line>
        <line x1="272" y1="660" x2="288" y2="660" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2">
          <animate attributeName="x1" values="172;222;272" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="x2" values="188;238;288" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" from="0 280 660" to="720 280 660" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </line>
      </g>
      
      <circle cx="370" cy="660" r="15" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="270;320;370" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      </circle>
      <g>
        <circle cx="370" cy="660" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d">
          <animate attributeName="cx" values="270;320;370" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </circle>
        <line x1="370" y1="652" x2="370" y2="668" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2">
          <animate attributeName="x1" values="270;320;370" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="x2" values="270;320;370" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" from="0 370 660" to="720 370 660" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </line>
        <line x1="362" y1="660" x2="378" y2="660" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2">
          <animate attributeName="x1" values="262;312;362" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="x2" values="278;328;378" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" from="0 370 660" to="720 370 660" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </line>
      </g>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Hazard lights -->
    <circle cx="255" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="155;205;255" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="395" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="295;345;395" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hazard light glow -->
    <circle cx="255" cy="610" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="155;205;255" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="395" cy="610" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="295;345;395" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character pushing but with decreasing effort -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Body starting to stand more upright -->
    <rect x="200" y="580" width="55" height="80" rx="10" fill="#27ae60" transform="rotate(30,227.5,620)">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="120;160;200" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,227.5,620); rotate(30,227.5,620); rotate(15,227.5,620)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="220" cy="550" r="20" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="140;180;220" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,220,550); rotate(30,220,550); rotate(10,220,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M200,545 Q220,525 240,545" fill="#34495e">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M120,545 Q140,525 160,545; M160,545 Q180,525 200,545; M200,545 Q220,525 240,545" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,220,535); rotate(30,220,535); rotate(10,220,535)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Face features -->
    <circle cx="212" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="132;172;212" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,220,550); rotate(30,220,550); rotate(10,220,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="228" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="148;188;228" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,220,550); rotate(30,220,550); rotate(10,220,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <path d="M212,560 Q220,565 228,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M132,560 Q140,565 148,560; M172,560 Q180,565 188,560; M212,560 Q220,565 228,560" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,220,550); rotate(30,220,550); rotate(10,220,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Arms with decreasing pushing effort -->
    <rect x="180" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#27ae60" transform="rotate(15,187.5,615)">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="100;140;180" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,187.5,615); rotate(30,187.5,615); rotate(15,187.5,615)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="240" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#27ae60" transform="rotate(15,247.5,615)">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="160;200;240" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,247.5,615); rotate(30,247.5,615); rotate(15,247.5,615)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Hands on trunk -->
    <circle cx="220" cy="620" r="10" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="140;180;220" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="255" cy="620" r="10" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="175;215;255" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="200" y="660" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="120;160;200" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="240" y="660" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="160;200;240" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="195" y="720" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="115;155;195" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="235" y="720" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="155;195;235" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Expression changing from strain to relief -->
    <path d="M212,560 Q220,563 228,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M132,560 Q140,563 148,560; M172,560 Q180,568 188,560; M212,560 Q220,573 228,560" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,220,550); rotate(30,220,550); rotate(10,220,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion lines indicating momentum -->
  <g stroke="#ffffff" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.5">
    <line x1="180" y1="620" x2="160" y2="620">
      <animate attributeName="x1" values="100;140;180" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="x2" values="80;120;160" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.3;0.1" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </line>
    <line x1="180" y1="640" x2="150" y2="640">
      <animate attributeName="x1" values="100;140;180" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="x2" values="70;110;150" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.3;0.1" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </line>
    <line x1="180" y1="660" x2="140" y2="660">
      <animate attributeName="x1" values="100;140;180" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="x2" values="60;100;140" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.3;0.1" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </line>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Traffic flowing normally -->
  <g id="traffic">
    <!-- Car 1 -->
    <g>
      <rect x="350" y="450" width="80" height="30" rx="8" fill="#e74c3c" />
      <rect x="360" y="435" width="60" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b" />
      <circle cx="370" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
      <circle cx="410" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Car 2 -->
    <g>
      <rect x="50" y="500" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#f1c40f" />
      <rect x="60" y="485" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#f39c12" />
      <circle cx="65" cy="525" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
      <circle cx="105" cy="525" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Car 3 -->
    <g>
      <rect x="300" y="550" width="75" height="30" rx="8" fill="#9b59b6" />
      <rect x="310" y="535" width="55" height="20" rx="5" fill="#8e44ad" />
      <circle cx="320" cy="580" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
      <circle cx="365" cy="580" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Car 4 with animation -->
    <g>
      <rect x="380" y="650" width="70" height="30" rx="8" fill="#2ecc71">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="450;380;-100" dur="10s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </rect>
      <rect x="390" y="635" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#27ae60">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="460;390;-90" dur="10s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </rect>
      <circle cx="395" cy="680" r="8" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="465;395;-85" dur="10s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </circle>
      <circle cx="435" cy="680" r="8" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cx" values="505;435;-45" dur="10s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      </circle>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sun setting -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="40" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.8" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="60" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.3" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="80" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.1" />
  
  <!-- Lens flare -->
  <circle cx="300" cy="200" r="10" fill="white" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#blurEffect)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="150" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#blurEffect)" />
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a80cc" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="carBodyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3498db" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2980b9" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="shoulderGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#7f8c8d" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#95a5a6" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blurEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="hazardGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="warmGlow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="5" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#roadGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Shoulder of road (safe area) -->
  <rect x="350" y="400" width="100" height="400" fill="url(#shoulderGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road markings -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="700" width="450" height="5" fill="yellow" />
  
  <!-- Lane dividers -->
  <line x1="0" y1="450" x2="450" y2="450" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="550" x2="450" y2="550" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="650" x2="450" y2="650" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  
  <!-- Car safely on shoulder -->
  <g id="carOnShoulder">
    <!-- Car body -->
    <rect x="370" y="600" width="150" height="60" rx="15" fill="url(#carBodyGradient)" transform="rotate(-5,445,630)" />
    
    <!-- Car roof -->
    <rect x="390" y="560" width="110" height="50" rx="10" fill="#2980b9" transform="rotate(-5,445,585)" />
    
    <!-- Windows -->
    <rect x="400" y="570" width="90" height="30" rx="5" fill="#a8d8ea" transform="rotate(-5,445,585)" />
    
    <!-- Wheels -->
    <circle cx="400" cy="660" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="400" cy="660" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <circle cx="490" cy="660" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="490" cy="660" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Hazard lights -->
    <circle cx="375" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="515" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hazard light glow -->
    <circle cx="375" cy="610" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="515" cy="610" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character standing upright -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="270" y="580" width="55" height="80" rx="10" fill="#27ae60" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="297.5" cy="550" r="20" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M277.5,545 Q297.5,525 317.5,545" fill="#34495e" />
    
    <!-- Face features -->
    <circle cx="290" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="305" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <path d="M290,560 Q297.5,565 305,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="250" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#27ae60" />
    <rect x="330" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#27ae60" />
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <circle cx="250" cy="640" r="10" fill="#f5cba7" />
    <circle cx="345" cy="640" r="10" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->

    <rect x="305" y="660" width="20" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="265" y="720" width="30" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <rect x="300" y="720" width="30" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Relief expression -->
    <path d="M290,560 Q297.5,567 305,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Driver character -->
  <g id="driver">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="340" y="580" width="45" height="70" rx="10" fill="#3498db" transform="rotate(-5,362.5,615)" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="362.5" cy="550" r="18" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M344.5,545 Q362.5,525 380.5,545" fill="#6c3483" />
    
    <!-- Face features -->
    <circle cx="355" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="370" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <path d="M355,560 Q362.5,567 370,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="325" y="590" width="15" height="40" rx="7" fill="#3498db" transform="rotate(-20,332.5,610)" />
    <rect x="385" y="590" width="15" height="40" rx="7" fill="#3498db" transform="rotate(20,392.5,610)" />
    
    <!-- Hand shaking with player -->
    <circle cx="325" cy="630" r="8" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Legs (partially visible) -->
    <rect x="340" y="650" width="20" height="30" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(-5,350,665)" />
    <rect x="365" y="650" width="20" height="30" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(-5,375,665)" />
    
    <!-- Purse offering as thanks -->
    <rect x="385" cy="600" width="25" height="20" rx="5" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <rect x="390" cy="590" width="15" height="10" rx="3" fill="#c0392b" />
    <circle cx="397.5" cy="600" r="3" fill="#f1c40f" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Handshake between driver and player -->
  <g id="handshake">
