    <circle cx="145" cy="625" r="10" fill="#f5cba7" />
    <circle cx="180" cy="625" r="10" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Head with extreme strain -->
    <circle cx="140" cy="550" r="20" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(75,140,550)">
      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" 
                      values="75 140 550; 80 140 550; 75 140 550; 70 140 550; 75 140 550" 
                      dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M120,545 Q140,525 160,545" fill="#34495e" transform="rotate(75,140,535)">
      <animateTransform attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" 
                      values="75 140 535; 80 140 535; 75 140 535; 70 140 535; 75 140 535" 
                      dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Face features showing extreme strain -->
    <circle cx="132" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(75,140,550)" />
    <circle cx="148" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(75,140,550)" />
    <path d="M132,560 Q140,568 148,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" transform="rotate(75,140,550)" />
    
    <!-- Sweat beads flying off due to wind -->
    <circle cx="125" cy="535" r="3" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="125;120;115" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="535;530;525" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <circle cx="135" cy="530" r="2" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="135;130;125" dur="0.4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="530;525;520" dur="0.4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <circle cx="145" cy="532" r="2.5" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="145;140;135" dur="0.6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="532;527;522" dur="0.6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Large truck approaching -->
  <g id="approachingTruck">
    <!-- Truck body -->
    <rect x="300" y="525" width="200" height="70" rx="10" fill="#7f8c8d">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="450;300;150" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Truck cab -->
    <rect x="300" y="495" width="80" height="30" rx="5" fill="#95a5a6">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="450;300;150" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Truck windows -->
    <rect x="310" y="500" width="60" height="20" rx="3" fill="#bdc3c7">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="460;310;160" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Truck wheels -->
    <circle cx="320" cy="595" r="15" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="470;320;170" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="370" cy="595" r="15" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="520;370;220" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="420" cy="595" r="15" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="570;420;270" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="470" cy="595" r="15" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="620;470;320" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Truck horn visualization -->
    <path d="M300,510 Q280,500 300,490 Q280,480 300,470" stroke="#ecf0f1" stroke-width="3" fill="none" opacity="0.7">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M450,510 Q430,500 450,490 Q430,480 450,470; M300,510 Q280,500 300,490 Q280,480 300,470; M150,510 Q130,500 150,490 Q130,480 150,470" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;0.7;0.7" dur="1s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Truck headlights -->
    <circle cx="305" cy="580" r="10" fill="#f1c40f" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#truckGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="455;305;155" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="495" cy="580" r="10" fill="#f1c40f" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#truckGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="645;495;345" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wind disturbance effect from passing truck -->
  <g id="windEffect">
    <path d="M150,550 Q170,560 190,550 Q210,540 230,550" stroke="#ecf0f1" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#windEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;0.3;0" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    <path d="M150,570 Q180,585 210,570 Q240,555 270,570" stroke="#ecf0f1" stroke-width="3" fill="none" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#windEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;0.3;0" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    <path d="M150,590 Q190,610 230,590 Q270,570 310,590" stroke="#ecf0f1" stroke-width="4" fill="none" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#windEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;0.3;0" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Other traffic -->
  <g id="traffic">
    <!-- Car 1 -->
    <rect x="350" y="450" width="80" height="30" rx="8" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <rect x="360" y="435" width="60" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b" />
    <circle cx="370" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="410" cy="480" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Car 2 -->
    <rect x="50" y="500" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#f1c40f" />
    <rect x="60" y="485" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#f39c12" />
    <circle cx="65" cy="525" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="105" cy="525" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Car 3 -->
    <rect x="300" y="650" width="75" height="30" rx="8" fill="#9b59b6" />
    <rect x="310" y="635" width="55" height="20" rx="5" fill="#8e44ad" />
    <circle cx="320" cy="680" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="365" cy="680" r="8" fill="#2c3e50" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Backed up traffic -->
  <g id="backedUpTraffic">
    <rect x="50" y="600" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#3498db" />
    <rect x="60" y="585" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#2980b9" />
    <circle cx="65" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="105" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <rect x="0" y="600" width="40" height="25" rx="7" fill="#2ecc71" />
    <rect x="5" y="585" width="30" height="20" rx="5" fill="#27ae60" />
    <circle cx="10" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="30" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <rect x="-50" y="600" width="40" height="25" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-50;-30;-10" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="-45" y="585" width="30" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-45;-25;-5" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sun setting -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="40" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.8" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="60" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.3" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="80" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.1" />
  
  <!-- Lens flare -->
  <circle cx="300" cy="200" r="10" fill="white" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#blurEffect)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="150" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#blurEffect)" />
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a80cc" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="carBodyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3498db" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2980b9" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="hillGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#333333" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#222222" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blurEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="hazardGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="steamEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="sweatDropEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="brakeLightGlow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#roadGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road markings -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="700" width="450" height="5" fill="yellow" />
  
  <!-- Lane dividers -->
  <line x1="0" y1="450" x2="450" y2="450" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="550" x2="450" y2="550" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="650" x2="450" y2="650" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  
  <!-- Uphill grade visualization -->
  <path d="M0,450 L450,400 L450,450 L0,500 Z" fill="url(#hillGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Stalled car rolling backward slightly -->
  <g id="stalledCar">
    <!-- Car body -->
    <rect x="150" y="600" width="150" height="60" rx="15" fill="url(#carBodyGradient)">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="600;605;610" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Car roof -->
    <rect x="170" y="560" width="110" height="50" rx="10" fill="#2980b9">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="560;565;570" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Windows -->
    <rect x="180" y="570" width="90" height="30" rx="5" fill="#a8d8ea">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="570;575;580" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Wheels with backward rotation -->
    <g>
      <circle cx="180" cy="660" r="15" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cy" values="660;665;670" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      </circle>
      <g>
        <circle cx="180" cy="660" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d">
          <animate attributeName="cy" values="660;665;670" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </circle>
        <line x1="180" y1="652" x2="180" y2="668" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2">
          <animate attributeName="y1" values="652;657;662" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="y2" values="668;673;678" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" from="0 180 660" to="-90 180 665" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </line>
        <line x1="172" y1="660" x2="188" y2="660" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2">
          <animate attributeName="y1" values="660;665;670" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="y2" values="660;665;670" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" from="0 180 660" to="-90 180 665" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </line>
      </g>
      
      <circle cx="270" cy="660" r="15" fill="#2c3e50">
        <animate attributeName="cy" values="660;665;670" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      </circle>
      <g>
        <circle cx="270" cy="660" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d">
          <animate attributeName="cy" values="660;665;670" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </circle>
        <line x1="270" y1="652" x2="270" y2="668" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2">
          <animate attributeName="y1" values="652;657;662" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="y2" values="668;673;678" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" from="0 270 660" to="-90 270 665" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </line>
        <line x1="262" y1="660" x2="278" y2="660" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2">
          <animate attributeName="y1" values="660;665;670" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="y2" values="660;665;670" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
          <animate attributeName="transform" attributeType="XML" type="rotate" from="0 270 660" to="-90 270 665" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
        </line>
      </g>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Brake lights flickering -->
    <rect x="155" y="630" width="10" height="5" rx="1" fill="#e74c3c">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="630;635;640" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;1;0;1;0;1" dur="1.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="285" y="630" width="10" height="5" rx="1" fill="#e74c3c">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="630;635;640" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;1;0;1;0;1" dur="1.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Brake light glow -->
    <rect x="155" y="630" width="10" height="5" rx="1" fill="#e74c3c" filter="url(#brakeLightGlow)" opacity="0.5">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="630;635;640" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;0.5;0;0.5;0;0.5" dur="1.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="285" y="630" width="10" height="5" rx="1" fill="#e74c3c" filter="url(#brakeLightGlow)" opacity="0.5">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="630;635;640" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;0.5;0;0.5;0;0.5" dur="1.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Hazard lights -->
    <circle cx="155" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="610;615;620" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="295" cy="610" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="610;615;620" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hazard light glow -->
    <circle cx="155" cy="610" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="610;615;620" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="295" cy="610" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="y" values="610;615;620" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Steam from hood -->
    <path d="M220,560 Q230,540 240,550 Q250,530 260,540" 
          stroke="white" stroke-width="5" fill="none" opacity="0.7" filter="url(#steamEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="d" 
               values="M220,560 Q230,540 240,550 Q250,530 260,540;
                      M220,565 Q230,545 240,555 Q250,535 260,545;
                      M220,570 Q230,550 240,560 Q250,540 260,550" 
               dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Driver with panicked expression -->
  <g id="driver">
    <!-- Driver's face visible through rear window -->
    <circle cx="225" cy="585" r="12" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="585;590;595" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M213,580 Q225,570 237,580" fill="#6c3483">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M213,580 Q225,570 237,580; M213,585 Q225,575 237,585; M213,590 Q225,580 237,590" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Eyes wide with panic -->
    <ellipse cx="220" cy="583" rx="4" ry="4" fill="white">
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="583;588;593" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </ellipse>
    <ellipse cx="230" cy="583" rx="4" ry="4" fill="white">
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="583;588;593" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </ellipse>
    <circle cx="220" cy="583" r="2" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="583;588;593" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="230" cy="583" r="2" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="583;588;593" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows raised in alarm -->
    <path d="M216,576 Q220,572 224,576" stroke="#6c3483" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M216,576 Q220,572 224,576; M216,581 Q220,577 224,581; M216,586 Q220,582 224,586" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    <path d="M226,576 Q230,572 234,576" stroke="#6c3483" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M226,576 Q230,572 234,576; M226,581 Q230,577 234,581; M226,586 Q230,582 234,586" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Mouth open in panic -->
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="593" rx="5" ry="3" fill="#c0392b">
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="593;598;603" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </ellipse>
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="593" rx="3" ry="1.5" fill="#7f8c8d">
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="593;598;603" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </ellipse>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character slipping -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Legs slipping -->
    <rect x="120" y="660" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(-15,127.5,690)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(-15,127.5,690); rotate(-20,127.5,690); rotate(-25,127.5,690)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="160" y="660" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(10,167.5,690)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(10,167.5,690); rotate(15,167.5,690); rotate(20,167.5,690)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Shoes slipping -->
    <rect x="115" y="720" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" transform="rotate(-15,127.5,725)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(-15,127.5,725); rotate(-20,127.5,725); rotate(-25,127.5,725)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="155" y="720" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" transform="rotate(10,167.5,725)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(10,167.5,725); rotate(15,167.5,725); rotate(20,167.5,725)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Feet slipping marks -->
    <path d="M120,720 L110,730" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M120,720 L110,730; M115,720 L100,735; M110,720 L90,740" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    <path d="M160,720 L150,730" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M160,720 L150,730; M165,720 L160,735; M170,720 L170,740" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Body losing balance -->
    <rect x="120" y="580" width="55" height="80" rx="10" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(60,147.5,620)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(60,147.5,620); rotate(65,147.5,620); rotate(70,147.5,620)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Arms flailing -->
    <rect x="100" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(45,107.5,615)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(45,107.5,615); rotate(60,107.5,615); rotate(75,107.5,615)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="180" y="590" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(75,187.5,615)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(75,187.5,615); rotate(90,187.5,615); rotate(105,187.5,615)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Hands losing grip -->
    <circle cx="145" cy="625" r="10" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="145;140;135" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="625;620;615" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="180" cy="625" r="10" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="180;185;190" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="cy" values="625;620;615" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Head with extreme strain -->
    <circle cx="140" cy="550" r="20" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(60,140,550)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(60,140,550); rotate(65,140,550); rotate(70,140,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M120,545 Q140,525 160,545" fill="#34495e" transform="rotate(60,140,535)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(60,140,535); rotate(65,140,535); rotate(70,140,535)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Face features showing extreme strain and alarm -->
    <circle cx="132" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(60,140,550)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(60,140,550); rotate(65,140,550); rotate(70,140,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="148" cy="545" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(60,140,550)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(60,140,550); rotate(65,140,550); rotate(70,140,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <path d="M132,560 Q140,570 148,560" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" transform="rotate(60,140,550)">
      <animate attributeName="transform" values="rotate(60,140,550); rotate(65,140,550); rotate(70,140,550)" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Sweat beads -->
    <circle cx="125" cy="535" r="3" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0.5;0" dur="1s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="135" cy="530" r="2" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0.5;0" dur="1.5s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="145" cy="532" r="2.5" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0.5;0" dur="2s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Other drivers with impatient expressions -->
  <g id="impatientDrivers">
    <!-- Driver 1 -->
    <circle cx="385" cy="445" r="8" fill="#f5cba7" />
    <path d="M382,442 L388,442" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M382,448 Q385,445 388,448" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Driver 2 -->
    <circle cx="85" cy="495" r="7" fill="#f5cba7" />
    <path d="M82,492 L88,492" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M82,498 Q85,495 88,498" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Driver 3 -->
    <circle cx="337.5" cy="545" r="8" fill="#f5cba7" />
    <path d="M334.5,542 L340.5,542" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M334.5,548 Q337.5,545 340.5,548" stroke="#c0392b" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    <path d="M345,535 L350,530" stroke="#f5cba7" stroke-width="3" fill="none" />
    <path d="M350,530 L355,535" stroke="#f5cba7" stroke-width="3" fill="none" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Traffic backing up -->
  <g id="backedUpTraffic">
    <rect x="50" y="600" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#3498db" />
    <rect x="60" y="585" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#2980b9" />
    <circle cx="65" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="105" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <rect x="0" y="600" width="40" height="25" rx="7" fill="#2ecc71" />
    <rect x="5" y="585" width="30" height="20" rx="5" fill="#27ae60" />
    <circle cx="10" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="30" cy="625" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <rect x="-50" y="600" width="40" height="25" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-50;-30;-10" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="-45" y="585" width="30" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-45;-25;-5" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <rect x="-100" y="600" width="40" height="25" rx="7" fill="#f1c40f">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-100;-80;-60" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="-95" y="585" width="30" height="20" rx="5" fill="#f39c12">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-95;-75;-55" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sun setting -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="40" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.8" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="60" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.3" />
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="80" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.1" />
  
  <!-- Lens flare -->
  <circle cx="300" cy="200" r="10" fill="white" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#blurEffect)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="150" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.2" filter="url(#blurEffect)" />
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a80cc" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="carBodyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3498db" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2980b9" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="policeCarGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2c3e50" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#34495e" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blurEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="hazardGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="steamEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="sweatDropEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="policeLightsGlow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="4" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="450" height="400" fill="url(#roadGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road markings -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="700" width="450" height="5" fill="yellow" />
  
  <!-- Lane dividers -->
  <line x1="0" y1="450" x2="450" y2="450" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="550" x2="450" y2="550" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="650" x2="450" y2="650" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  
  <!-- Stalled car -->
  <g id="stalledCar">
    <!-- Car body -->
    <rect x="150" y="610" width="150" height="60" rx="15" fill="url(#carBodyGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Car roof -->
    <rect x="170" y="570" width="110" height="50" rx="10" fill="#2980b9" />
    
    <!-- Windows -->
    <rect x="180" y="580" width="90" height="30" rx="5" fill="#a8d8ea" />
    
    <!-- Wheels -->
    <circle cx="180" cy="670" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="180" cy="670" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="670" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="670" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Hazard lights -->
    <circle cx="155" cy="620" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="295" cy="620" r="5" fill="#ff9900">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Hazard light glow -->
    <circle cx="155" cy="620" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="295" cy="620" r="10" fill="#ff9900" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#hazardGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="1s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Steam from hood -->
    <path d="M220,570 Q230,550 240,560 Q250,540 260,550" 
          stroke="white" stroke-width="5" fill="none" opacity="0.7" filter="url(#steamEffect)">
      <animate attributeName="d" 
               values="M220,570 Q230,550 240,560 Q250,540 260,550;
                      M220,570 Q230,545 240,555 Q250,535 260,545;
                      M220,570 Q230,550 240,560 Q250,540 260,550" 
               dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Driver with panicked expression -->
  <g id="driver">
    <!-- Driver's face visible through window -->
    <circle cx="225" cy="595" r="12" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M213,590 Q225,580 237,590" fill="#6c3483" />
    
    <!-- Eyes wide with panic -->
    <ellipse cx="220" cy="593" rx="4" ry="4" fill="white" />
    <ellipse cx="230" cy="593" rx="4" ry="4" fill="white" />
    <circle cx="220" cy="593" r="2" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="230" cy="593" r="2" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Eyebrows raised in alarm -->
    <path d="M216,586 Q220,582 224,586" stroke="#6c3483" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
    <path d="M226,586 Q230,582 234,586" stroke="#6c3483" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Mouth open in panic -->
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="603" rx="5" ry="3" fill="#c0392b" />
    <ellipse cx="225" cy="603" rx="3" ry="1.5" fill="#7f8c8d" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character exhausted -->
  <g id="playerCharacter">
    <!-- Body bent over in exhaustion -->
    <rect x="100" y="620" width="55" height="80" rx="10" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(30,127.5,660)" />
    
    <!-- Head hanging down -->
    <circle cx="120" cy="590" r="20" fill="#f5cba7" transform="rotate(30,120,590)" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M100,585 Q120,565 140,585" fill="#34495e" transform="rotate(30,120,575)" />
    
    <!-- Face features showing exhaustion -->
    <circle cx="112" cy="585" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(30,120,590)" />
    <circle cx="128" cy="585" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" transform="rotate(30,120,590)" />
    <path d="M112,595 Q120,592 128,595" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" transform="rotate(30,120,590)" />
    
    <!-- Arms hanging down -->
    <rect x="80" y="630" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(10,87.5,655)" />
    <rect x="160" y="630" width="15" height="50" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(-10,167.5,655)" />
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <circle cx="85" cy="680" r="10" fill="#f5cba7" />
    <circle cx="165" cy="680" r="10" fill="#f5cba7" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="100" y="700" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <rect x="140" y="700" width="15" height="60" rx="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <rect x="95" y="760" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    <rect x="135" y="760" width="25" height="10" rx="5" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Sweat beads -->
    <circle cx="105" cy="575" r="3" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)" />
    <path d="M105,575 L103,572" stroke="#a8d8ea" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <circle cx="115" cy="570" r="2" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)" />
    <path d="M115,570 L113,568" stroke="#a8d8ea" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <circle cx="125" cy="572" r="2.5" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)" />
    <path d="M125,572 L123,569" stroke="#a8d8ea" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    
    <circle cx="135" cy="575" r="3" fill="#a8d8ea" filter="url(#sweatDropEffect)" />
    <path d="M135,575 L133,572" stroke="#a8d8ea" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Police car approaching -->
  <g id="policeCar">
    <!-- Car body -->
    <rect x="350" y="450" width="90" height="35" rx="8" fill="url(#policeCarGradient)">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="450;350" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Car roof -->
    <rect x="365" y="435" width="60" height="20" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="465;365" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Windows -->
    <rect x="370" y="440" width="50" height="10" rx="3" fill="#a8d8ea">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="470;370" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Wheels -->
    <circle cx="365" cy="485" r="10" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="465;365" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="425" cy="485" r="10" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="525;425" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Police lights -->
    <rect x="385" y="435" width="20" height="5" rx="2" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="485;385" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Red light -->
    <circle cx="390" cy="435" r="3" fill="#e74c3c">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="490;390" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="1;0;1" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Blue light -->
    <circle cx="400" cy="435" r="3" fill="#3498db">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="500;400" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;1;0" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Police lights glow -->
    <circle cx="390" cy="435" r="8" fill="#e74c3c" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#policeLightsGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="490;390" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0;0.5" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="400" cy="435" r="8" fill="#3498db" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#policeLightsGlow)">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="500;400" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
      <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0;0.5;0" dur="0.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Police markings -->
    <rect x="370" y="460" width="50" height="10" rx="2" fill="white">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="470;370" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <text x="375" y="468" font-family="Arial" font-size="7" font-weight="bold" fill="#2c3e50">POLICE</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Police officer -->
  <g id="policeOfficer">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="350" y="400" width="30" height="60" rx="8" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="450;350" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="365" cy="385" r="15" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="465;365" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Police hat -->
    <path d="M350,380 L380,380 L380,375 Q365,370 350,375 Z" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M450,380 L480,380 L480,375 Q465,370 450,375 Z; M350,380 L380,380 L380,375 Q365,370 350,375 Z" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Hat badge -->
    <circle cx="365" cy="375" r="3" fill="#f1c40f">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="465;365" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Face features -->
    <circle cx="360" cy="383" r="2" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="460;360" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="370" cy="383" r="2" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="470;370" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <path d="M360,390 Q365,392 370,390" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" fill="none">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M460,390 Q465,392 470,390; M360,390 Q365,392 370,390" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="335" y="410" width="10" height="40" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="435;335" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="385" y="410" width="10" height="40" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="485;385" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <circle cx="340" cy="450" r="6" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="440;340" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    <circle cx="390" cy="450" r="6" fill="#f5cba7">
      <animate attributeName="cx" values="490;390" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </circle>
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="350" y="460" width="12" height="40" rx="6" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="450;350" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="368" y="460" width="12" height="40" rx="6" fill="#2c3e50">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="468;368" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Concerned expression -->
    <path d="M357,380 Q360,378 363,380" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" fill="none">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M457,380 Q460,378 463,380; M357,380 Q360,378 363,380" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
    <path d="M367,380 Q370,378 373,380" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="1" fill="none">
      <animate attributeName="d" values="M467,380 Q470,378 473,380; M367,380 Q370,378 373,380" dur="3s" fill="freeze" />
    </path>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Extensive traffic jam -->
  <g id="trafficJam">
    <!-- Cars in left lane backed up -->
    <rect x="0" y="450" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <rect x="10" y="435" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b" />
    <circle cx="15" cy="475" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="55" cy="475" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <rect x="-80" y="450" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#f1c40f">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-80;-40;0" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="-70" y="435" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#f39c12">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-70;-30;10" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <rect x="-160" y="450" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#3498db">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-160;-120;-80" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="-150" y="435" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#2980b9">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-150;-110;-70" dur="5s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Cars in right lane backed up -->
    <rect x="0" y="550" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#9b59b6" />
    <rect x="10" y="535" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#8e44ad" />
    <circle cx="15" cy="575" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="55" cy="575" r="7" fill="#2c3e50" />
    
    <rect x="-80" y="550" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#1abc9c">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-80;-40;0" dur="4s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="-70" y="535" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#16a085">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-70;-30;10" dur="4s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <rect x="-160" y="550" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#f1c40f">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-160;-120;-80" dur="4s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    <rect x="-150" y="535" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#f39c12">
      <animate attributeName="x" values="-150;-110;-70" dur="4s" fill="freeze" />
    </rect>
    
    <!-- Cars making dangerous maneuvers -->
    <g>
      <rect x="80" y="500" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#e74c3c" transform="rotate(-10,115,512.5)">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="80;120;160" dur="2s" fill="freeze" />
        <animate attributeName="y" values="500;475;450" dur="2s" fill="freeze" />
      </rect>
      <rect x="90" y="485" width="50" height="20" rx="5" fill="#c0392b" transform="rotate(-10,115,495)">
        <animate attributeName="x" values="90;130;170" dur="2s" fill="freeze" />
        <animate attributeName="y" values="485;460;435" dur="2s" fill="freeze" />
      </rect>
    </g>
    
    <g>
      <rect x="300" y="550" width="70" height="25" rx="7" fill="#2ecc71" transform="rotate(10,335,562.5)">

  <!-- Sun setting -->

  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="60" fill="#ff7e5f" opacity="0.3" />

</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 450 800" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <!-- Gradients -->
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a80cc" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f7b267" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff7e5f" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#555555" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#333333" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="carBodyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3498db" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2980b9" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="policeCarGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2c3e50" />

    </linearGradient>
    
    <linearGradient id="towTruckGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#f39c12" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#e67e22" />
    </linearGradient>
    
    <!-- Filters -->
    <filter id="blurEffect" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="hazardGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="3" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="steamEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="sweatDropEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="1" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="policeLightsGlow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="4" />
    </filter>
    
    <filter id="towTruckLightsGlow" x="-30%" y="-30%" width="160%" height="160%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="4" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky background - elevated angle -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="450" height="350" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road from elevated angle -->
  <rect x="0" y="350" width="450" height="450" fill="url(#roadGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Road markings from elevated angle -->
  <rect x="0" y="450" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="550" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="650" width="450" height="5" fill="white" />
  <rect x="0" y="750" width="450" height="5" fill="yellow" />
  
  <!-- Lane dividers from elevated angle -->
  <line x1="0" y1="400" x2="450" y2="400" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="500" x2="450" y2="500" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="600" x2="450" y2="600" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  <line x1="0" y1="700" x2="450" y2="700" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="20 10" />
  
  <!-- Stalled car still blocking traffic -->
  <g id="stalledCar">
    <!-- Car body -->
    <rect x="150" y="610" width="150" height="60" rx="15" fill="url(#carBodyGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Car roof -->
    <rect x="170" y="570" width="110" height="50" rx="10" fill="#2980b9" />
    
    <!-- Windows -->
    <rect x="180" y="580" width="90" height="30" rx="5" fill="#a8d8ea" />

    <circle cx="270" cy="670" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="670" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" />
    
    <!-- Hazard lights -->

                      M220,570 Q230,550 240,560 Q250,540 260,550" 
               dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />

  </g>
  
  <!-- Driver with panicked expression -->
  <g id="driver">

    <circle cx="225" cy="595" r="12" fill="#f5cba7" />

  <!-- Player character stepping back in defeat -->

    <rect x="80" y="620" width="45" height="80" rx="10" fill="#e74c3c" />

  </g>
  
  <!-- Police car with lights flashing -->

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="#1E90FF" />
  
  <!-- Water splashes and ripples in background -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="20" fill="white" opacity="0.2" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="200" r="30" fill="white" opacity="0.1" />
  <circle cx="250" cy="150" r="25" fill="white" opacity="0.15" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="250" r="15" fill="white" opacity="0.2" />
  <path d="M20,300 Q40,280 60,300 Q80,320 100,300" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.3" />
  <path d="M220,350 Q240,330 260,350 Q280,370 300,350" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.3" />
  
  <!-- Close-up of hands gripping paddle -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 350) scale(2)">
    <!-- Paddle shaft -->
    <line x1="-50" y1="0" x2="50" y2="0" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Left paddle blade -->
    <ellipse cx="-55" cy="0" rx="12" ry="5" fill="#D2B48C" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Right paddle blade -->
    <ellipse cx="55" cy="0" rx="12" ry="5" fill="#D2B48C" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Left hand -->
    <path d="M-35,-10 C-40,-12 -45,-8 -45,-5 L-45,5 C-45,8 -40,12 -35,10 L-25,10 C-20,12 -15,8 -15,5 L-15,-5 C-15,-8 -20,-12 -25,-10 Z" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Left hand knuckles -->
    <line x1="-40" y1="-8" x2="-40" y2="8" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <line x1="-35" y1="-9" x2="-35" y2="9" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <line x1="-30" y1="-9" x2="-30" y2="9" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <line x1="-25" y1="-9" x2="-25" y2="9" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <line x1="-20" y1="-8" x2="-20" y2="8" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    
    <!-- Right hand -->
    <path d="M35,-10 C40,-12 45,-8 45,-5 L45,5 C45,8 40,12 35,10 L25,10 C20,12 15,8 15,5 L15,-5 C15,-8 20,-12 25,-10 Z" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Right hand knuckles -->
    <line x1="40" y1="-8" x2="40" y2="8" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <line x1="35" y1="-9" x2="35" y2="9" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <line x1="30" y1="-9" x2="30" y2="9" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <line x1="25" y1="-9" x2="25" y2="9" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <line x1="20" y1="-8" x2="20" y2="8" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" />
    
    <!-- Tension lines to show tight grip -->
    <path d="M-42,-12 L-38,-15" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <path d="M-32,-12 L-28,-15" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <path d="M-22,-12 L-18,-15" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <path d="M42,-12 L38,-15" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <path d="M32,-12 L28,-15" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <path d="M22,-12 L18,-15" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.5" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Water droplets on paddle shaft -->
  <circle cx="160" cy="330" r="3" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
  <ellipse cx="175" cy="345" rx="2" ry="4" fill="white" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(45, 175, 345)" />
  <circle cx="210" cy="335" r="2" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
  <ellipse cx="230" cy="350" rx="1.5" ry="3" fill="white" opacity="0.8" transform="rotate(-30, 230, 350)" />
  <circle cx="250" cy="340" r="2.5" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
  
  <!-- Dripping water effect -->
  <path d="M180,370 C180,380 175,390 180,400" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
  <path d="M240,365 C240,375 235,385 240,395" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
  
  <!-- "GRIP TIGHT!" text -->
  <g transform="translate(320, 80)">
    <rect x="-60" y="-25" width="120" height="40" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#FF0000" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2" />
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="Impact, sans-serif" font-size="24" fill="white" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="middle">GRIP TIGHT!</text>
    
    <!-- Exclamation mark emphasis -->
    <path d="M70,0 L80,-10 L90,0 L80,10 Z" fill="yellow" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
    <text x="80" y="0" font-family="Impact, sans-serif" font-size="24" fill="black" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="middle">!</text>
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">

      <!-- Arms - paddling motion -->
      <path d="M-10,-15 L-40,10" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
      <path d="M10,-15 L30,-25" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
      
      <!-- Paddle -->
      <line x1="-50" y1="15" x2="40" y2="-30" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="3" />
      <ellipse cx="-50" cy="15" rx="8" ry="3" fill="#D2B48C" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(45, -50, 15)" />
      <ellipse cx="40" cy="-30" rx="8" ry="3" fill="#D2B48C" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(45, 40, -30)" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion lines behind paddle -->
  <g class="motion-lines">
    <path d="M120,590 C130,580 140,570 150,565" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <path d="M130,600 C140,590 150,580 160,575" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <path d="M140,610 C150,600 160,590 170,585" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Water splashes where paddle enters water -->
  <g class="water-splashes">
    <circle cx="150" cy="565" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
    <circle cx="155" cy="570" r="3" fill="white" opacity="0.7" />
    <circle cx="145" cy="560" r="4" fill="white" opacity="0.6" />
    <path d="M140,565 L135,555" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M150,570 L155,560" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M160,565 L165,555" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">

  <!-- Obstacles - rocks -->

    <path d="M210,650 L200,650 L215,620 L230,650 L220,650 L220,670 L210,670 Z" fill="#006400" />
    <path d="M230,550 L220,550 L235,520 L250,550 L240,550 L240,570 L230,570 Z" fill="#006400" />

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <linearGradient id="waterGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
    <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#1E90FF;stop-opacity:1" />
    <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#0000CD;stop-opacity:1" />
  </linearGradient>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#waterGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Dramatic angle view of water rushing against kayak bow -->
  
  <!-- Distant water lines -->
  <g class="distant-water">
    <path d="M0,100 Q100,80 200,100 Q300,120 400,100" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" fill="none" opacity="0.3" />
    <path d="M0,150 Q100,130 200,150 Q300,170 400,150" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" fill="none" opacity="0.4" />
    <path d="M0,200 Q100,180 200,200 Q300,220 400,200" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" fill="none" opacity="0.5" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Mid-distance water rushing -->
  <g class="mid-water">
    <path d="M0,250 Q100,220 200,250 Q300,280 400,250" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
    <path d="M0,300 Q100,270 200,300 Q300,330 400,300" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.7" />
    <path d="M0,350 Q100,320 200,350 Q300,380 400,350" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" fill="none" opacity="0.8" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Foreground rushing water -->
  <g class="foreground-water">
    <path d="M0,400 Q100,360 200,400 Q300,440 400,400" stroke="white" stroke-width="4" fill="none" opacity="0.9" />
    <path d="M0,450 Q100,410 200,450 Q300,490 400,450" stroke="white" stroke-width="5" fill="none" />
    <path d="M0,500 Q100,460 200,500 Q300,540 400,500" stroke="white" stroke-width="5" fill="none" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Kayak bow from dramatic angle -->
  <g class="kayak" transform="translate(200, 550)">
    <!-- Kayak body -->
    <path d="M0,-100 C-40,-60 -60,-20 -70,0 C-60,20 -40,40 0,60 C40,40 60,20 70,0 C60,-20 40,-60 0,-100 Z" 
          fill="#FF0000" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="3" />
    
    <!-- Kayak details -->
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="40" ry="20" fill="#FFDDDD" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="2" />
    <path d="M-40,-30 C-30,-35 30,-35 40,-30" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    <path d="M-40,30 C-30,35 30,35 40,30" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Character visible in kayak (partial view) -->
    <g class="character">
      <rect x="-15" y="-10" width="30" height="20" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#1E90FF" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
      <circle cx="0" cy="-20" r="12" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
      <circle cx="-4" cy="-22" r="2" fill="#000000" /> <!-- Left eye -->
      <circle cx="4" cy="-22" r="2" fill="#000000" /> <!-- Right eye -->
      <path d="M-5,-15 C0,-12 5,-12 10,-15" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" fill="none" /> <!-- Determined mouth -->
      <path d="M-6,-26 L-2,-24 M6,-26 L2,-24" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="2" fill="none" /> <!-- Determined eyebrows -->
    </g>
    
    <!-- Paddle visible from this angle -->
    <line x1="-60" y1="-20" x2="60" y2="-20" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="3" />
    <ellipse cx="-60" cy="-20" rx="8" ry="3" fill="#D2B48C" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
    <ellipse cx="60" cy="-20" rx="8" ry="3" fill="#D2B48C" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- White water splashes against bow -->
  <g class="splashes">
    <!-- Large splash waves -->
    <path d="M130,500 C150,480 170,490 190,470 C210,490 230,480 250,470 C270,490 290,480 310,500" 
          fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
    
    <!-- Spray and droplets -->
    <circle cx="150" cy="480" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="160" cy="470" r="3" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="170" cy="460" r="4" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="180" cy="450" r="2" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="190" cy="440" r="3" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="430" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="210" cy="440" r="3" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="220" cy="450" r="4" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="230" cy="460" r="2" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="240" cy="470" r="3" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    <circle cx="250" cy="480" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.9" />
    
    <!-- Spray lines -->
    <line x1="150" y1="480" x2="145" y2="470" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
    <line x1="170" y1="460" x2="165" y2="450" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
    <line x1="190" y1="440" x2="185" y2="430" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
    <line x1="210" y1="440" x2="215" y2="430" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
    <line x1="230" y1="460" x2="235" y2="450" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
    <line x1="250" y1="480" x2="255" y2="470" stroke="white" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Strain effect lines showing kayak fighting against current -->
  <g class="strain-lines">
    <line x1="140" y1="520" x2="130" y2="540" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <line x1="160" y1="520" x2="150" y2="540" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <line x1="180" y1="520" x2="170" y2="540" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <line x1="200" y1="520" x2="200" y2="540" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <line x1="220" y1="520" x2="230" y2="540" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <line x1="240" y1="520" x2="250" y2="540" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <line x1="260" y1="520" x2="270" y2="540" stroke="#880000" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Additional water effects -->
  <g class="water-effects">
    <path d="M100,600 Q150,580 200,600 Q250,620 300,600 Q350,580 400,600" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" fill="none" />
    <path d="M0,650 Q50,630 100,650 Q150,670 200,650 Q250,630 300,650 Q350,670 400,650" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" fill="none" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
    <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#1E90FF;stop-opacity:1" />
    <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#0000CD;stop-opacity:1" />
  </linearGradient>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#bgGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Water splashes and ripples in background -->
  <g class="water-background">
    <path d="M0,200 Q50,180 100,200 Q150,220 200,200 Q250,180 300,200 Q350,220 400,200" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.3" />
    <path d="M0,300 Q50,280 100,300 Q150,320 200,300 Q250,280 300,300 Q350,320 400,300" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.4" />
    <path d="M0,400 Q50,380 100,400 Q150,420 200,400 Q250,380 300,400 Q350,420 400,400" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.5" />
    <path d="M0,500 Q50,480 100,500 Q150,520 200,500 Q250,480 300,500 Q350,520 400,500" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
    <path d="M0,600 Q50,580 100,600 Q150,620 200,600 Q250,580 300,600 Q350,620 400,600" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.7" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Close-up of character's face -->
  <g class="character-face" transform="translate(200, 350) scale(4)">
    <!-- Face outline -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="20" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.5" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-20,-5 C-18,-15 -10,-22 0,-22 C10,-22 18,-15 20,-5" fill="#8B4513" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    
    <!-- Ears -->
    <ellipse cx="-20" cy="0" rx="3" ry="5" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    <ellipse cx="20" cy="0" rx="3" ry="5" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    
    <!-- Eyes with intensity -->
    <ellipse cx="-8" cy="-5" rx="4" ry="3" fill="white" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    <ellipse cx="8" cy="-5" rx="4" ry="3" fill="white" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    <circle cx="-8" cy="-5" r="2" fill="#000000" />
    <circle cx="8" cy="-5" r="2" fill="#000000" />
    <circle cx="-7" cy="-6" r="0.7" fill="white" />
    <circle cx="9" cy="-6" r="0.7" fill="white" />
    
    <!-- Furrowed brow -->
    <path d="M-14,-10 C-10,-8 -6,-10 -2,-8" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.8" fill="none" />
    <path d="M14,-10 C10,-8 6,-10 2,-8" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.8" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Nose -->
    <path d="M0,-2 L2,2 L-2,2 Z" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    
    <!-- Gritted teeth -->
    <path d="M-10,10 C-5,8 5,8 10,10" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" fill="none" />
    <path d="M-10,12 C-5,14 5,14 10,12" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" fill="none" />
    <line x1="-8" y1="10" x2="-8" y2="12" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    <line x1="-4" y1="10" x2="-4" y2="12" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    <line x1="0" y1="10" x2="0" y2="12" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    <line x1="4" y1="10" x2="4" y2="12" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    <line x1="8" y1="10" x2="8" y2="12" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.3" />
    
    <!-- Cheeks showing strain -->
    <path d="M-15,5 C-13,7 -11,8 -10,5" stroke="#FF6347" stroke-width="0.3" fill="#FF6347" opacity="0.5" />
    <path d="M15,5 C13,7 11,8 10,5" stroke="#FF6347" stroke-width="0.3" fill="#FF6347" opacity="0.5" />
    
    <!-- Sweat droplet -->
    <path d="M-15,-12 C-16,-10 -17,-8 -15,-6" fill="#ADD8E6" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="0.2" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- "PADDLE HARD!" text -->
  <g class="text">
    <filter id="textGlow">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="2" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
    
    <!-- Text background -->
    <rect x="210" y="150" width="170" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#FF0000" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="3" />
    
    <!-- Text -->
    <text x="295" y="190" font-family="Impact, sans-serif" font-size="28" fill="white" text-anchor="middle" filter="url(#textGlow)">PADDLE HARD!</text>
    
    <!-- Emphasis elements -->
    <polygon points="380,150 390,130 400,150" fill="#FFFF00" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
    <polygon points="380,210 390,230 400,210" fill="#FFFF00" stroke="#000000" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion and energy lines around face -->
  <g class="energy-lines">
    <path d="M100,300 C120,320 140,310 160,320" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
    <path d="M100,400 C120,380 140,390 160,380" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
    <path d="M240,320 C260,310 280,320 300,300" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
    <path d="M240,380 C260,390 280,380 300,400" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.6" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Sky background -->
  <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
    <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#87CEEB;stop-opacity:1" />
    <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#1E90FF;stop-opacity:1" />
  </linearGradient>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- River -->
  <linearGradient id="riverGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
    <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#1E90FF;stop-opacity:1" />
    <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#0000CD;stop-opacity:1" />
  </linearGradient>
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="url(#riverGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Maximum intensity current lines -->
  <g class="current-lines">

name: Subduing a Wild Animal
description: Player must restrain an aggressive wild animal without harming it.

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Sky background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#64b5f6"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#bbdefb"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="sunGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="10" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="woodTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="url(#skyGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Sun -->
  <circle cx="300" cy="100" r="40" fill="#ffeb3b" filter="url(#sunGlow)" opacity="0.8"/>
  <circle cx="300" cy="100" r="30" fill="#ffee58"/>
  
  <!-- Background trees -->
  <g id="backgroundTrees">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>

      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#a1887f"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#8d6e63"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#795548"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <pattern id="woodPattern" width="50" height="50" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="50" height="50" fill="url(#woodGradient)"/>
      <path d="M0,0 L50,50 M50,0 L0,50" stroke="#5d4037" stroke-width="0.5" stroke-opacity="0.3"/>

    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">

      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2"/>
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5"/>
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode/>
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>

    <filter id="metalShine" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#64b5f6"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#bbdefb"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="sunGlow" cx="80%" cy="20%" r="50%" fx="80%" fy="20%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffee58"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ffeb3b" stop-opacity="0"/>
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="treeTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2"/>
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5"/>
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>

  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky -->

  </g>
  
  <!-- Ground -->

  <path d="M0,400 C50,390 100,410 150,395 C200,380 250,400 300,390 C350,380 400,400 400,400 L400,450 L0,450 Z" fill="#a1887f"/>

  <!-- Bushes on left side -->

    <ellipse cx="40" cy="490" rx="25" ry="15" fill="#43a047"/>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">

    <filter id="furTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">

    <path d="M250,450 L260,430 L270,435 L275,415 L285,420 L290,400 L300,405 L305,385 L315,390 L320,370" fill="none" stroke="#9e9e9e" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>

  <ellipse cx="300" cy="650" rx="60" ry="15" fill="#3e2723"/>

  <circle cx="90" cy="635" r="8" fill="#455a64"/>
  <circle cx="75" cy="640" r="5" fill="#607d8b"/>
  
  <circle cx="280" cy="625" r="15" fill="#546e7a"/>
  <circle cx="290" cy="630" r="12" fill="#455a64"/>
  <circle cx="275" cy="635" r="8" fill="#607d8b"/>
  
  <!-- Fog/Mist effect -->

  <path d="M250,520 L260,510 L270,520" fill="none" stroke="#388e3c" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="darkGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#263238"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#37474f"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="eyeGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffee58"/>
      <stop offset="20%" stop-color="#ffa000"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff6f00"/>
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="furTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2"/>
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5"/>
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode/>
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="textGlow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="3" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="url(#darkGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Wolf's face close-up -->
  <g id="wolfFace" transform="translate(0, 50)">
    <!-- Head shape -->
    <path d="M50,300 C20,250 30,200 80,150 C130,100 200,100 270,150 C320,200 330,250 300,300 C250,350 100,350 50,300 Z" fill="#757575" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Ears -->
    <path d="M100,150 L70,80 L120,110 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <path d="M250,150 L280,80 L230,110 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    
    <!-- Forehead and top of head -->
    <path d="M100,150 C150,100 200,100 250,150" fill="none" stroke="#9e9e9e" stroke-width="30" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Eyes -->
    <circle cx="130" cy="200" r="25" fill="black"/>
    <circle cx="130" cy="200" r="18" fill="url(#eyeGlow)" filter="url(#glow)"/>
    <circle cx="270" cy="200" r="25" fill="black"/>
    <circle cx="270" cy="200" r="18" fill="url(#eyeGlow)" filter="url(#glow)"/>
    
    <!-- Snout and nose -->
    <path d="M130,250 C150,270 250,270 270,250 L250,300 C220,330 180,330 150,300 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="290" rx="20" ry="10" fill="#212121"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth and teeth -->
    <path d="M150,300 C175,290 225,290 250,300" fill="none" stroke="#424242" stroke-width="5"/>
    <path d="M150,300 L160,320 L170,300 L180,320 L190,300 L200,320 L210,300 L220,320 L230,300 L240,320 L250,300" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Detailed teeth -->
    <path d="M155,300 L158,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M165,300 L168,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M175,300 L178,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M185,300 L188,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M195,300 L198,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M205,300 L208,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M215,300 L218,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M225,300 L228,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M235,300 L238,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M245,300 L248,315" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="3"/>
    
    <!-- Facial features -->
    <path d="M130,200 L150,190" fill="none" stroke="#424242" stroke-width="3"/> <!-- Eyebrow -->
    <path d="M270,200 L250,190" fill="none" stroke="#424242" stroke-width="3"/> <!-- Eyebrow -->
    <path d="M150,250 L130,240" fill="none" stroke="#424242" stroke-width="2"/> <!-- Cheek line -->
    <path d="M250,250 L270,240" fill="none" stroke="#424242" stroke-width="2"/> <!-- Cheek line -->
    
    <!-- Fur details -->
    <path d="M100,150 L90,140 L80,145 L70,135 L60,140 L50,130" fill="none" stroke="#9e9e9e" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    <path d="M250,150 L260,140 L270,145 L280,135 L290,140 L300,130" fill="none" stroke="#9e9e9e" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Growling motion lines -->
  <g id="growlLines">
    <path d="M50,250 C40,250 30,240 20,250" fill="none" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3"/>
    <path d="M45,270 C35,270 25,260 15,270" fill="none" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3"/>
    <path d="M40,290 C30,290 20,280 10,290" fill="none" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3"/>
    
    <path d="M350,250 C360,250 370,240 380,250" fill="none" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3"/>
    <path d="M355,270 C365,270 375,260 385,270" fill="none" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3"/>
    <path d="M360,290 C370,290 380,280 390,290" fill="none" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Text box -->
  <g id="textBox">
    <rect x="50" y="500" width="300" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" fill="white" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#dropShadow)"/>
    <text x="200" y="540" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#d32f2f" filter="url(#textGlow)">Dangerous but must not harm!</text>
    <path d="M80,560 L320,560" stroke="#d32f2f" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Danger symbols -->
  <g id="dangerSymbols">
    <path d="M80,520 L90,500 L100,520 Z" fill="none" stroke="#d32f2f" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="90" y="518" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="15" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#d32f2f">!</text>
    
    <path d="M300,520 L310,500 L320,520 Z" fill="none" stroke="#d32f2f" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="310" y="518" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="15" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#d32f2f">!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Vignette effect -->
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="350" rx="250" ry="200" fill="black" opacity="0.3"/>
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="350" rx="200" ry="150" fill="none" stroke="black" opacity="0.2" stroke-width="100"/>
  
  <!-- Light reflection in eyes -->
  <circle cx="125" cy="195" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.8"/>
  <circle cx="265" cy="195" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.8"/>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#37474f"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#546e7a"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="eyeGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffee58"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff6f00"/>
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="furTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2"/>
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5"/>
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode/>
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="5" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="url(#skyGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Ground -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="400" height="200" fill="#3e2723"/>
  <path d="M0,500 C50,490 100,510 150,495 C200,480 250,500 300,490 C350,480 400,500 400,500 L400,520 L0,520 Z" fill="#4e342e"/>
  
  <!-- Clearing -->
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="500" rx="150" ry="30" fill="#5d4037"/>
  
  <!-- Minimal forest elements -->
  <path d="M0,500 L0,300 L50,200 L30,200 L80,100 L130,200 L110,200 L160,300 L140,300 L190,400 L170,400 L170,500 Z" fill="#1b5e20" opacity="0.8"/>
  <path d="M230,500 L230,300 L280,200 L260,200 L310,100 L360,200 L340,200 L390,300 L370,300 L420,400 L400,400 L400,500 Z" fill="#1b5e20" opacity="0.8"/>
  
  <!-- Small trees and bushes -->
  <ellipse cx="50" cy="500" rx="30" ry="15" fill="#2e7d32"/>
  <path d="M50,500 L50,450 L30,450 L50,420 L40,420 L60,390 L80,420 L70,420 L90,450 L70,450 L70,500 Z" fill="#388e3c"/>
  
  <ellipse cx="350" cy="500" rx="30" ry="15" fill="#2e7d32"/>
  <path d="M350,500 L350,450 L330,450 L350,420 L340,420 L360,390 L380,420 L370,420 L390,450 L370,450 L370,500 Z" fill="#388e3c"/>
  
  <!-- Tension lines between ranger and wolf -->
  <line x1="120" y1="400" x2="280" y2="400" stroke="#f5f5f5" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <line x1="120" y1="420" x2="280" y2="420" stroke="#f5f5f5" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  <line x1="120" y1="440" x2="280" y2="440" stroke="#f5f5f5" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  
  <!-- Wolf (side view) -->
  <g id="wolf" transform="translate(280, 450) scale(0.8)">
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M0,0 C-30,-10 -60,0 -90,20 C-60,30 -30,30 0,10 Z" fill="#757575" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <path d="M-20,10 L-30,50 L-15,50 L-10,10 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <path d="M-50,20 L-60,50 L-45,50 L-40,20 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    
    <!-- Tail -->
    <path d="M-90,20 C-110,10 -120,20 -130,10 C-140,0 -130,-10 -120,0 C-110,10 -100,10 -90,20 Z" fill="#9e9e9e" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M0,0 C-10,-20 0,-40 20,-40 C40,-30 30,-10 0,0 Z" fill="#757575" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <path d="M20,-40 C30,-50 50,-50 70,-40 C90,-30 90,-10 70,0 C50,10 30,0 20,-10 C10,-20 10,-30 20,-40 Z" fill="#9e9e9e" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Ear -->
    <path d="M40,-40 L50,-60 L60,-45 Z" fill="#757575"/>
    
    <!-- Eye -->
    <circle cx="60" cy="-30" r="5" fill="black"/>
    <circle cx="60" cy="-30" r="3" fill="url(#eyeGlow)" filter="url(#glow)"/>
    
    <!-- Snout -->
    <path d="M70,-40 L90,-30 L80,-10 L60,-10 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <ellipse cx="85" cy="-20" rx="5" ry="3" fill="#212121"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth -->

    <path d="M70,-15 L72,-10 L75,-15 L78,-10 L80,-15" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Raised hackles -->
    <path d="M20,-40 L10,-45 L5,-50 L0,-55 L-5,-60" fill="none" stroke="#9e9e9e" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Ranger (side view) -->
  <g id="ranger" transform="translate(120, 450) scale(0.8)">
    <!-- Legs -->
    <path d="M0,0 L-10,50 L5,50 L0,0 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <path d="M20,0 L30,50 L15,50 L20,0 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M-10,-80 L30,-80 L20,0 L-10,0 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="0" y="-80" width="20" height="30" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <path d="M-10,-80 C-20,-70 -30,-50 -20,-30" fill="none" stroke="#33691e" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M30,-80 C40,-60 50,-40 60,-30" fill="none" stroke="#33691e" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
