<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#37474f"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#546e7a"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="textGlow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="5" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2"/>
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5"/>
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode/>
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="url(#bgGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Simplified forest background -->
  <path d="M0,700 L0,500 L50,400 L30,400 L80,300 L60,300 L100,200 L140,300 L120,300 L170,400 L150,400 L200,500 L150,500 L150,700 Z" fill="#1b5e20" opacity="0.3"/>
  <path d="M250,700 L250,500 L300,400 L280,400 L330,300 L310,300 L350,200 L390,300 L370,300 L420,400 L400,400 L450,500 L400,500 L400,700 Z" fill="#1b5e20" opacity="0.3"/>
  
  <!-- Ground -->
  <rect x="0" y="600" width="400" height="100" fill="#3e2723" opacity="0.5"/>
  <path d="M0,600 C50,590 100,610 150,595 C200,580 250,600 300,590 C350,580 400,600 400,600 L400,620 L0,620 Z" fill="#4e342e" opacity="0.5"/>
  
  <!-- Main text box -->
  <rect x="50" y="200" width="300" height="100" rx="10" ry="10" fill="white" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#dropShadow)"/>
  <text x="200" y="260" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="28" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#d32f2f" filter="url(#textGlow)">SUBDUE WITHOUT HARM!</text>
  
  <!-- Decorative elements for text box -->
  <line x1="80" y1="280" x2="320" y2="280" stroke="#d32f2f" stroke-width="3"/>
  <circle cx="80" cy="220" r="10" fill="#d32f2f"/>
  <circle cx="320" cy="220" r="10" fill="#d32f2f"/>
  <path d="M80,220 L320,220" stroke="#d32f2f" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
  
  <!-- Ranger silhouette -->
  <g id="rangerSilhouette" transform="translate(130, 500) scale(1.2)" opacity="0.9">
    <!-- Legs -->
    <path d="M0,50 L-10,100 L10,100 L0,50 Z" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    <path d="M30,50 L40,100 L20,100 L30,50 Z" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M-10,0 L40,0 L30,50 L0,50 Z" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <path d="M-10,0 C-20,10 -25,20 -20,40" fill="none" stroke="#1b5e20" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M40,0 C50,10 55,20 50,40" fill="none" stroke="#1b5e20" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Equipment -->
    <rect x="45" y="30" width="10" height="30" fill="#1b5e20"/> <!-- Tool handle -->
    <path d="M55,30 C65,20 75,20 85,30 C95,40 95,60 85,70 C75,80 65,80 55,70 C45,60 45,40 55,30 Z" fill="#1b5e20" opacity="0.7"/> <!-- Tool end -->
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="15" cy="-20" r="20" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Hat -->
    <path d="M-5,-30 L35,-30 L30,-40 L0,-40 Z" fill="#1b5e20"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wolf silhouette -->
  <g id="wolfSilhouette" transform="translate(270, 500) scale(1.2)" opacity="0.9">

    <path d="M0,50 C-30,40 -60,50 -90,70 C-60,80 -30,80 0,60 Z" fill="#424242"/>
    
    <!-- Legs -->

    <path d="M-50,70 L-60,100 L-40,100 L-40,70 Z" fill="#424242"/>

    <path d="M-90,70 C-110,60 -120,70 -130,60 C-140,50 -130,40 -120,50 C-110,60 -100,60 -90,70 Z" fill="#424242"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M0,50 C-10,30 0,10 20,10 C40,20 30,40 0,50 Z" fill="#424242"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <path d="M20,10 C30,0 50,0 70,10 C90,20 90,40 70,50 C50,60 30,50 20,40 C10,30 10,20 20,10 Z" fill="#424242"/>
    
    <!-- Ear -->
    <path d="M40,10 L50,-10 L60,5 Z" fill="#424242"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Connecting elements between silhouettes -->

  <circle cx="200" cy="480" r="10" fill="#f44336"/>
  <text x="200" y="485" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="15" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">VS</text>
  
  <!-- Alert symbols -->
  <g id="alertSymbols">
    <path d="M100,350 L120,380 L80,380 Z" fill="#f44336"/>
    <text x="100" y="375" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">!</text>
    
    <path d="M300,350 L320,380 L280,380 Z" fill="#f44336"/>
    <text x="300" y="375" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Additional information text -->
  <rect x="50" y="400" width="300" height="50" rx="5" ry="5" fill="white" opacity="0.7"/>
  <text x="200" y="430" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#263238">Your mission: Capture without injury</text>
  
  <!-- Decorative elements -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="30" fill="white" opacity="0.1"/> <!-- Moon -->
  <circle cx="50" cy="100" r="20" fill="white" opacity="0.2"/>
  
  <path d="M320,150 L330,140 L340,150" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.7"/> <!-- Grass -->
  <path d="M350,170 L360,160 L370,170" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.7"/> <!-- Grass -->
  
  <!-- Border frame -->
  <rect x="20" y="20" width="360" height="660" fill="none" stroke="#f5f5f5" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="10,5" opacity="0.5"/>
  
  <!-- Corner decorations -->
  <path d="M20,20 L40,20 L40,40" fill="none" stroke="#f5f5f5" stroke-width="3"/>
  <path d="M380,20 L360,20 L360,40" fill="none" stroke="#f5f5f5" stroke-width="3"/>
  <path d="M20,680 L40,680 L40,660" fill="none" stroke="#f5f5f5" stroke-width="3"/>
  <path d="M380,680 L360,680 L360,660" fill="none" stroke="#f5f5f5" stroke-width="3"/>
</svg>

    <path d="M130,530 C132,534 138,534 140,530" fill="none" stroke="#3e2723" stroke-width="1.5"/> <!-- Mouth showing effort -->
    
    <!-- Badge -->

    <path d="M127,565 L133,565 L130,572 Z" fill="#ff6f00" transform="rotate(-15, 135, 590)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Net in motion -->

    <!-- Net handle -->
    <rect x="220" y="470" width="30" height="8" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#5d4037" transform="rotate(-30, 220, 470)"/>
    
    <!-- Net in flight -->
    <g transform="translate(270, 420) rotate(-20)">

      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="35" fill="none" stroke="#b0bec5" stroke-width="2"/>

    <path d="M260,425 C270,420 280,415 290,415" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3"/>
    
    <!-- "WHOOSH" effect -->

    <path d="M250,440 C260,430 270,420 280,420 C290,420 300,430 310,420" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1"/>
    <path d="M260,430 C270,420 280,410 290,410 C300,410 310,420 320,410" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wolf trying to dodge -->
  <g id="wolf" transform="translate(300, 520) scale(0.7) rotate(15)">

    <!-- Mouth -->

  <!-- Motion lines for wolf dodging -->

  <path d="M300,540 C310,530 320,525 330,520" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>

  <path d="M120,650 L125,640 L130,650" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->

  <circle cx="175" cy="633" r="2" fill="#78909c"/>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#64b5f6"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#bbdefb"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="furTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>

        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5"/>

  <ellipse cx="330" cy="550" rx="50" ry="20" fill="#78909c" opacity="0.3"/>

  <!-- Net partially wrapped around wolf -->
  <g id="net" filter="url(#dropShadow)" transform="translate(300, 520) scale(1.2)">

          fill="none" stroke="#78909c" stroke-width="4"/>

  </g>
  
  <!-- Ranger approaching cautiously -->

    <rect x="115" y="495" width="40" height="5" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="130" y="490" width="10" height="5" fill="#33691e"/>
    <path d="M125,510 L145,510 L140,520 L130,520 Z" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Face -->

    <path d="M132,565 L138,565 L135,572 Z" fill="#ff6f00"/>
    
    <!-- Cautious approach lines -->

    <path d="M175,540 C185,535 195,530 205,530" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
    <path d="M180,560 C190,555 200,550 210,550" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Hands outstretched indicator -->
  <path d="M220,520 C230,515 240,515 250,520" fill="none" stroke="#ffcc80" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round"/>

  <ellipse cx="200" cy="670" rx="80" ry="15" fill="#8d6e63" opacity="0.3"/>

  <path d="M80,620 L85,610 L90,620" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  <path d="M120,650 L125,640 L130,650" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  
  <!-- Small rocks -->
  <circle cx="180" cy="630" r="5" fill="#78909c"/>
  <circle cx="185" cy="635" r="3" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="175" cy="633" r="2" fill="#78909c"/>
  
  <circle cx="220" cy="650" r="7" fill="#78909c"/>
  <circle cx="225" cy="655" r="4" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="215" cy="653" r="3" fill="#78909c"/>

  <path d="M250,470 C260,460 270,460 280,470" fill="none" stroke="#b3e5fc" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" opacity="0.5"/>
  <path d="M260,460 C270,450 280,450 290,460" fill="none" stroke="#b3e5fc" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" opacity="0.5"/>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#64b5f6"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#bbdefb"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="furTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>

      <feComponentTransfer>

  </g>

  <path d="M230,540 L235,530 L240,540" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  
  <!-- Close-up of ranger kneeling beside wolf -->

  <!-- Ranger kneeling -->

    <path d="M130,570 L120,610 L140,610 L135,570 Z" fill="#33691e" transform="rotate(-60, 130, 590)"/>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#64b5f6"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#bbdefb"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="roadGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#78909c"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#546e7a"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="furTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2"/>
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5"/>
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode/>
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <radialGradient id="eyeGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffee58"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#ff6f00"/>
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="textGlow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="3" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width="400" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Sun -->
  <circle cx="320" cy="80" r="40" fill="#ffee58" opacity="0.8"/>
  <circle cx="320" cy="80" r="30" fill="#fff176"/>
  <circle cx="320" cy="80" r="20" fill="#fff59d"/>
  
  <!-- Background trees -->
  <g id="backgroundTrees">
    <path d="M0,400 L50,300 L30,300 L70,220 L50,220 L90,150 L110,220 L90,220 L130,300 L110,300 L160,400 Z" fill="#2e7d32" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    <path d="M100,400 L150,300 L130,300 L170,220 L150,220 L190,150 L210,220 L190,220 L230,300 L210,300 L260,400 Z" fill="#388e3c" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    <path d="M260,400 L310,300 L290,300 L330,220 L310,220 L350,150 L370,220 L350,220 L390,300 L370,300 L420,400 Z" fill="#2e7d32" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Ground -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="#8d6e63"/>
  <path d="M0,400 C50,390 100,410 150,395 C200,380 250,400 300,390 C350,380 400,400 400,400 L400,450 L0,450 Z" fill="#a1887f"/>
  
  <!-- Road -->
  <path d="M0,500 L400,500 L400,600 L0,600 Z" fill="url(#roadGradient)"/>
  <path d="M0,530 L50,530 L100,530 L150,530 L200,530 L250,530 L300,530 L350,530 L400,530" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="5" stroke-dasharray="20,20"/>
  <path d="M0,570 L50,570 L100,570 L150,570 L200,570 L250,570 L300,570 L350,570 L400,570" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="5" stroke-dasharray="20,20"/>
  
  <!-- Wildlife van -->
  <g id="van" transform="translate(280, 550)">
    <!-- Van body -->
    <rect x="-50" y="-50" width="120" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#43a047"/>
    <rect x="-60" y="-20" width="140" height="30" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#2e7d32"/>
    <rect x="-55" y="-15" width="130" height="20" fill="#388e3c"/>
    
    <!-- Windows -->
    <rect x="-40" y="-45" width="30" height="20" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#bbdefb"/>
    <rect x="10" y="-45" width="30" height="20" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#bbdefb"/>
    <rect x="50" y="-45" width="15" height="20" rx="5" ry="5" fill="#bbdefb"/>
    
    <!-- Wheels -->
    <circle cx="-30" cy="10" r="15" fill="#212121"/>
    <circle cx="-30" cy="10" r="10" fill="#424242"/>
    <circle cx="-30" cy="10" r="5" fill="#616161"/>
    
    <circle cx="30" cy="10" r="15" fill="#212121"/>
    <circle cx="30" cy="10" r="10" fill="#424242"/>
    <circle cx="30" cy="10" r="5" fill="#616161"/>
    
    <!-- Details -->
    <rect x="-10" y="-50" width="20" height="5" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    <circle cx="45" cy="-5" r="5" fill="#f44336"/>
    <rect x="60" y="-10" width="5" height="20" fill="#f44336"/>
    
    <!-- Wildlife symbol -->
    <path d="M-20,-35 C-15,-40 -5,-40 0,-35 C5,-40 15,-40 20,-35 C25,-30 25,-20 20,-15 C15,-10 5,-10 0,-15 C-5,-10 -15,-10 -20,-15 C-25,-20 -25,-30 -20,-35 Z" fill="#81c784" transform="scale(0.5) translate(0, -30)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Ranger leading wolf -->
  <g id="ranger">
    <!-- Legs -->
    <path d="M120,570 L110,600 L130,600 L125,570 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <path d="M150,570 L160,600 L140,600 L145,570 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M110,490 L160,490 L165,570 L105,570 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="125" y="490" width="20" height="40" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Arms - one holding lead -->
    <path d="M110,490 C100,500 95,510 100,520" fill="none" stroke="#33691e" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M160,490 C170,500 175,510 180,520" fill="none" stroke="#33691e" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="135" cy="460" r="25" fill="#ffcc80"/>
    
    <!-- Hat -->
    <path d="M110,450 L160,450 L155,435 L115,435 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="115" y="435" width="40" height="5" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="130" y="430" width="10" height="5" fill="#33691e"/>
    <path d="M125,450 L145,450 L140,460 L130,460 Z" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Face -->
    <circle cx="125" cy="455" r="3" fill="#3e2723"/> <!-- Left eye -->
    <circle cx="145" cy="455" r="3" fill="#3e2723"/> <!-- Right eye -->
    <path d="M130,470 C132,472 138,472 140,470" fill="none" stroke="#3e2723" stroke-width="1.5"/> <!-- Mouth -->
    
    <!-- Badge -->
    <circle cx="135" cy="510" r="7" fill="#ffd54f"/>
    <path d="M132,505 L138,505 L135,512 Z" fill="#ff6f00"/>
    
    <!-- Lead -->
    <path d="M180,520 L200,530" fill="none" stroke="#a1887f" stroke-width="3"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Wolf (secured but walking) -->
  <g id="wolf" transform="translate(220, 550) scale(0.6)">
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M0,0 C-30,-10 -60,0 -90,20 C-60,30 -30,30 0,10 Z" fill="#757575" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Legs in walking position -->
    <path d="M-20,10 L-10,50 L5,50 L-10,10 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <path d="M-50,20 L-60,50 L-45,50 L-40,20 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    
    <!-- Tail -->
    <path d="M-90,20 C-110,10 -120,20 -130,10 C-140,0 -130,-10 -120,0 C-110,10 -100,10 -90,20 Z" fill="#9e9e9e" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M0,0 C-10,-20 0,-40 20,-40 C40,-30 30,-10 0,0 Z" fill="#757575" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <path d="M20,-40 C30,-50 50,-50 70,-40 C90,-30 90,-10 70,0 C50,10 30,0 20,-10 C10,-20 10,-30 20,-40 Z" fill="#9e9e9e" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Ear -->
    <path d="M40,-40 L50,-60 L60,-45 Z" fill="#757575"/>
    
    <!-- Eye -->
    <circle cx="60" cy="-30" r="5" fill="black"/>
    <circle cx="60" cy="-30" r="3" fill="url(#eyeGlow)" filter="url(#dropShadow)"/>
    
    <!-- Snout -->
    <path d="M70,-40 L90,-30 L80,-10 L60,-10 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <ellipse cx="85" cy="-20" rx="5" ry="3" fill="#212121"/>
    
    <!-- Muzzle -->
    <path d="M70,-20 C75,-25 85,-25 90,-20 C95,-15 95,-5 90,0 C85,5 75,5 70,0 C65,-5 65,-15 70,-20 Z" fill="#424242" transform="scale(0.7) translate(45, -10)"/>
    <path d="M80,-10 L80,0" fill="none" stroke="#212121" stroke-width="1" transform="scale(0.7) translate(45, -10)"/>
    
    <!-- Collar -->
    <path d="M0,-10 C10,-15 30,-15 40,-10 C45,-5 45,5 40,10 C30,15 10,15 0,10 C-5,5 -5,-5 0,-10 Z" fill="#a1887f" transform="scale(0.7) translate(5, -30)"/>
    <circle cx="20" cy="-5" r="3" fill="#ffd54f" transform="scale(0.7) translate(5, -30)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Lead connecting wolf to ranger -->
  <path d="M200,530 L210,535" fill="none" stroke="#a1887f" stroke-width="3"/>
  
  <!-- Success text box -->
  <g id="successText">
    <rect x="50" y="350" width="300" height="50" rx="10" ry="10" fill="white" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#dropShadow)"/>
    <text x="200" y="380" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#388e3c" filter="url(#textGlow)">SUCCESS: Animal safely subdued!</text>
    <path d="M70,390 L330,390" stroke="#388e3c" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Small environment details -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="650" rx="60" ry="10" fill="#8d6e63" opacity="0.5"/>
  <ellipse cx="300" cy="670" rx="80" ry="15" fill="#8d6e63" opacity="0.3"/>
  
  <path d="M50,600 L55,590 L60,600" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  <path d="M80,620 L85,610 L90,620" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  <path d="M360,620 L365,610 L370,620" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  
  <!-- Small rocks -->
  <circle cx="180" cy="630" r="5" fill="#78909c"/>
  <circle cx="185" cy="635" r="3" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="175" cy="633" r="2" fill="#78909c"/>
  
  <circle cx="320" cy="650" r="7" fill="#78909c"/>
  <circle cx="325" cy="655" r="4" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="315" cy="653" r="3" fill="#78909c"/>
  
  <!-- Road markings -->
  <rect x="150" y="440" width="100" height="20" rx="5" ry="5" fill="white" opacity="0.7"/>
  <text x="200" y="455" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#37474f">TO SANCTUARY</text>
  
  <!-- Direction arrow -->
  <path d="M260,450 L280,450 L270,435 Z" fill="#37474f"/>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#64b5f6"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#bbdefb"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="furTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>

  </g>
  
  <!-- Ground -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="#8d6e63"/>
  <path d="M0,400 C50,390 100,410 150,395 C200,380 250,400 300,390 C350,380 400,400 400,400 L400,450 L0,450 Z" fill="#a1887f"/>
  
  <!-- Wolf lunging toward ranger -->
  <g id="wolf" transform="translate(230, 500) scale(0.8) rotate(-10)">
    <!-- Body in attack position -->
    <path d="M0,0 C-30,-10 -60,0 -90,20 C-60,30 -30,30 0,10 Z" fill="#757575" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Legs in lunging position -->
    <path d="M-20,10 L-40,30 L-25,35 L-10,10 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <path d="M-50,20 L-70,35 L-55,40 L-40,20 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    
    <!-- Tail -->
    <path d="M-90,20 C-110,10 -120,20 -130,10 C-140,0 -130,-10 -120,0 C-110,10 -100,10 -90,20 Z" fill="#9e9e9e" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Neck stretched forward -->
    <path d="M0,0 C-5,-20 10,-40 30,-40 C50,-30 40,-10 10,0 Z" fill="#757575" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Head lunging with jaws open -->
    <path d="M30,-40 C40,-50 60,-50 80,-40 C100,-30 100,-10 80,0 C60,10 40,0 30,-10 C20,-20 20,-30 30,-40 Z" fill="#9e9e9e" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    
    <!-- Ear laid back -->
    <path d="M50,-40 L60,-60 L70,-45 Z" fill="#757575"/>
    
    <!-- Eye (angry) -->
    <circle cx="70" cy="-30" r="5" fill="black"/>
    <circle cx="70" cy="-30" r="3" fill="url(#eyeGlow)" filter="url(#dropShadow)"/>
    
    <!-- Snout -->
    <path d="M80,-40 L100,-30 L90,-10 L70,-10 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <ellipse cx="95" cy="-20" rx="5" ry="3" fill="#212121"/>
    
    <!-- Open jaws with teeth -->
    <path d="M80,-25 L95,-15" fill="none" stroke="#424242" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M80,-15 L95,-25" fill="none" stroke="#424242" stroke-width="3"/>
    <path d="M80,-25 L85,-20 L90,-25 L95,-20" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M80,-15 L85,-20 L90,-15 L95,-20" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion lines for lunging wolf -->
  <path d="M180,480 C190,475 200,470 210,470" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  <path d="M190,500 C200,495 210,490 220,490" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  <path d="M200,520 C210,515 220,510 230,510" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  
  <!-- Ranger falling backward -->
  <g id="ranger" transform="translate(120, 550) rotate(30)">
    <!-- Legs sprawling -->
    <path d="M0,80 L-20,120 L0,120 L10,80 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <path d="M30,80 L50,120 L30,120 L20,80 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    
    <!-- Body falling back -->
    <path d="M-10,0 L40,0 L30,80 L0,80 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="5" y="0" width="20" height="40" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Arms flailing -->

    <path d="M40,0 C60,10 70,30 60,50" fill="none" stroke="#33691e" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Head -->

    <!-- Hat falling off -->
    <path d="M-10,-40 L40,-40 L35,-50 L-5,-50 Z" fill="#33691e" transform="translate(30, -10) rotate(20)"/>
    
    <!-- Face with surprised expression -->
    <circle cx="5" cy="-35" r="3" fill="#3e2723"/> <!-- Left eye -->
    <circle cx="25" cy="-35" r="3" fill="#3e2723"/> <!-- Right eye -->
    <ellipse cx="15" cy="-20" rx="5" ry="8" fill="none" stroke="#3e2723" stroke-width="1.5"/> <!-- Mouth showing surprise -->
    
    <!-- Badge -->
    <circle cx="15" cy="20" r="7" fill="#ffd54f"/>
    <path d="M12,15 L18,15 L15,22 Z" fill="#ff6f00"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Surprise marks -->
  <g id="surpriseMarks">
    <text x="100" y="480" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="30" font-weight="bold" fill="#f44336">!</text>

    <text x="140" y="440" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="30" font-weight="bold" fill="#f44336">!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dropped net -->

    <rect x="-40" y="-5" width="20" height="8" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#5d4037"/>
  </g>

  <path d="M80,620 L85,610 L90,620" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  <path d="M320,620 L325,610 L330,620" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->

  <circle cx="185" cy="635" r="3" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="175" cy="633" r="2" fill="#78909c"/>
  
  <circle cx="220" cy="650" r="7" fill="#78909c"/>
  <circle cx="225" cy="655" r="4" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="215" cy="653" r="3" fill="#78909c"/>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">

  <path d="M250,250 L300,230 L310,200 L280,190 L250,200 Z" fill="#795548" filter="url(#woodTexture)"/>

    <path d="M20,-40 C30,-50 50,-50 70,-40 C90,-30 90,-10 70,0 C50,10 30,0 20,-10 C10,-20 10,-30 20,-40 Z" fill="#9e9e9e" filter="url(#furTexture)" transform="rotate(-20, 50, -20)"/>

    <path d="M65,-10 L85,-10" fill="none" stroke="#f44336" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(-20, 50, -20)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Ranger scrambling up tree -->
  <g id="ranger" transform="translate(200, 400)">
    <!-- Legs scrambling -->
    <path d="M-20,50 L-30,80 L-10,80 L-15,50 Z" fill="#33691e" transform="rotate(30, -20, 65)"/>
    <path d="M20,50 L10,80 L30,80 L25,50 Z" fill="#33691e" transform="rotate(-30, 20, 65)"/>

    <path d="M30,-30 C50,-20 60,0 50,20" fill="none" stroke="#33691e" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>

    <path d="M-3,-15 L3,-15 L0,-8 Z" fill="#ff6f00"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Hasty climb motion lines -->

  <path d="M220,350 C230,340 235,330 230,320" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  <path d="M180,300 C170,290 165,280 170,270" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  <path d="M220,300 C230,290 235,280 230,270" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  
  <!-- Wolf barking/snarling effect -->

  <path d="M235,610 C245,605 255,605 265,610" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  <path d="M240,600 C250,595 260,595 270,600" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>

  <path d="M320,620 L325,610 L330,620" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->

  <circle cx="115" cy="633" r="2" fill="#78909c"/>

  <circle cx="285" cy="655" r="4" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="275" cy="653" r="3" fill="#78909c"/>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#64b5f6"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#bbdefb"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="trunkGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#5d4037"/>
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#795548"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#5d4037"/>
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="woodTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.01" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="furTexture" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" result="noise"/>
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G"/>
    </filter>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3"/>
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2"/>
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5"/>
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode/>
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="textGlow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="3" result="blur"/>
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky -->
  <rect width="400" height="400" fill="url(#skyGradient)"/>
  
  <!-- Background trees -->
  <g id="backgroundTrees">
    <path d="M0,400 L50,300 L30,300 L70,220 L50,220 L90,150 L110,220 L90,220 L130,300 L110,300 L160,400 Z" fill="#2e7d32" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    <path d="M100,400 L150,300 L130,300 L170,220 L150,220 L190,150 L210,220 L190,220 L230,300 L210,300 L260,400 Z" fill="#388e3c" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    <path d="M200,400 L250,300 L230,300 L270,220 L250,220 L290,150 L310,220 L290,220 L330,300 L310,300 L360,400 Z" fill="#2e7d32" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
    <path d="M300,400 L350,300 L330,300 L370,220 L350,220 L390,150 L410,220 L390,220 L430,300 L410,300 L460,400 Z" fill="#388e3c" filter="url(#furTexture)"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Ground -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="#8d6e63"/>
  <path d="M0,400 C50,390 100,410 150,395 C200,380 250,400 300,390 C350,380 400,400 400,400 L400,450 L0,450 Z" fill="#a1887f"/>
  
  <!-- Large tree trunk -->
  <rect x="150" y="100" width="100" height="600" fill="url(#trunkGradient)" filter="url(#woodTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Tree branches -->
  <path d="M150,200 L100,180 L90,150 L120,140 L150,150 Z" fill="#795548" filter="url(#woodTexture)"/>
  <path d="M250,250 L300,230 L310,200 L280,190 L250,200 Z" fill="#795548" filter="url(#woodTexture)"/>
  <path d="M150,350 L100,330 L90,300 L120,290 L150,300 Z" fill="#795548" filter="url(#woodTexture)"/>
  
  <!-- Tree leaves -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="150" rx="30" ry="20" fill="#388e3c"/>
  <ellipse cx="300" cy="200" rx="30" ry="20" fill="#388e3c"/>
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="300" rx="30" ry="20" fill="#388e3c"/>
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="100" rx="80" ry="50" fill="#388e3c"/>
  
  <!-- Ranger climbing down from tree -->
  <g id="ranger" transform="translate(200, 500)">
    <!-- Legs climbing down -->
    <path d="M-20,50 L-30,80 L-10,80 L-15,50 Z" fill="#33691e" transform="rotate(10, -20, 65)"/>
    <path d="M20,50 L10,80 L30,80 L25,50 Z" fill="#33691e" transform="rotate(-10, 20, 65)"/>
    
    <!-- Body climbing down -->
    <path d="M-30,-30 L30,-30 L20,50 L-20,50 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="-15" y="-30" width="30" height="40" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Arms climbing down -->
    <path d="M-30,-30 C-50,-20 -60,0 -50,20" fill="none" stroke="#33691e" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M30,-30 C50,-20 60,0 50,20" fill="none" stroke="#33691e" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    
    <!-- Head with disappointed expression -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-60" r="25" fill="#ffcc80"/>
    
    <!-- Hat -->
    <path d="M-25,-70 L25,-70 L20,-85 L-20,-85 Z" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="-20" y="-85" width="40" height="5" fill="#33691e"/>
    <rect x="-5" y="-90" width="10" height="5" fill="#33691e"/>
    <path d="M-15,-70 L15,-70 L10,-60 L-10,-60 Z" fill="#1b5e20"/>
    
    <!-- Face with disappointed expression -->
    <circle cx="-10" cy="-65" r="3" fill="#3e2723"/> <!-- Left eye -->
    <circle cx="10" cy="-65" r="3" fill="#3e2723"/> <!-- Right eye -->
    <path d="M-10,-50 C-5,-52 5,-52 10,-50" fill="none" stroke="#3e2723" stroke-width="1.5"/> <!-- Mouth showing disappointment -->
    
    <!-- Badge -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-10" r="7" fill="#ffd54f"/>
    <path d="M-3,-15 L3,-15 L0,-8 Z" fill="#ff6f00"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Climbing down motion lines -->
  <path d="M180,450 C170,445 165,440 170,435" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  <path d="M220,450 C230,445 235,440 230,435" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  <path d="M180,400 C170,395 165,390 170,385" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  <path d="M220,400 C230,395 235,390 230,385" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2"/>
  
  <!-- Failure text box -->
  <g id="failureText">
    <rect x="50" y="200" width="300" height="50" rx="10" ry="10" fill="white" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#dropShadow)"/>
    <text x="200" y="235" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#f44336" filter="url(#textGlow)">FAILED: Animal escaped!</text>
    <path d="M70,245 L330,245" stroke="#f44336" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="2,2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Small environment details -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="650" rx="60" ry="10" fill="#8d6e63" opacity="0.5"/>
  <ellipse cx="300" cy="670" rx="80" ry="15" fill="#8d6e63" opacity="0.3"/>
  
  <path d="M50,600 L55,590 L60,600" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  <path d="M80,620 L85,610 L90,620" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  <path d="M320,620 L325,610 L330,620" fill="none" stroke="#4caf50" stroke-width="1"/> <!-- Grass -->
  
  <!-- Small rocks -->
  <circle cx="120" cy="630" r="5" fill="#78909c"/>
  <circle cx="125" cy="635" r="3" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="115" cy="633" r="2" fill="#78909c"/>
  
  <circle cx="280" cy="650" r="7" fill="#78909c"/>
  <circle cx="285" cy="655" r="4" fill="#90a4ae"/>
  <circle cx="275" cy="653" r="3" fill="#78909c"/>
  
  <!-- Dropped equipment -->
  <rect x="100" y="600" width="30" height="5" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#5d4037" transform="rotate(30, 100, 600)"/>
  <g transform="translate(120, 620) rotate(15)">
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="20" fill="none" stroke="#b0bec5" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="none" stroke="#b0bec5" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M0,-20 L0,20 M-20,0 L20,0 M-15,-15 L15,15 M-15,15 L15,-15" 
          fill="none" stroke="#b0bec5" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Paw prints (distant) -->
  <g id="pawPrints" opacity="0.4">
    <path d="M330,550 C325,545 325,540 330,535 C335,540 335,545 330,550 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <path d="M350,530 C345,525 345,520 350,515 C355,520 355,525 350,530 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <path d="M370,510 C365,505 365,500 370,495 C375,500 375,505 370,510 Z" fill="#616161"/>
    <path d="M390,490 C385,485 385,480 390,475 C395,480 395,485 390,490 Z" fill="#616161"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Distant wolf howl effect -->
  <path d="M370,450 C380,440 390,440 400,450" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" opacity="0.5"/>
  <path d="M375,430 C385,420 395,420 405,430" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" opacity="0.5"/>
  <path d="M380,410 C390,400 400,400 410,410" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" opacity="0.5"/>
  
  <!-- Bird flying away (representing peace disturbed) -->
  <path d="M280,150 C290,140 300,145 310,140 C320,135 330,140 340,135" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2"/>
  <path d="M285,160 C295,150 305,155 315,150 C325,145 335,150 345,145" fill="none" stroke="#455a64" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

name: Simple Riddle
description: Player must solve a riddle to gain entry to a local secret club.

scene:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="alleyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#0A0A20" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#1A1A35" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="glow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="4" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Alley background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#alleyGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Brick walls -->
  <g id="leftWall">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="80" height="700" fill="#2A2040" />
    <!-- Brick pattern -->
    <g fill="none" stroke="#352845" stroke-width="1">
      <path d="M0,50 H80 M0,100 H80 M0,150 H80 M0,200 H80 M0,250 H80 M0,300 H80 M0,350 H80 M0,400 H80 M0,450 H80 M0,500 H80 M0,550 H80 M0,600 H80 M0,650 H80" />
      <path d="M20,0 V700 M40,25 V700 M60,0 V700" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <g id="rightWall">
    <rect x="320" y="0" width="80" height="700" fill="#2A2040" />
    <!-- Brick pattern -->
    <g fill="none" stroke="#352845" stroke-width="1">
      <path d="M320,50 H400 M320,100 H400 M320,150 H400 M320,200 H400 M320,250 H400 M320,300 H400 M320,350 H400 M320,400 H400 M320,450 H400 M320,500 H400 M320,550 H400 M320,600 H400 M320,650 H400" />
      <path d="M340,0 V700 M360,25 V700 M380,0 V700" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Mysterious door -->
  <g id="door">
    <rect x="120" y="200" width="160" height="300" rx="5" fill="#3B2A1F" />
    <rect x="130" y="210" width="140" height="280" rx="3" fill="#2D1E13" />
    
    <!-- Door carvings -->
    <path d="M150,240 C190,220 210,220 250,240 C260,300 260,360 250,440 C210,460 190,460 150,440 C140,360 140,300 150,240 Z" fill="#3B2A1F" />
    <path d="M160,250 C190,235 210,235 240,250 C250,300 250,350 240,430 C210,445 190,445 160,430 C150,350 150,300 160,250 Z" fill="none" stroke="#5D4A35" stroke-width="2" />
    <path d="M175,280 C190,270 210,270 225,280 C230,310 230,340 225,400 C210,410 190,410 175,400 C170,340 170,310 175,280 Z" fill="none" stroke="#5D4A35" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Mysterious symbols -->
    <path d="M145,260 L155,270 M155,260 L145,270" stroke="#5D4A35" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M245,260 L255,270 M255,260 L245,270" stroke="#5D4A35" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M145,410 L155,420 M155,410 L145,420" stroke="#5D4A35" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M245,410 L255,420 M255,410 L245,420" stroke="#5D4A35" stroke-width="1" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="340" r="15" fill="none" stroke="#5D4A35" stroke-width="1" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="340" r="5" fill="#5D4A35" />
    
    <!-- Door handle -->
    <circle cx="270" cy="350" r="8" fill="#695642" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="350" r="4" fill="#4A3C2E" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sign above door -->
  <g id="sign">
    <rect x="140" y="160" width="120" height="30" rx="5" fill="#4A3C2E" />
    <text x="200" y="182" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="16" fill="#E0D5C0" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">THE SPHINX</text>
    <circle cx="280" y="175" r="10" fill="#4A3C2E" stroke="#E0D5C0" stroke-width="1" />
    <text x="280" y="180" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" fill="#E0D5C0" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">?</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Atmospheric elements -->
  <g id="atmosphere">
    <!-- Dim light from above -->
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="160" rx="100" ry="20" fill="#9370DB" opacity="0.1" filter="url(#glow)" />
    
    <!-- Puddles -->
    <ellipse cx="100" cy="650" rx="30" ry="10" fill="#1A1A35" opacity="0.6" />
    <ellipse cx="280" cy="620" rx="40" ry="15" fill="#1A1A35" opacity="0.6" />
    
    <!-- Floating particles -->
    <g fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.3">
      <circle cx="150" cy="300" r="1" />
      <circle cx="240" cy="280" r="1" />
      <circle cx="120" cy="400" r="1" />
      <circle cx="260" cy="350" r="1" />
      <circle cx="180" cy="250" r="1" />
      <circle cx="220" cy="450" r="1" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Subtle spotlight on door -->
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="350" rx="100" ry="180" fill="#9370DB" opacity="0.08" filter="url(#glow)" />
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#1A1A35" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#0A0A20" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="woodTexture" x="0%" y="0%" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.01" numOctaves="2" result="noise" />
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" in2="noise" scale="5" xChannelSelector="R" yChannelSelector="G" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="glow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="2" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
    <radialGradient id="handShadow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="black" stop-opacity="0.3" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="black" stop-opacity="0" />

  </defs>
  
  <!-- Dark background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#bgGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Door (weathered wood) -->
  <g id="door">
    <rect x="50" y="50" width="300" height="600" rx="5" fill="#3B2A1F" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
    
    <!-- Door frame with symbols -->
    <rect x="60" y="60" width="280" height="580" rx="3" fill="#2D1E13" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
    
    <!-- Mysterious symbols etched into frame -->
    <g fill="none" stroke="#5D4A35" stroke-width="1.5">
      <!-- Left frame symbols -->
      <path d="M70,100 L90,120 M90,100 L70,120" />
      <path d="M70,200 C75,210 85,210 90,200 C90,190 70,190 70,200 Z" />
      <path d="M70,300 L90,300 M80,290 L80,310" />
      <path d="M70,400 L90,400 L80,380 Z" />
      <path d="M75,500 L85,500 L85,520 L75,520 Z" />
      
      <!-- Right frame symbols -->
      <path d="M310,100 L330,120 M330,100 L310,120" />
      <path d="M310,200 C315,210 325,210 330,200 C330,190 310,190 310,200 Z" />
      <path d="M310,300 L330,300 M320,290 L320,310" />
      <path d="M310,400 L330,400 L320,380 Z" />
      <path d="M315,500 L325,500 L325,520 L315,520 Z" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Door center panel -->
    <rect x="100" y="100" width="200" height="500" rx="2" fill="#2D1E13" />
    
    <!-- Weathered wood grain effect -->
    <g stroke="#1A1208" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.7">
      <path d="M110,120 C130,125 170,115 190,125 C210,135 250,125 290,120" />
      <path d="M110,160 C150,165 170,155 210,165 C230,175 270,165 290,160" />
      <path d="M110,200 C140,205 180,195 220,205 C240,215 260,205 290,200" />
      <path d="M110,240 C130,245 170,235 210,245 C250,255 270,245 290,240" />
      <path d="M110,280 C150,285 190,275 230,285 C250,295 270,285 290,280" />
      <path d="M110,320 C130,325 150,315 190,325 C230,335 270,325 290,320" />
      <path d="M110,360 C150,365 190,355 230,365 C250,375 270,365 290,360" />
      <path d="M110,400 C130,405 170,395 210,405 C250,415 270,405 290,400" />
      <path d="M110,440 C150,445 190,435 230,445 C250,455 270,445 290,440" />
      <path d="M110,480 C130,485 150,475 190,485 C230,495 270,485 290,480" />
      <path d="M110,520 C150,525 190,515 230,525 C250,535 270,525 290,520" />
      <path d="M110,560 C130,565 170,555 210,565 C250,575 270,565 290,560" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sphinx doorbell -->
  <g id="sphinxDoorbell" transform="translate(200, 320)">
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="30" ry="40" fill="#695642" />
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="25" ry="35" fill="#5D4A35" />
    
    <!-- Sphinx face -->
    <path d="M-15,-15 L15,-15 L0,0 Z" fill="#8A7A66" /> <!-- Head -->
    <path d="M-20,-5 L20,-5 L0,20 Z" fill="#695642" /> <!-- Body -->
    <ellipse cx="-8" cy="-10" rx="3" ry="2" fill="#1A1208" /> <!-- Left eye -->
    <ellipse cx="8" cy="-10" rx="3" ry="2" fill="#1A1208" /> <!-- Right eye -->
    <path d="M-5,-5 L5,-5" stroke="#1A1208" stroke-width="1" /> <!-- Mouth -->
    
    <!-- Button below sphinx -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="5" fill="#8A7A66" stroke="#1A1208" stroke-width="0.5" />
    
    <!-- Glow effect -->
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="35" ry="45" fill="none" stroke="#B8A088" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.6" filter="url(#glow)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- First-person hands reaching toward doorbell -->
  <g id="hands">
    <!-- Shadow under hands -->
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="600" rx="120" ry="30" fill="url(#handShadow)" />
    
    <!-- Left hand -->
    <g id="leftHand" transform="translate(130, 530) rotate(15)">
      <path d="M0,0 C-5,10 -10,30 -5,50 C0,70 10,80 20,70 C25,65 25,60 25,55 C25,50 20,45 15,48 C15,40 15,30 10,20 C5,10 0,0 0,0 Z" fill="#E0C8A0" />
      <path d="M15,48 C15,40 15,30 10,20" fill="none" stroke="#C4A878" stroke-width="1" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Right hand -->
    <g id="rightHand" transform="translate(270, 530) rotate(-15)">
      <path d="M0,0 C5,10 10,30 5,50 C0,70 -10,80 -20,70 C-25,65 -25,60 -25,55 C-25,50 -20,45 -15,48 C-15,40 -15,30 -10,20 C-5,10 0,0 0,0 Z" fill="#E0C8A0" />
      <path d="M-15,48 C-15,40 -15,30 -10,20" fill="none" stroke="#C4A878" stroke-width="1" />
      
      <!-- Finger reaching for doorbell -->
      <path d="M-20,50 C-15,40 -10,35 -5,40 C0,45 0,55 -5,60 C-10,65 -15,60 -20,50 Z" fill="#E0C8A0" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Subtle light effects -->
  <g opacity="0.7">
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="320" rx="60" ry="80" fill="#9370DB" opacity="0.1" filter="url(#glow)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dust particles -->
  <g fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.3">
    <circle cx="150" cy="300" r="1" />
    <circle cx="240" cy="280" r="1" />
    <circle cx="120" cy="400" r="1" />
    <circle cx="260" cy="350" r="1" />
    <circle cx="180" cy="250" r="1" />
    <circle cx="220" cy="450" r="1" />
    <circle cx="170" cy="380" r="1" />
    <circle cx="230" cy="410" r="1" />
    <circle cx="190" cy="330" r="1" />

</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#1A1A35" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#0A0A20" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="glow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="3" result="blur" />

    </filter>
    <linearGradient id="doorwayLight" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4A3C2E" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2D1E13" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Dark background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#bgGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Alley walls -->
  <g id="alleyWalls">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="50" height="700" fill="#2A2040" />
    <rect x="350" y="0" width="50" height="700" fill="#2A2040" />
    
    <!-- Brick patterns -->
    <g fill="none" stroke="#352845" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5">
      <path d="M0,50 H50 M0,100 H50 M0,150 H50 M0,200 H50 M0,250 H50 M0,300 H50 M0,350 H50 M0,400 H50 M0,450 H50 M0,500 H50 M0,550 H50 M0,600 H50 M0,650 H50" />
      <path d="M350,50 H400 M350,100 H400 M350,150 H400 M350,200 H400 M350,250 H400 M350,300 H400 M350,350 H400 M350,400 H400 M350,450 H400 M350,500 H400 M350,550 H400 M350,600 H400 M350,650 H400" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Doorway -->
  <g id="doorway">
    <rect x="100" y="100" width="200" height="500" fill="url(#doorwayLight)" />
    <rect x="110" y="110" width="180" height="490" fill="#1A1208" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Doorkeeper -->
  <g id="doorkeeper">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="180" y="250" width="40" height="250" rx="5" fill="#3A2963" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="185" y="500" width="10" height="150" fill="#1E1433" />
    <rect x="205" y="500" width="10" height="150" fill="#1E1433" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="160" y="270" width="20" height="90" rx="5" fill="#3A2963" transform="rotate(-15, 160, 270)" />
    <rect x="220" y="270" width="20" height="90" rx="5" fill="#3A2963" transform="rotate(15, 220, 270)" />
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <circle cx="145" cy="350" r="8" fill="#E0C8A0" />
    <circle cx="255" cy="350" r="8" fill="#E0C8A0" />
    
    <!-- Purple vest -->
    <path d="M180,250 L220,250 L225,450 L175,450 Z" fill="#673AB7" />
    <path d="M190,250 L210,250 L210,450 L190,450 Z" fill="#512DA8" />
    <g fill="none" stroke="#8B5CF6" stroke-width="1">
      <path d="M190,280 H210 M190,310 H210 M190,340 H210 M190,370 H210 M190,400 H210 M190,430 H210" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="190" y="230" width="20" height="20" fill="#E0C8A0" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="200" rx="25" ry="30" fill="#E0C8A0" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M175,195 C175,180 190,170 200,170 C210,170 225,180 225,195 C225,185 220,175 200,175 C180,175 175,185 175,195 Z" fill="#1A1208" />
    
    <!-- Face -->
    <g id="face">
      <!-- Eyes with spectacles -->
      <circle cx="190" cy="195" r="5" fill="#FFFFFF" />
      <circle cx="210" cy="195" r="5" fill="#FFFFFF" />
      <circle cx="190" cy="195" r="2" fill="#1A1208" />
      <circle cx="210" cy="195" r="2" fill="#1A1208" />
      
      <!-- Spectacles -->
      <circle cx="190" cy="195" r="8" fill="none" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="1" />
      <circle cx="210" cy="195" r="8" fill="none" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M198,195 L202,195" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M182,195 C178,190 175,195 175,195" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M218,195 C222,190 225,195 225,195" stroke="#A0A0A0" stroke-width="1" />
      
      <!-- Enigmatic smile -->
      <path d="M190,210 C195,215 205,215 210,210" fill="none" stroke="#1A1208" stroke-width="1" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character (from behind) -->
  <g id="player">
    <!-- Head -->
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="550" rx="20" ry="25" fill="#D0B090" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M180,545 C180,535 190,525 200,525 C210,525 220,535 220,545 C220,535 215,530 200,530 C185,530 180,535 180,545 Z" fill="#5A3825" />
    
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M170,575 L230,575 L240,700 L160,700 Z" fill="#3F51B5" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="160" y="580" width="15" height="80" rx="5" fill="#3F51B5" />
    <rect x="225" y="580" width="15" height="80" rx="5" fill="#3F51B5" />
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="190" y="550" width="20" height="25" fill="#D0B090" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Atmospheric effects -->
  <g opacity="0.5">
    <!-- Light from doorway -->
    <rect x="110" y="110" width="180" height="490" fill="#673AB7" opacity="0.05" filter="url(#glow)" />
    
    <!-- Mysterious symbols in the air -->
    <g fill="none" stroke="#8B5CF6" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3">
      <path d="M120,150 L140,170 M140,150 L120,170" />
      <path d="M260,150 L280,170 M280,150 L260,170" />

      <path d="M250,250 L260,260 L250,270 L240,260 Z" />

  </g>
  
  <!-- The SPHINX sign -->
  <g id="sign" transform="translate(200, 80)">
    <rect x="-60" y="-15" width="120" height="30" rx="5" fill="#4A3C2E" />
    <text x="0" y="7" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="16" fill="#E0D5C0" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">THE SPHINX</text>
    <circle cx="70" y="0" r="10" fill="#4A3C2E" stroke="#E0D5C0" stroke-width="1" />
    <text x="70" y="5" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" fill="#E0D5C0" text-anchor="middle" font-weight="bold">?</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dust particles -->

    <circle cx="240" cy="280" r="1" />
    <circle cx="120" cy="400" r="1" />
    <circle cx="260" cy="350" r="1" />

    <circle cx="220" cy="450" r="1" />
    <circle cx="170" cy="380" r="1" />
    <circle cx="230" cy="410" r="1" />
    <circle cx="190" cy="330" r="1" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#0A0A20" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#050510" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="glow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="4" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
    <linearGradient id="cardGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4A3C2E" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2D1E13" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="textGlow" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="1" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Dark background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#bgGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Doorkeeper's hands presenting card -->
  <g id="hands">
    <!-- Left hand -->
    <path d="M100,350 C90,330 90,310 100,300 C110,290 130,290 140,300 C150,310 150,320 145,330 C140,340 130,345 120,340 C115,350 110,360 100,350 Z" fill="#E0C8A0" />
    <path d="M120,340 C115,330 115,320 120,310" fill="none" stroke="#C4A878" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Right hand -->
    <path d="M300,350 C310,330 310,310 300,300 C290,290 270,290 260,300 C250,310 250,320 255,330 C260,340 270,345 280,340 C285,350 290,360 300,350 Z" fill="#E0C8A0" />
    <path d="M280,340 C285,330 285,320 280,310" fill="none" stroke="#C4A878" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Ornate card -->
  <g id="card">
    <!-- Card base -->
    <rect x="100" y="250" width="200" height="300" rx="10" fill="url(#cardGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Card border -->
    <rect x="110" y="260" width="180" height="280" rx="5" fill="none" stroke="#8B5CF6" stroke-width="2" />
    
    <!-- Ornate corners -->
    <g fill="none" stroke="#8B5CF6" stroke-width="1">
      <path d="M110,280 C120,270 130,270 140,280" />
      <path d="M260,280 C270,270 280,270 290,280" />
      <path d="M110,520 C120,530 130,530 140,520" />
      <path d="M260,520 C270,530 280,530 290,520" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Center decoration -->
    <circle cx="200" cy="400" r="30" fill="none" stroke="#8B5CF6" stroke-width="1" />
    <circle cx="200" cy="400" r="20" fill="none" stroke="#8B5CF6" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M180,400 H220 M200,380 V420" stroke="#8B5CF6" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Glowing text placeholder (actual text in next SVG) -->
    <rect x="130" y="320" width="140" height="30" rx="5" fill="#8B5CF6" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#textGlow)" />
    <rect x="130" y="360" width="140" height="30" rx="5" fill="#8B5CF6" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#textGlow)" />
    <rect x="130" y="400" width="140" height="30" rx="5" fill="#8B5CF6" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#textGlow)" />
    <rect x="130" y="440" width="140" height="30" rx="5" fill="#8B5CF6" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#textGlow)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Atmospheric glow around card -->
  <rect x="100" y="250" width="200" height="300" rx="10" fill="#8B5CF6" opacity="0.1" filter="url(#glow)" />
  
  <!-- Mysterious symbols floating -->
  <g fill="none" stroke="#8B5CF6" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.4">
    <path d="M50,150 L70,170 M70,150 L50,170" />

    <!-- Body -->

    <!-- Raised finger in "aha" moment -->
    <g id="raisedFinger">
      <path d="M210,250 C220,240 230,250 235,260 C240,270 235,280 225,285 C215,290 205,285 200,275 C195,265 200,255 210,250 Z" fill="#D0B090" />
      <path d="M225,260 L215,270" stroke="#BFA080" stroke-width="1" />

  <!-- Doorkeeper watching expectantly -->
  <g id="doorkeeper" transform="translate(300, 300)">

    <path d="M0,0 C20,0 40,20 40,50 C40,80 20,100 0,100 L-30,100 C-50,100 -70,80 -70,50 C-70,20 -50,0 -30,0 Z" fill="#E0C8A0" />

    <!-- Partial smile -->

    <!-- Purple vest (partial) -->

  </g>
  
  <!-- Speech bubble with "FIRE!" -->

    <!-- Flame-styled "FIRE!" text -->

      <path d="M-50,-20 C-45,-30 -40,-25 -35,-35 C-30,-25 -25,-30 -20,-20 C-15,-30 -10,-25 -5,-35 C0,-25 5,-30 10,-20 C15,-30 20,-25 25,-35 C30,-25 35,-30 40,-20 C45,-30 50,-25 55,-35 C60,-25 65,-30 70,-20 L70,20 L-50,20 Z" fill="url(#flameGradient)" opacity="0.8" />
      
      <!-- "FIRE!" text -->

  </g>
  
  <!-- Light burst behind player -->

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->

    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="glow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="3" result="blur" />

    <radialGradient id="sparkleGradient" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">

    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="180" y="390" width="40" height="30" fill="#E0C8A0" />

    <path d="M140,420 L260,420 L270,500 L130,500 Z" fill="#673AB7" />
    <path d="M170,420 L230,420 L230,500 L170,500 Z" fill="#512DA8" />

      <path d="M170,440 H230 M170,460 H230 M170,480 H230" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Clapping hands -->
  <g id="clappingHands">

    <path d="M160,370 C150,360 150,350 160,340 C170,330 180,330 190,340 C200,350 200,360 190,370 C180,380 170,380 160,370 Z" fill="#E0C8A0" />
    <path d="M170,350 L180,340" stroke="#C4A878" stroke-width="1" />

    <path d="M230,350 L220,340" stroke="#C4A878" stroke-width="1" />

    <circle cx="200" cy="355" r="20" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sparkles around face -->
  <g id="sparkles">

      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="5" fill="url(#sparkleGradient)" opacity="0.8" />

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#1A1A35" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#0A0A20" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="doorLightGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFCC80" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FF8C00" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="glow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="5" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="textGlow" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="2" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Dark background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#bgGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Alley walls -->
  <g id="alleyWalls">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="50" height="700" fill="#2A2040" />
    <rect x="350" y="0" width="50" height="700" fill="#2A2040" />
    
    <!-- Brick patterns -->
    <g fill="none" stroke="#352845" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5">
      <path d="M0,50 H50 M0,100 H50 M0,150 H50 M0,200 H50 M0,250 H50 M0,300 H50 M0,350 H50 M0,400 H50 M0,450 H50 M0,500 H50 M0,550 H50 M0,600 H50 M0,650 H50" />
      <path d="M350,50 H400 M350,100 H400 M350,150 H400 M350,200 H400 M350,250 H400 M350,300 H400 M350,350 H400 M350,400 H400 M350,450 H400 M350,500 H400 M350,550 H400 M350,600 H400 M350,650 H400" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Open doorway with light -->
  <g id="doorway">
    <!-- Door frame -->
    <rect x="100" y="100" width="200" height="500" fill="#3B2A1F" />
    
    <!-- Opening with light spilling out -->
    <rect x="110" y="110" width="180" height="480" fill="url(#doorLightGradient)" filter="url(#glow)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player being welcomed inside -->
  <g id="player">
    <!-- Player from behind/side -->
    <g transform="translate(150, 350)">
      <!-- Head -->
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="20" ry="25" fill="#D0B090" />
      
      <!-- Hair -->
      <path d="M-20,-10 C-20,-25 -10,-30 0,-30 C10,-30 20,-25 20,-10 C20,-20 10,-25 0,-25 C-10,-25 -20,-20 -20,-10 Z" fill="#5A3825" />
      
      <!-- Body -->
      <path d="M-30,25 L30,25 L35,125 L-35,125" fill="#3F51B5" />
      
      <!-- Neck -->
      <rect x="-10" y="0" width="20" height="25" fill="#D0B090" />
      
      <!-- Arm -->
      <rect x="30" y="35" width="15" height="40" rx="5" fill="#3F51B5" />
      
      <!-- Head turned slightly -->
      <ellipse cx="5" cy="-5" rx="5" ry="10" fill="#D0B090" />
      <ellipse cx="8" cy="-5" rx="2" ry="3" fill="#1A1208" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Doorkeeper welcoming -->
  <g id="doorkeeper">
    <!-- Doorkeeper bowing slightly -->
    <g transform="translate(250, 350)">
      <!-- Head -->
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="25" ry="30" fill="#E0C8A0" />
      
      <!-- Hair -->
      <path d="M-25,-10 C-25,-25 -15,-35 0,-35 C15,-35 25,-25 25,-10 C25,-20 15,-30 0,-30 C-15,-30 -25,-20 -25,-10 Z" fill="#1A1208" />
      
      <!-- Body (bowing) -->
      <path d="M-20,30 L20,30 L25,130 L-25,130" fill="#673AB7" transform="rotate(15, 0, 30)" />
      
      <!-- Neck -->
      <rect x="-10" y="0" width="20" height="30" fill="#E0C8A0" />
      
      <!-- Face -->
      <g id="face">
        <!-- Eyes with spectacles -->
        <ellipse cx="-8" cy="-5" rx="5" ry="4" fill="#FFFFFF" />
        <ellipse cx="8" cy="-5" rx="5" ry="4" fill="#FFFFFF" />
        <ellipse cx="-8" cy="-5" rx="2" ry="1.5" fill="#1A1208" />

    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#0A1428" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#050A14" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="glow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="5" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="textGlow" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="2" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Dark background - very dark blues -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#bgGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Alley walls - longer and darker -->
  <g id="alleyWalls">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="70" height="700" fill="#050A14" />
    <rect x="330" y="0" width="70" height="700" fill="#050A14" />
    
    <!-- Brick patterns -->
    <g fill="none" stroke="#0A1428" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5">
      <path d="M0,50 H70 M0,100 H70 M0,150 H70 M0,200 H70 M0,250 H70 M0,300 H70 M0,350 H70 M0,400 H70 M0,450 H70 M0,500 H70 M0,550 H70 M0,600 H70 M0,650 H70" />
      <path d="M330,50 H400 M330,100 H400 M330,150 H400 M330,200 H400 M330,250 H400 M330,300 H400 M330,350 H400 M330,400 H400 M330,450 H400 M330,500 H400 M330,550 H400 M330,600 H400 M330,650 H400" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player walking away with hunched shoulders -->
  <g id="player" transform="translate(200, 400)">
    <!-- Head (looking down) -->
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="-90" rx="20" ry="25" fill="#D0B090" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-20,-100 C-20,-115 -10,-120 0,-120 C10,-120 20,-115 20,-100 C20,-110 10,-115 0,-115 C-10,-115 -20,-110 -20,-100 Z" fill="#5A3825" />
    
    <!-- Hunched body -->
    <g transform="rotate(15, 0, -60)">
      <path d="M-30,-60 L30,-60 L40,40 L-40,40 Z" fill="#3F51B5" />
      
      <!-- Hunched shoulders -->
      <ellipse cx="-25" cy="-55" rx="10" ry="15" fill="#3F51B5" />
      <ellipse cx="25" cy="-55" rx="10" ry="15" fill="#3F51B5" />
      
      <!-- Arms -->
      <path d="M-30,-40 C-40,-30 -45,-10 -40,10" stroke="#3F51B5" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
      <path d="M30,-40 C40,-30 45,-10 40,10" stroke="#3F51B5" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
      
      <!-- Legs -->
      <path d="M-20,40 L-30,100" stroke="#3F51B5" stroke-width="15" fill="none" />
      <path d="M20,40 L10,100" stroke="#3F51B5" stroke-width="15" fill="none" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Neck (bent forward) -->
    <path d="M-5,-65 C-5,-75 5,-75 5,-65 L5,-60 L-5,-60 Z" fill="#D0B090" />
    
    <!-- Face (looking down) -->
    <g transform="translate(0, -90)">
      <!-- Sad eyes (partially visible) -->
      <path d="M-10,5 L-5,5" stroke="#1A1208" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M5,5 L10,5" stroke="#1A1208" stroke-width="1" />
      
      <!-- Sad mouth -->
      <path d="M-5,15 C0,10 5,10 10,15" fill="none" stroke="#1A1208" stroke-width="1" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Long shadow behind player -->
  <path d="M170,500 L100,700 L300,700 L230,500 Z" fill="#000000" opacity="0.2" />
  
  <!-- Distant door (fading into background) -->
  <g id="distantDoor" transform="translate(200, 150) scale(0.5)" opacity="0.5">
    <rect x="-100" y="-150" width="200" height="300" fill="#3B2A1F" />
    <rect x="-90" y="-140" width="180" height="280" fill="#2D1E13" />
    <rect x="-90" y="-140" width="180" height="280" fill="#D32F2F" opacity="0.1" filter="url(#glow)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- "Perhaps next time..." text -->
  <g id="nextTimeText" filter="url(#textGlow)">
    <text x="200" y="650" font-family="Georgia, serif" font-size="14" fill="#8B9CC8" text-anchor="middle" font-style="italic">Perhaps next time...</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Atmospheric effects -->
  <g opacity="0.2">
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="350" rx="200" ry="300" fill="#1E3A8A" opacity="0.05" filter="url(#glow)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Dust particles -->
  <g fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.1">
    <circle cx="100" cy="150" r="1" />
    <circle cx="300" cy="150" r="1" />
    <circle cx="150" cy="200" r="1" />
    <circle cx="250" cy="200" r="1" />
    <circle cx="100" cy="250" r="1" />

    <circle cx="150" cy="400" r="1" />

    <circle cx="100" cy="450" r="1" />

    <circle cx="150" cy="500" r="1" />

    <circle cx="100" cy="550" r="1" />
    <circle cx="300" cy="550" r="1" />
    <circle cx="150" cy="600" r="1" />
    <circle cx="250" cy="600" r="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Rain-like effect to enhance sadness -->
  <g stroke="#8B9CC8" opacity="0.2">
    <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="90" y2="120" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <line x1="150" y1="120" x2="140" y2="140" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <line x1="200" y1="80" x2="190" y2="100" stroke-width="0.5" />

    <line x1="320" y1="140" x2="310" y2="160" stroke-width="0.5" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="#f5f0e8"/>
  
  <!-- Split screen divider -->
  <line x1="200" y1="100" x2="200" y2="600" stroke="#ccc" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Left side background (player) -->
  <rect x="0" y="100" width="200" height="500" fill="#f8f5f2"/>
  
  <!-- Right side background (opponent) -->
  <rect x="200" y="100" width="200" height="500" fill="#f0ebe5"/>
  
  <!-- Player (left side) -->
  <g transform="translate(50, 200)">
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M20,30 C25,20 40,15 60,20 C75,25 85,40 80,50" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M20,30 C30,25 35,25 40,30" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M80,50 C75,45 70,45 65,50" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Eyes -->
    <ellipse cx="35" cy="45" rx="5" ry="3" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <ellipse cx="65" cy="45" rx="5" ry="3" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <circle cx="35" cy="45" r="1.5" fill="#333"/>
    <circle cx="65" cy="45" r="1.5" fill="#333"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (thoughtful) -->
    <path d="M30,35 C33,32 37,32 40,35" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <path d="M60,35 C63,32 67,32 70,35" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Nose -->
    <path d="M50,50 C52,55 52,60 50,60" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (thoughtful) -->
    <path d="M40,70 C45,72 55,72 60,70" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M40,90 C45,95 55,95 60,90" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Shoulders -->
    <path d="M20,110 C30,105 70,105 80,110" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M30,110 L30,170 C40,175 60,175 70,170 L70,110" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Thought bubble -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="20" r="5" fill="#333" opacity="0.3"/>
    <circle cx="110" cy="15" r="7" fill="#333" opacity="0.3"/>
    <circle cx="125" cy="10" r="10" fill="#333" opacity="0.3"/>
    <ellipse cx="145" cy="5" rx="15" ry="12" fill="#fff" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
    <text x="145" y="10" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Hmm...</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Opponent (right side) -->
  <g transform="translate(250, 200)">
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M20,25 C25,15 75,15 80,25" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M20,25 C25,35 30,40 30,45" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M80,25 C75,35 70,40 70,45" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Eyes -->
    <ellipse cx="35" cy="45" rx="5" ry="3" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <ellipse cx="65" cy="45" rx="5" ry="3" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <circle cx="35" cy="45" r="1.5" fill="#333"/>
    <circle cx="65" cy="45" r="1.5" fill="#333"/>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (one raised) -->
    <path d="M30,35 C33,32 37,32 40,35" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    <path d="M60,30 C63,27 67,27 70,30" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Nose -->
    <path d="M50,50 C52,55 52,60 50,60" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (slight smirk) -->
    <path d="M40,70 C45,73 55,74 60,72" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M40,90 C45,95 55,95 60,90" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Shoulders -->
    <path d="M20,110 C30,105 70,105 80,110" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Body -->
    <path d="M30,110 L30,170 C40,175 60,175 70,170 L70,110" fill="none" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="200" y="60" font-family="Georgia, serif" font-size="24" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">The Match</text>
  
  <!-- Labels -->

    <!-- Blurred chess pieces -->

    <circle cx="167.5" cy="62.5" r="15" fill="#444" opacity="0.7"/>
    <circle cx="202.5" cy="97.5" r="15" fill="#fff" opacity="0.7"/>
    <circle cx="132.5" cy="202.5" r="15" fill="#fff" opacity="0.7"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Hand hovering over pieces with motion blur -->
  <defs>
    <filter id="motion-blur" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" result="blur1"/>
      <feOffset in="blur1" dx="3" dy="0" result="offsetBlur1"/>
      <feOffset in="blur1" dx="-3" dy="0" result="offsetBlur2"/>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode in="offsetBlur1"/>
        <feMergeNode in="offsetBlur2"/>
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic"/>
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- The hand -->
  <g transform="translate(180, 350) rotate(15)" filter="url(#motion-blur)">

    <!-- Motion lines -->
    <path d="M-30,20 C-20,15 -10,12 0,10" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" opacity="0.5"/>
    <path d="M-25,0 C-15,-5 -5,-8 5,-10" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" opacity="0.5"/>
    <path d="M-20,-20 C-10,-25 0,-28 10,-30" stroke="#666" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="2,2" opacity="0.5"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion blur effects for indecision -->
  <g opacity="0.3">
    <path d="M170,330 C175,335 180,340 185,345" stroke="#666" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M190,330 C185,335 180,340 175,345" stroke="#666" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M160,350 C165,355 170,360 175,365" stroke="#666" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <path d="M180,350 C175,355 170,360 165,365" stroke="#666" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Thought bubble -->
  <g transform="translate(120, 250)">
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="5" fill="#333" opacity="0.2"/>
    <circle cx="-10" cy="-10" r="7" fill="#333" opacity="0.2"/>
    <circle cx="-25" cy="-15" r="10" fill="#333" opacity="0.2"/>
    <ellipse cx="-50" cy="-25" rx="20" ry="15" fill="#fff" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.7"/>
    <text x="-50" y="-22" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="10" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333" opacity="0.7">Queen or Rook?</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="200" y="100" font-family="Georgia, serif" font-size="28" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">Moment of Decision</text>
  
  <!-- Subtle vignette effect -->
  <radialGradient id="vignette" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="65%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="transparent"/>
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="rgba(0,0,0,0.3)"/>
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="url(#vignette)" mask="url(#vignetteHole)"/>
  <mask id="vignetteHole">
    <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="white"/>
    <radialGradient id="maskGradient" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="65%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="black"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="white"/>
    </radialGradient>
    <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="url(#maskGradient)"/>
  </mask>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

      <path d="M-7.5,2.5 L7.5,2.5" fill="none" stroke="#000" stroke-width="0.7"/>

      <ellipse cx="0" cy="2.5" rx="8" ry="3" fill="#333" opacity="0.3"/>
      <path d="M0,-12.5 C-2.5,-12.5 -3.5,-10.5 -3.5,-8.5 C-3.5,-6.5 -2.5,-5.5 -1.5,-4.5 L-4.5,0.5 C-5.5,1.5 -6.5,2.5 -6.5,4.5 C-6.5,5.5 -2.5,7.5 0,7.5 C2.5,7.5 6.5,5.5 6.5,4.5 C6.5,2.5 5.5,1.5 4.5,0.5 L1.5,-4.5 C2.5,-5.5 3.5,-6.5 3.5,-8.5 C3.5,-10.5 2.5,-12.5 0,-12.5 Z" fill="#fff" stroke="#000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <circle cx="0" cy="-8.5" r="1" fill="#000"/>

      <path d="M-6.5,4.5 L6.5,4.5" fill="none" stroke="#000" stroke-width="0.7"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Black Pawn - Defending piece -->

      <path d="M0,-9.5 C-2.5,-9.5 -4.5,-7.5 -4.5,-5.5 C-4.5,-3.5 -2.5,-1.5 0,-1.5 C2.5,-1.5 4.5,-3.5 4.5,-5.5 C4.5,-7.5 2.5,-9.5 0,-9.5 Z" fill="#444" stroke="#000" stroke-width="1"/>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="#f5f0e8"/>
  
  <!-- Opponent checking watch with impatient expression -->
  <g transform="translate(100, 200)">
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="80" fill="#f0c7a5" stroke="#a58b76" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M40,50 C50,30 150,30 160,50" fill="#553322" stroke="#442211" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M40,50 C50,70 60,80 60,90" fill="#553322" stroke="#442211" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M160,50 C150,70 140,80 140,90" fill="#553322" stroke="#442211" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Eyes (exaggerated impatient) -->
    <g>
      <!-- Left eye -->
      <ellipse cx="70" cy="90" rx="12" ry="8" fill="#fff" stroke="#000" stroke-width="1.5"/>
      <circle cx="70" cy="90" r="4" fill="#2b4b6f"/>
      <path d="M58,85 C62,80 78,80 82,85" fill="none" stroke="#553322" stroke-width="2"/>
      
      <!-- Right eye -->
      <ellipse cx="130" cy="90" rx="12" ry="8" fill="#fff" stroke="#000" stroke-width="1.5"/>
      <circle cx="130" cy="90" r="4" fill="#2b4b6f"/>
      <path d="M118,85 C122,80 138,80 142,85" fill="none" stroke="#553322" stroke-width="2"/>
      
      <!-- Eyebrows (raised and furrowed) -->
      <path d="M60,70 C70,65 80,65 85,70" fill="none" stroke="#553322" stroke-width="3"/>
      <path d="M115,70 C125,65 135,65 140,70" fill="none" stroke="#553322" stroke-width="3"/>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Nose -->
    <path d="M100,100 C104,110 104,120 100,120" fill="none" stroke="#a58b76" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Mouth (impatient) -->
    <path d="M80,140 C90,145 110,145 120,140" fill="none" stroke="#a58b76" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M90,150 C100,148 110,148 110,150" fill="none" stroke="#a58b76" stroke-width="1"/>
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <path d="M80,180 C90,190 110,190 120,180" fill="#f0c7a5" stroke="#a58b76" stroke-width="1.5"/>
    
    <!-- Shoulders/upper body -->
    <path d="M40,220 C60,210 140,210 160,220" fill="#4a6ea9" stroke="#3a5e99" stroke-width="2"/>
    <path d="M60,220 L60,300 C80,310 120,310 140,300 L140,220" fill="#4a6ea9" stroke="#3a5e99" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Arm checking watch -->
    <g>
      <!-- Sleeve -->
      <path d="M140,220 C160,230 180,260 170,290" fill="#4a6ea9" stroke="#3a5e99" stroke-width="2"/>
      
      <!-- Forearm -->
      <path d="M170,290 C165,310 160,320 155,330" fill="#f0c7a5" stroke="#a58b76" stroke-width="1.5"/>
      
      <!-- Hand -->
      <path d="M155,330 C150,335 145,345 150,350 C160,360 170,350 175,340 C180,335 175,330 170,325 C165,320 160,325 155,330 Z" fill="#f0c7a5" stroke="#a58b76" stroke-width="1.5"/>
      
      <!-- Watch -->
      <rect x="145" y="320" width="25" height="20" rx="5" fill="#333" stroke="#000" stroke-width="1"/>
      <rect x="148" y="323" width="19" height="14" rx="2" fill="#f0f0f0" stroke="#ccc" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="157.5" y1="323" x2="157.5" y2="337" stroke="#666" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <line x1="148" y1="330" x2="167" y2="330" stroke="#666" stroke-width="0.5"/>
      <path d="M157.5,330 L163,326" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1"/>
      <path d="M157.5,330 L154,334" stroke="#333" stroke-width="0.7"/>

    <text x="0" y="50" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#3498db">Queen to c8</text>

  </g>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background gradient -->
  <defs>

    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">

  <!-- Blurred background -->

    <line x1="390" y1="110" x2="380" y2="140" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1.5" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Close-up of character's face -->

      <circle cx="-45" cy="-25" r="3" fill="white" />

    <g id="rightEye">

      <circle cx="40" cy="-20" r="5" fill="#1a202c" />
      <circle cx="35" cy="-25" r="3" fill="white" />

    <!-- Eyebrows (concerned) -->

    <!-- Nose -->
