<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Defs for gradients and filters -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="groundGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2f855a" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#276749" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2d3748" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#4a5568" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="waterGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3182ce" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2c5282" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="metalShine">
      <feSpecularLighting result="specOut" specularExponent="20" lighting-color="#ffffff">
        <fePointLight x="200" y="100" z="150" />
      </feSpecularLighting>
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="specOut" operator="arithmetic" k1="0" k2="1" k3="1" k4="0" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky background (POV shot so dimmed) -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="250" fill="url(#skyGradient)" opacity="0.7" />
  
  <!-- River in background -->
  <rect x="0" y="250" width="400" height="150" fill="url(#waterGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Water ripples -->
  <g opacity="0.7">
    <path d="M0,270 Q20,260 40,270 Q60,280 80,270 Q100,260 120,270 Q140,280 160,270 Q180,260 200,270 Q220,280 240,270 Q260,260 280,270 Q300,280 320,270 Q340,260 360,270 Q380,280 400,270" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
    <path d="M0,290 Q20,280 40,290 Q60,300 80,290 Q100,280 120,290 Q140,300 160,290 Q180,280 200,290 Q220,300 240,290 Q260,280 280,290 Q300,300 320,290 Q340,280 360,290 Q380,300 400,290" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
    <path d="M0,310 Q20,300 40,310 Q60,320 80,310 Q100,300 120,310 Q140,320 160,310 Q180,300 200,310 Q220,320 240,310 Q260,300 280,310 Q300,320 320,310 Q340,300 360,310 Q380,320 400,310" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
    <path d="M0,330 Q20,320 40,330 Q60,340 80,330 Q100,320 120,330 Q140,340 160,330 Q180,320 200,330 Q220,340 240,330 Q260,320 280,330 Q300,340 320,330 Q340,320 360,330 Q380,340 400,330" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Riverbank ground -->
  <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="url(#groundGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Broken bridge in background -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 250) scale(0.7)">
    <!-- Left section -->
    <rect x="-150" y="0" width="100" height="20" fill="#5a4321" />
    <!-- Right section -->
    <rect x="50" y="0" width="100" height="20" fill="#5a4321" />

    <line x1="-50" y1="10" x2="50" y2="10" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" opacity="0.7" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Scanning effect (POV perspective) -->
  <g opacity="0.3">
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="350" rx="180" ry="80" fill="none" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="2" />
    <ellipse cx="200" cy="350" rx="150" ry="65" fill="none" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="2" />

    <line x1="120" y1="350" x2="280" y2="350" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Fallen tree branch -->
  <g transform="translate(100, 500)">
    <path d="M-50,20 C-30,10 30,-10 50,-30" stroke="#8b5d33" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
    <path d="M-20,15 C-10,5 0,-5 10,-15" stroke="#8b5d33" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />

    <text x="0" y="72" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1a202c">Branch</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Coiled rope -->

    <path d="M0,0 C10,5 15,10 10,15 C5,20 -5,20 -10,15 C-15,10 -15,0 -10,-5 C-5,-10 5,-10 10,-5 C15,0 15,10 10,15" fill="none" stroke="#d69e2e" stroke-width="5" />

    <rect x="-30" y="55" width="60" height="25" rx="5" fill="#f6e05e" opacity="0.8" />
    <text x="0" y="72" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1a202c">Rope</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Metal toolbox -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 550)">
    <!-- Main box -->
    <rect x="-40" y="-25" width="80" height="50" rx="5" fill="#718096" filter="url(#metalShine)" />

    <!-- Handle -->

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Defs for gradients and filters -->
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="lightbulbGlow" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#faf089" stop-opacity="0.9" />
      <stop offset="70%" stop-color="#f6e05e" stop-opacity="0.5" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#f6e05e" stop-opacity="0" />
    </radialGradient>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="10" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background (dimmed to focus on face) -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="#2d3748" opacity="0.3" />

    <path d="M-100,-50 C-110,-30 -120,0 -110,30 C-100,60 -70,80 -30,90 C10,100 50,90 80,70 C110,50 120,20 110,-10 C100,-40 80,-60 50,-70 C20,-80 -20,-80 -50,-70 C-80,-60 -90,-70 -100,-50 Z" fill="#f6e05e" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />

      <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="30" ry="25" fill="white" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="1" />

      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#2b6cb0" />
      
      <!-- Pupil (dilated) -->
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="8" fill="#1a202c" />
      
      <!-- Eye shine -->
      <circle cx="-5" cy="-5" r="3" fill="white" />
      
      <!-- Eyelid -->
      <path d="M-30,-10 C-20,-25 20,-25 30,-10" fill="none" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="3" />

    </g>
    
    <!-- Right eye -->

      <!-- Eye white -->
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="30" ry="25" fill="white" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="1" />
      
      <!-- Iris (widened with realization) -->
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#2b6cb0" />
      
      <!-- Pupil (dilated) -->
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="8" fill="#1a202c" />
      
      <!-- Eye shine -->
      <circle cx="-5" cy="-5" r="3" fill="white" />
      
      <!-- Eyelid -->
      <path d="M-30,-10 C-20,-25 20,-25 30,-10" fill="none" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="3" />
      
      <!-- Eyebrow (raised with realization) -->
      <path d="M-25,-30 C-15,-40 15,-40 25,-30" fill="none" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />

    <!-- Nose (partial) -->

    <!-- Forehead wrinkles (surprise) -->

    <path d="M-50,-65 C-30,-75 30,-75 50,-65" fill="none" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="2" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Lightbulb idea icon (brighter) -->

  <!-- Text bubble -->

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Defs for gradients and filters -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="groundGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2f855a" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#276749" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2d3748" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#4a5568" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="waterGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3182ce" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2c5282" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="woodTexture" x="0%" y="0%" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.1" numOctaves="3" seed="5" />
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="5" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background (blurred to focus on hands) -->
  <g opacity="0.6">
    <!-- Sky -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="250" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
    
    <!-- River -->
    <rect x="0" y="250" width="400" height="150" fill="url(#waterGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Ground -->
    <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="url(#groundGradient)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Close-up of hands and branch -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 350)">
    <!-- Large branch being examined -->
    <g transform="rotate(10)">
      <path d="M-150,0 C-100,-10 100,10 150,0" fill="#8b5d33" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="5" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />

      <path d="M-60,-5 C-50,-15 -30,-15 -20,-5" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="2" />

      <path d="M60,-5 C70,-15 90,-15 100,-5" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="2" />

      <path d="M-120,0 L-120,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M-100,0 L-100,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M-80,0 L-80,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M-60,0 L-60,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M-40,0 L-40,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M-20,0 L-20,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M0,0 L0,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M20,0 L20,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M40,0 L40,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M60,0 L60,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M80,0 L80,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M100,0 L100,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M120,0 L120,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      <path d="M140,0 L140,5" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="1" />
      
      <!-- Small branch offshoots -->
      <path d="M-100,-5 L-90,-30" stroke="#8b5d33" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M20,-5 L30,-25" stroke="#8b5d33" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M100,-5 L110,-20" stroke="#8b5d33" stroke-width="7" stroke-linecap="round" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Left hand examining -->
    <g transform="translate(-80, 20) rotate(-10)">
      <!-- Arm -->
      <path d="M-20,20 C-30,10 -40,0 -50,-20" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
      
      <!-- Hand -->

      <!-- Fingers -->

      <path d="M0,5 C5,10 10,10 15,5" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M-5,-5 C0,0 5,0 10,-5" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Right hand examining -->

  <!-- Measurement indicators -->

  </g>
  
  <!-- Strength indicator -->
  <g transform="translate(100, 450)">
    <rect x="-40" y="-20" width="80" height="40" rx="10" fill="#f6e05e" opacity="0.8" />
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1a202c">Strong!</text>
    <path d="M50,0 L70,0" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="2" />
    <polygon points="70,0 65,-5 65,5" fill="#f6e05e" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Thought bubble about strength -->
  <g transform="translate(300, 500)">
    <path d="M-70,-40 C-90,-40 -100,-20 -100,0 C-100,30 -80,50 -50,50 L50,50 C80,50 100,30 100,0 C100,-20 90,-40 70,-40 Z" fill="white" opacity="0.7" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2d3748">This branch is</text>
    <text x="0" y="20" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2d3748">sturdy enough!</text>
    
    <!-- Connection bubbles -->
    <circle cx="-20" cy="-50" r="10" fill="white" opacity="0.7" />
    <circle cx="-40" cy="-70" r="7" fill="white" opacity="0.7" />

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Defs for gradients and filters -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="groundGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2f855a" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#276749" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="metalGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#a0aec0" />
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#718096" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#4a5568" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="metalShine">
      <feSpecularLighting result="specOut" specularExponent="20" lighting-color="#ffffff">
        <fePointLight x="200" y="100" z="150" />
      </feSpecularLighting>
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="specOut" operator="arithmetic" k1="0" k2="1" k3="1" k4="0" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background (blurred to focus on toolbox) -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="#2d3748" opacity="0.3" />
  
  <!-- Ground surface -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="400" height="200" fill="url(#groundGradient)" opacity="0.7" />
  
  <!-- Toolbox (open) -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 350)">
    <!-- Bottom part of the toolbox -->
    <rect x="-100" y="-20" width="200" height="100" rx="10" fill="url(#metalGradient)" filter="url(#metalShine)" />
    
    <!-- Inner shadow -->
    <rect x="-95" y="-15" width="190" height="90" rx="8" fill="none" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.3" />
    
    <!-- Toolbox divider -->
    <rect x="-10" y="-20" width="20" height="100" fill="#4a5568" />
    
    <!-- Top lid (open) -->
    <g transform="translate(0, -80) rotate(-10)">
      <rect x="-100" y="-40" width="200" height="40" rx="5" fill="url(#metalGradient)" filter="url(#metalShine)" />
      <rect x="-95" y="-35" width="190" height="30" rx="3" fill="none" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.3" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Hinge -->
    <rect x="-20" y="-25" width="40" height="10" rx="2" fill="#2d3748" />
    
    <!-- Handle -->
    <path d="M-30,-60 C-30,-70 30,-70 30,-60" fill="none" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Latch (open) -->
    <rect x="-15" y="80" width="30" height="10" rx="2" fill="#2d3748" />
    <path d="M0,80 L0,90" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Contents of the toolbox -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 350)">
    <!-- Nails -->
    <g transform="translate(-60, 10)">
      <!-- Nail 1 -->
      <line x1="-15" y1="-10" x2="-15" y2="10" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      <circle cx="-15" cy="-10" r="3" fill="#a0aec0" />
      
      <!-- Nail 2 -->
      <line x1="-5" y1="-10" x2="-5" y2="10" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      <circle cx="-5" cy="-10" r="3" fill="#a0aec0" />
      
      <!-- Nail 3 -->
      <line x1="5" y1="-10" x2="5" y2="10" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      <circle cx="5" cy="-10" r="3" fill="#a0aec0" />
      
      <!-- Nail 4 -->
      <line x1="15" y1="-10" x2="15" y2="10" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      <circle cx="15" cy="-10" r="3" fill="#a0aec0" />
      
      <!-- Label -->
      <text x="0" y="30" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">Nails</text>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Hammer -->
    <g transform="translate(50, 0)">
      <!-- Handle -->
      <rect x="-30" y="-5" width="40" height="10" rx="2" fill="#8b5d33" />
      
      <!-- Head -->
      <rect x="10" y="-15" width="20" height="30" fill="#718096" />
      <path d="M30,-15 L35,-10 L35,10 L30,15" fill="#718096" />
      
      <!-- Label -->
      <text x="0" y="30" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">Hammer</text>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Wire -->
    <g transform="translate(-60, -30)">
      <!-- Coiled wire -->
      <path d="M0,0 C5,5 5,10 0,15 C-5,20 -15,20 -20,15 C-25,10 -25,0 -20,-5 C-15,-10 -5,-10 0,-5 C5,0 5,10 0,15" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M0,-3 C3,0 3,5 0,8 C-3,11 -9,11 -12,8 C-15,5 -15,-1 -12,-4 C-9,-7 -3,-7 0,-4 C3,-1 3,5 0,8" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      
      <!-- Label -->
      <text x="-10" y="30" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">Wire</text>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Character's hands opening the toolbox -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 450)">
    <!-- Left hand -->
    <g transform="translate(-80, 0) rotate(-20)">
      <!-- Arm -->
      <path d="M0,0 C10,10 20,20 30,40" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
      
      <!-- Hand -->
      <path d="M0,0 C-5,-5 -15,-5 -20,0 C-25,5 -25,15 -20,20 C-15,25 -5,25 0,20 C5,15 5,5 0,0 Z" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Thumb -->
      <path d="M-20,10 C-25,5 -25,-5 -20,-10" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
      
      <!-- Fingers -->
      <path d="M-5,-5 C-10,-10 -15,-10 -20,-5" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M-10,0 C-15,-5 -20,-5 -25,0" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M-10,10 C-15,5 -20,5 -25,10" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Right hand -->
    <g transform="translate(80, 0) rotate(20)">
      <!-- Arm -->
      <path d="M0,0 C-10,10 -20,20 -30,40" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
      
      <!-- Hand -->
      <path d="M0,0 C5,-5 15,-5 20,0 C25,5 25,15 20,20 C15,25 5,25 0,20 C-5,15 -5,5 0,0 Z" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Thumb -->
      <path d="M20,10 C25,5 25,-5 20,-10" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
      
      <!-- Fingers -->
      <path d="M5,-5 C10,-10 15,-10 20,-5" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M10,0 C15,-5 20,-5 25,0" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M10,10 C15,5 20,5 25,10" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="6" stroke-linecap="round" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Thought bubble about the tools -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 180)">
    <path d="M-100,-50 C-120,-50 -130,-30 -130,-10 C-130,20 -110,40 -80,40 L80,40 C110,40 130,20 130,-10 C130,-30 120,-50 100,-50 Z" fill="white" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <text x="0" y="-15" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2d3748">Perfect! These will help me</text>
    <text x="0" y="15" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2d3748">build a sturdy bridge!</text>
    
    <!-- Connection bubbles -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="50" r="10" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="70" r="7" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="85" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.8" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Defs for gradients and filters -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="groundGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2f855a" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#276749" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2d3748" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#4a5568" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="waterGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3182ce" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2c5282" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="woodTexture" x="0%" y="0%" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.1" numOctaves="3" seed="5" />
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="5" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <g opacity="0.7">
    <!-- Sky -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="250" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
    
    <!-- River -->
    <rect x="0" y="250" width="400" height="150" fill="url(#waterGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Ground -->
    <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="url(#groundGradient)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Character working on bridge construction -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 400)">
    <!-- Character's body -->
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="50" rx="30" ry="10" fill="#1a202c" opacity="0.3" /> <!-- shadow -->
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <path d="M-15,0 C-20,10 -20,30 -15,50" fill="#2c5282" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M15,0 C20,10 20,30 15,50" fill="#2c5282" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Shoes -->
    <ellipse cx="-15" cy="50" rx="8" ry="4" fill="#1a202c" />
    <ellipse cx="15" cy="50" rx="8" ry="4" fill="#1a202c" />
    
    <!-- Body (leaning forward to work) -->
    <path d="M0,0 C-5,-20 -5,-40 0,-60" fill="#e53e3e" stroke="#c53030" stroke-width="1" />
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="-30" rx="20" ry="30" fill="#e53e3e" stroke="#c53030" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Arms (working position) -->
    <path d="M-20,-30 C-40,-20 -50,0 -40,20" fill="#e53e3e" stroke="#c53030" stroke-width="1" />
    <path d="M20,-30 C40,-20 50,0 40,20" fill="#e53e3e" stroke="#c53030" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-70" r="15" fill="#f6e05e" stroke="#ecc94b" stroke-width="1" />
    
    <!-- Face (focused expression) -->
    <circle cx="-5" cy="-73" r="2" fill="#1a202c" />
    <circle cx="5" cy="-73" r="2" fill="#1a202c" />
    <path d="M-4,-65 C-2,-63 2,-63 4,-65" fill="none" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1.5" />
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (focused) -->
    <path d="M-8,-78 C-6,-80 -4,-80 -2,-78" fill="none" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1.5" />
    <path d="M8,-78 C6,-80 4,-80 2,-78" fill="none" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1.5" />
    
    <!-- Backpack (on the ground nearby) -->
    <g transform="translate(50, 30)">
      <rect x="-15" y="-20" width="30" height="40" rx="3" fill="#4a5568" />
      <rect x="-10" y="-25" width="20" height="5" fill="#4a5568" rx="1" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Bridge construction -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 300)">
    <!-- Main branch segments being connected -->
    <g>
      <!-- Left segment -->
      <path d="M-100,0 L-20,0" fill="#8b5d33" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Center segment (being connected) -->
      <path d="M-20,0 L20,0" fill="#8b5d33" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Right segment -->
      <path d="M20,0 L100,0" fill="#8b5d33" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Connection points with wire and nails -->
      <g transform="translate(-20, 0)">
        <!-- Wire wrapping -->
        <path d="M-5,-10 C-10,-5 -10,5 -5,10 C0,15 10,15 15,10 C20,5 20,-5 15,-10 C10,-15 0,-15 -5,-10 Z" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
        
        <!-- Nail -->
        <line x1="0" y1="-10" x2="0" y2="10" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
        <circle cx="0" cy="-10" r="3" fill="#a0aec0" />
      </g>
      
      <g transform="translate(20, 0)">
        <!-- Wire wrapping -->
        <path d="M-15,-10 C-20,-5 -20,5 -15,10 C-10,15 0,15 5,10 C10,5 10,-5 5,-10 C0,-15 -10,-15 -15,-10 Z" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
        
        <!-- Nail -->
        <line x1="0" y1="-10" x2="0" y2="10" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
        <circle cx="0" cy="-10" r="3" fill="#a0aec0" />
      </g>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Support branches being added -->
    <g>
      <!-- Left diagonal support -->
      <path d="M-80,0 L-60,20" fill="#8b5d33" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Right diagonal support -->
      <path d="M80,0 L60,20" fill="#8b5d33" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Horizontal reinforcement -->
      <path d="M-60,20 L60,20" fill="#8b5d33" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Connection points -->
      <g transform="translate(-60, 20)">
        <!-- Wire wrapping -->
        <path d="M-5,-5 C-7,-3 -7,3 -5,5 C-3,7 3,7 5,5 C7,3 7,-3 5,-5 C3,-7 -3,-7 -5,-5 Z" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1.5" />
      </g>
      
      <g transform="translate(60, 20)">
        <!-- Wire wrapping -->
        <path d="M-5,-5 C-7,-3 -7,3 -5,5 C-3,7 3,7 5,5 C7,3 7,-3 5,-5 C3,-7 -3,-7 -5,-5 Z" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1.5" />
      </g>
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Tools scattered around -->
  <g>
    <!-- Hammer -->
    <g transform="translate(280, 450) rotate(45)">
      <!-- Handle -->
      <rect x="-20" y="-3" width="25" height="6" rx="2" fill="#8b5d33" />
      
      <!-- Head -->
      <rect x="5" y="-7" width="12" height="14" fill="#718096" />
      <path d="M17,-7 L20,-5 L20,5 L17,7" fill="#718096" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Nails -->
    <g transform="translate(150, 470)">
      <!-- Nail 1 -->
      <line x1="-10" y1="-5" x2="-10" y2="5" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1.5" />
      <circle cx="-10" cy="-5" r="2" fill="#a0aec0" />
      
      <!-- Nail 2 -->
      <line x1="0" y1="-5" x2="0" y2="5" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1.5" />
      <circle cx="0" cy="-5" r="2" fill="#a0aec0" />
      
      <!-- Nail 3 -->
      <line x1="10" y1="-5" x2="10" y2="5" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1.5" />
      <circle cx="10" cy="-5" r="2" fill="#a0aec0" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Wire spool -->
    <g transform="translate(120, 440)">
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="10" fill="#4a5568" />
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="5" fill="#2d3748" />
      <path d="M10,0 C15,5 20,5 25,0" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Character's hands working -->
  <g>
    <!-- Left hand hammering -->
    <g transform="translate(160, 320) rotate(-30)">
      <!-- Hand -->
      <path d="M0,0 C5,5 15,5 20,0 C25,-5 25,-15 20,-20 C15,-25 5,-25 0,-20 C-5,-15 -5,-5 0,0 Z" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Fingers gripping hammer -->
      <path d="M10,-10 C15,-15 20,-15 25,-10" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M5,-5 C10,-10 15,-10 20,-5" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Right hand holding wire -->
    <g transform="translate(240, 320) rotate(20)">
      <!-- Hand -->
      <path d="M0,0 C-5,5 -15,5 -20,0 C-25,-5 -25,-15 -20,-20 C-15,-25 -5,-25 0,-20 C5,-15 5,-5 0,0 Z" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Fingers holding wire -->
      <path d="M-10,-10 C-15,-15 -20,-15 -25,-10" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M-5,-5 C-10,-10 -15,-10 -20,-5" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" />
      
      <!-- Wire being held -->
      <path d="M-10,-10 C-5,-15 0,-15 5,-10" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Progress indicator -->
  <g transform="translate(350, 100)">
    <rect x="-40" y="-20" width="80" height="120" rx="5" fill="#2d3748" opacity="0.8" />
    <text x="0" y="-5" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="10" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">PROGRESS</text>
    
    <!-- Progress bar -->
    <rect x="-30" y="10" width="60" height="80" rx="3" fill="#4a5568" />
    <rect x="-30" y="50" width="60" height="40" rx="3" fill="#38a169" />
    
    <!-- Percentage -->
    <text x="0" y="75" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">50%</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sweat droplets showing effort -->
  <g>
    <path d="M195,-65 C193,-60 197,-60 195,-55" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    <circle cx="195" cy="-55" r="2" fill="#a0aec0" />
    
    <path d="M205,-65 C203,-60 207,-60 205,-55" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
    <circle cx="205" cy="-55" r="2" fill="#a0aec0" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Defs for gradients and filters -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="groundGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2f855a" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#276749" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2d3748" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#4a5568" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="waterGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3182ce" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2c5282" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="woodGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#8b5d33" />
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#a0522d" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#8b5d33" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="woodTexture" x="0%" y="0%" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" seed="5" />
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="3" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <g>
    <!-- Sky -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="250" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Storm clouds starting to part -->
    <path d="M0,50 Q50,20 100,40 Q150,10 200,30 Q250,15 300,25 Q350,5 400,30 L400,80 Q350,100 300,90 Q250,110 200,100 Q150,120 100,110 Q50,130 0,100 Z" fill="#1a202c" opacity="0.7" />
    
    <!-- River -->
    <rect x="0" y="250" width="400" height="150" fill="url(#waterGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Water ripples -->
    <g opacity="0.7">
      <path d="M0,270 Q20,260 40,270 Q60,280 80,270 Q100,260 120,270 Q140,280 160,270 Q180,260 200,270 Q220,280 240,270 Q260,260 280,270 Q300,280 320,270 Q340,260 360,270 Q380,280 400,270" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M0,310 Q20,300 40,310 Q60,320 80,310 Q100,300 120,310 Q140,320 160,310 Q180,300 200,310 Q220,320 240,310 Q260,300 280,310 Q300,320 320,310 Q340,300 360,310 Q380,320 400,310" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M0,350 Q20,340 40,350 Q60,360 80,350 Q100,340 120,350 Q140,360 160,350 Q180,340 200,350 Q220,360 240,350 Q260,340 280,350 Q300,360 320,350 Q340,340 360,350 Q380,360 400,350" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Ground -->
    <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="url(#groundGradient)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Broken bridge sections -->
  <g>
    <!-- Left section -->
    <rect x="50" y="250" width="100" height="20" fill="#5a4321" />
    <path d="M50,250 L40,220 L60,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <path d="M150,250 L140,220 L160,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Right section -->
    <rect x="250" y="250" width="100" height="20" fill="#5a4321" />
    <path d="M250,250 L240,220 L260,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <path d="M350,250 L340,220 L360,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Character positioning the makeshift bridge -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 300)">
    <!-- Character -->
    <g transform="translate(-40, 0)">
      <!-- Legs in steady stance -->
      <rect x="-15" y="30" width="10" height="40" fill="#2c5282" rx="2" />
      <rect x="5" y="30" width="10" height="40" fill="#2c5282" rx="2" />

      <rect x="2" y="70" width="16" height="8" fill="#1a202c" rx="3" />

      <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="15" ry="30" fill="#e53e3e" />

      <path d="M15,0 C25,-10 35,-10 60,0" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />

      <circle cx="60" cy="0" r="8" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Head -->
      <circle cx="0" cy="-45" r="15" fill="#f6e05e" />

      <circle cx="5" cy="-48" r="2" fill="#1a202c" />
      <path d="M-5,-40 C-2,-38 2,-38 5,-40" fill="none" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1.5" />

      <path d="M8,-53 C6,-55 4,-55 2,-53" fill="none" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1.5" />
      
      <!-- Backpack -->
      <rect x="-20" y="-20" width="40" height="50" fill="#4a5568" rx="5" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Makeshift bridge being positioned -->
    <g>
      <!-- Main bridge structure -->
      <rect x="-100" y="-10" width="200" height="20" rx="3" fill="url(#woodGradient)" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Wire reinforcements -->
      <g transform="translate(-50, 0)">
        <path d="M-10,-15 C-15,-10 -15,10 -10,15 C-5,20 5,20 10,15 C15,10 15,-10 10,-15 C5,-20 -5,-20 -10,-15 Z" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      </g>
      
      <g transform="translate(0, 0)">
        <path d="M-10,-15 C-15,-10 -15,10 -10,15 C-5,20 5,20 10,15 C15,10 15,-10 10,-15 C5,-20 -5,-20 -10,-15 Z" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      </g>
      
      <g transform="translate(50, 0)">
        <path d="M-10,-15 C-15,-10 -15,10 -10,15 C-5,20 5,20 10,15 C15,10 15,-10 10,-15 C5,-20 -5,-20 -10,-15 Z" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" />
      </g>
      
      <!-- Support structure -->
      <path d="M-75,-10 L-50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M-25,-10 L-50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M25,-10 L50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M75,-10 L50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <path d="M-50,20 L50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion lines indicating careful positioning -->
  <g opacity="0.6">
    <path d="M80,290 C100,280 120,280 140,290" fill="none" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <path d="M260,290 C280,280 300,280 320,290" fill="none" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <polygon points="140,290 135,285 135,295" fill="#f6e05e" />
    <polygon points="260,290 265,285 265,295" fill="#f6e05e" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Focus indicator -->
  <g transform="translate(160, 230)">
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="30" ry="15" fill="none" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="10" text-anchor="middle" fill="#f6e05e">Steady</text>
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(240, 230)">
    <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="30" ry="15" fill="none" stroke="#f6e05e" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="10" text-anchor="middle" fill="#f6e05e">Careful</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Thought bubble -->
  <g transform="translate(100, 180)">
    <path d="M-50,-30 C-70,-30 -80,-10 -80,10 C-80,40 -60,60 -30,60 L30,60 C60,60 80,40 80,10 C80,-10 70,-30 50,-30 Z" fill="white" opacity="0.7" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <text x="0" y="10" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2d3748">Need to position it</text>
    <text x="0" y="30" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2d3748">just right...</text>
    
    <!-- Connection bubbles -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-40" r="10" fill="white" opacity="0.7" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="-60" r="7" fill="white" opacity="0.7" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="-75" r="5" fill="white" opacity="0.7" />
  </g>
</svg>

      <path d="M0,350 Q20,340 40,350 Q60,360 80,350 Q100,340 120,350 Q140,360 160,350 Q180,340 200,350 Q220,360 240,350 Q260,340 280,350 Q300,360 320,350 Q340,340 360,350 Q380,360 400,350" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Ground -->
    <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="url(#groundGradient)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Broken bridge sections -->
  <g>
    <!-- Left section -->
    <rect x="50" y="250" width="100" height="20" fill="#5a4321" />
    <path d="M50,250 L40,220 L60,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <path d="M150,250 L140,220 L160,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Right section -->
    <rect x="250" y="250" width="100" height="20" fill="#5a4321" />
    <path d="M250,250 L240,220 L260,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <path d="M350,250 L340,220 L360,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Makeshift bridge in place and beginning to bend -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 250)">
    <!-- Main bridge structure (bending under weight) -->
    <path d="M-100,-10 C-50,20 50,20 100,-10" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
    
    <!-- Stress points -->
    <g transform="translate(0, 5)">
      <path d="M-10,-5 L10,5" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M-10,5 L10,-5" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Loose wire reinforcements -->
    <g transform="translate(-50, 0)">
      <path d="M-10,-15 C-15,-10 -15,10 -10,15" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
      <path d="M10,-15 C15,-10 15,10 10,15" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    </g>
    
    <g transform="translate(50, 0)">
      <path d="M-10,-15 C-15,-10 -15,10 -10,15" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
      <path d="M10,-15 C15,-10 15,10 10,15" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Support structure (failing) -->
    <path d="M-75,-10 L-50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.7" />
    <path d="M-25,-10 L-50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.7" />
    <path d="M25,-10 L50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.7" />
    <path d="M75,-10 L50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="5" stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.7" />
    <path d="M-50,20 C-25,30 25,30 50,20" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="7" stroke-linecap="round" opacity="0.7" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Character stepping onto bridge -->
  <g transform="translate(140, 230)">
    <!-- Character -->
    <g>
      <!-- One leg on ground -->
      <rect x="-15" y="30" width="10" height="40" fill="#2c5282" rx="2" />
      <rect x="-18" y="70" width="16" height="8" fill="#1a202c" rx="3" />
      
      <!-- One foot on bridge -->
      <g transform="translate(20, 0)">
        <rect x="-5" y="30" width="10" height="30" fill="#2c5282" rx="2" />
        <rect x="-8" y="60" width="16" height="8" fill="#1a202c" rx="3" />
      </g>
      
      <!-- Body starting to lose balance -->
      <g transform="rotate(5)">
        <path d="M0,30 C-5,15 -5,0 0,-30 C5,0 5,15 0,30" fill="#e53e3e" />
        <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="15" ry="30" fill="#e53e3e" />
      </g>
      
      <!-- Arms beginning to flail -->
      <path d="M-15,0 C-25,-10 -30,-5 -35,5" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
      <path d="M15,0 C25,-10 30,-5 35,5" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
      
      <!-- Hands -->
      <circle cx="-35" cy="5" r="8" fill="#f6e05e" />
      <circle cx="35" cy="5" r="8" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Head -->
      <circle cx="0" cy="-45" r="15" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Face (surprised expression) -->
      <circle cx="-5" cy="-48" r="2" fill="#1a202c" />
      <circle cx="5" cy="-48" r="2" fill="#1a202c" />
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-38" rx="3" ry="5" fill="none" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1.5" /> <!-- open mouth in surprise -->
      
      <!-- Backpack -->
      <rect x="-20" y="-20" width="40" height="50" fill="#4a5568" rx="5" transform="rotate(5)" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Cracking sound effect -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 260)">
    <path d="M0,0 L20,-20 M0,0 L-20,-20 M0,0 L20,20 M0,0 L-20,20 M0,0 L30,0 M0,0 L-30,0 M0,0 L0,30 M0,0 L0,-30" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="3" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="30" fill="none" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="3" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Text bubble -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 160)">
    <path d="M-80,-40 C-100,-40 -110,-20 -110,0 C-110,30 -90,50 -60,50 L60,50 C90,50 110,30 110,0 C110,-20 100,-40 80,-40 Z" fill="white" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <text x="0" y="10" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#e53e3e">CRACK!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Failure indicators -->
  <g transform="translate(100, 350)">
    <polygon points="0,-20 15,10 -15,10" fill="#e53e3e" opacity="0.8" />
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="15" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">!</text>
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(300, 350)">
    <polygon points="0,-20 15,10 -15,10" fill="#e53e3e" opacity="0.8" />
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="15" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">!</text>
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Defs for gradients and filters -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="groundGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2f855a" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#276749" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2d3748" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#4a5568" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="waterGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#3182ce" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#2c5282" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="woodGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#8b5d33" />
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#a0522d" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#8b5d33" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="3" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="2" result="offsetblur" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.5" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
    <filter id="woodTexture" x="0%" y="0%" width="100%" height="100%">
      <feTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.05" numOctaves="2" seed="5" />
      <feDisplacementMap in="SourceGraphic" scale="3" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="motionBlur">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" stdDeviation="2" />
      <feOffset dx="3" dy="5" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background -->
  <g>
    <!-- Sky -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="250" fill="url(#skyGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Storm clouds -->
    <path d="M0,50 Q50,20 100,40 Q150,10 200,30 Q250,15 300,25 Q350,5 400,30 L400,80 Q350,100 300,90 Q250,110 200,100 Q150,120 100,110 Q50,130 0,100 Z" fill="#1a202c" opacity="0.8" />
    
    <!-- River -->
    <rect x="0" y="250" width="400" height="150" fill="url(#waterGradient)" />
    
    <!-- Water ripples -->
    <g opacity="0.7">
      <path d="M0,270 Q20,260 40,270 Q60,280 80,270 Q100,260 120,270 Q140,280 160,270 Q180,260 200,270 Q220,280 240,270 Q260,260 280,270 Q300,280 320,270 Q340,260 360,270 Q380,280 400,270" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M0,310 Q20,300 40,310 Q60,320 80,310 Q100,300 120,310 Q140,320 160,310 Q180,300 200,310 Q220,320 240,310 Q260,300 280,310 Q300,320 320,310 Q340,300 360,310 Q380,320 400,310" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M0,350 Q20,340 40,350 Q60,360 80,350 Q100,340 120,350 Q140,360 160,350 Q180,340 200,350 Q220,360 240,350 Q260,340 280,350 Q300,360 320,350 Q340,340 360,350 Q380,360 400,350" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Ground -->
    <rect x="0" y="400" width="400" height="300" fill="url(#groundGradient)" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Broken bridge sections -->
  <g>
    <!-- Left section -->
    <rect x="50" y="250" width="100" height="20" fill="#5a4321" />
    <path d="M50,250 L40,220 L60,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <path d="M150,250 L140,220 L160,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Right section -->
    <rect x="250" y="250" width="100" height="20" fill="#5a4321" />
    <path d="M250,250 L240,220 L260,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <path d="M350,250 L340,220 L360,250" fill="none" stroke="#5a4321" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Bridge breaking apart -->
  <g>
    <!-- Left piece falling -->
    <g transform="translate(150, 280) rotate(20)">
      <path d="M-50,-10 L50,-10" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Loose wire -->
      <path d="M0,-20 C10,-15 15,-5 10,5" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Right piece falling -->
    <g transform="translate(250, 280) rotate(-20)">
      <path d="M-50,-10 L50,-10" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Loose wire -->
      <path d="M0,-20 C-10,-15 -15,-5 -10,5" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Middle piece falling -->
    <g transform="translate(200, 300)">
      <path d="M-30,-5 L30,-5" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Broken connections -->
      <path d="M-25,-10 L-15,0" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M-20,-10 L-10,0" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M25,-10 L15,0" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M20,-10 L10,0" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Character falling -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 300)">
    <!-- Character in mid-fall -->
    <g filter="url(#motionBlur)">
      <!-- Body twisting in fall -->
      <g transform="rotate(15)">
        <path d="M0,30 C-5,15 -5,0 0,-30 C5,0 5,15 0,30" fill="#e53e3e" />
        <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="15" ry="30" fill="#e53e3e" />
      </g>
      
      <!-- Arms flailing -->
      <path d="M-15,0 C-25,-20 -40,-10 -60,0" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
      <path d="M15,0 C25,10 40,20 50,10" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
      
      <!-- Hands -->
      <circle cx="-60" cy="0" r="8" fill="#f6e05e" />
      <circle cx="50" cy="10" r="8" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Legs kicking -->
      <rect x="-15" y="30" width="10" height="40" fill="#2c5282" rx="2" transform="rotate(-30)" />
      <rect x="5" y="30" width="10" height="40" fill="#2c5282" rx="2" transform="rotate(20)" />
      
      <!-- Shoes -->
      <rect x="-18" y="70" width="16" height="8" fill="#1a202c" rx="3" transform="rotate(-30)" />
      <rect x="2" y="70" width="16" height="8" fill="#1a202c" rx="3" transform="rotate(20)" />
      
      <!-- Head -->
      <circle cx="0" cy="-45" r="15" fill="#f6e05e" />
      
      <!-- Face (shocked expression) -->
      <circle cx="-5" cy="-48" r="3" fill="#1a202c" />
      <circle cx="5" cy="-48" r="3" fill="#1a202c" />
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="-38" rx="5" ry="7" fill="none" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="1.5" /> <!-- mouth wide open in shock -->
      
      <!-- Backpack coming loose -->
      <rect x="-20" y="-20" width="40" height="50" fill="#4a5568" rx="5" transform="rotate(25)" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Motion lines indicating falling -->
  <g opacity="0.8">
    <path d="M160,250 C170,270 180,290 190,310" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <path d="M240,250 C230,270 220,290 210,310" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    <path d="M200,230 C200,250 200,270 200,290" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Exclamation marks indicating panic -->
  <g transform="translate(170, 220)">
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#e53e3e">!</text>
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(230, 220)">
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#e53e3e">!</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Shock lines -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 200)">
    <path d="M-40,-20 C-30,-30 -20,-30 -10,-20" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    <path d="M10,-20 C20,-30 30,-30 40,-20" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    <path d="M-30,-40 C-20,-50 -10,-50 0,-40" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    <path d="M0,-40 C10,-50 20,-50 30,-40" stroke="#e53e3e" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  </g>
</svg>

      <path d="M-10,-60 C-12,-55 -8,-55 -10,-50" stroke="#3182ce" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
      <circle cx="-10" cy="-50" r="2" fill="#3182ce" />
      
      <path d="M0,-60 C-2,-55 2,-55 0,-50" stroke="#3182ce" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
      <circle cx="0" cy="-50" r="2" fill="#3182ce" />
      
      <path d="M10,-60 C8,-55 12,-55 10,-50" stroke="#3182ce" stroke-width="1" fill="none" />
      <circle cx="10" cy="-50" r="2" fill="#3182ce" />
      
      <!-- Wet hair plastered down -->
      <path d="M-15,-55 C-10,-45 -5,-45 0,-55" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
      <path d="M0,-55 C5,-45 10,-45 15,-55" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
      
      <!-- Backpack (wet) -->
      <rect x="-20" y="-20" width="40" height="50" fill="#4a5568" rx="5" opacity="0.8" />
      <path d="M-15,-15 L15,-15" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M-15,-5 L15,-5" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M-15,5 L15,5" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M-15,15 L15,15" stroke="#2d3748" stroke-width="2" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Broken bridge piece being held -->
    <g transform="translate(0, -20)">
      <path d="M-40,0 L40,0" stroke="url(#woodGradient)" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" filter="url(#woodTexture)" />
      
      <!-- Broken ends -->
      <path d="M-40,-7 L-35,7" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M-37,-7 L-32,7" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M40,-7 L35,7" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
      <path d="M37,-7 L32,7" stroke="#1a202c" stroke-width="2" />
      
      <!-- Loose wire -->
      <path d="M-20,-7 C-15,-12 -10,-12 -5,-7" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
      <path d="M20,-7 C15,-12 10,-12 5,-7" fill="none" stroke="#a0aec0" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Water splash effects -->
  <g>
    <path d="M160,350 C170,340 180,345 190,335" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6" />
    <path d="M210,350 C220,340 230,345 240,335" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6" />
    <path d="M180,370 C190,360 200,365 210,355" fill="none" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Text bubble -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 200)">
    <path d="M-150,-40 C-170,-40 -180,-20 -180,0 C-180,30 -160,50 -130,50 L130,50 C160,50 180,30 180,0 C180,-20 170,-40 150,-40 Z" fill="white" opacity="0.9" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <text x="0" y="10" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2d3748">Back to the drawing board...</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Failure indicators -->
  <g transform="translate(100, 100)">
    <rect x="-60" y="-25" width="120" height="50" rx="10" fill="#e53e3e" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">FAILURE</text>
    <line x1="60" y1="0" x2="80" y2="30" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2" />
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(300, 100)">
    <rect x="-60" y="-25" width="120" height="50" rx="10" fill="#e53e3e" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <text x="0" y="0" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">TRY AGAIN</text>
    <line x1="-60" y1="0" x2="-80" y2="30" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3,2" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Lesson learned thought bubble -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 600)">
    <rect x="-150" y="-40" width="300" height="80" rx="15" fill="#4a5568" opacity="0.8" filter="url(#dropShadow)" />
    <text x="0" y="-15" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">Next time: Stronger joints,</text>
    <text x="0" y="10" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">better support structure,</text>
    <text x="0" y="35" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">and proper testing!</text>
  </g>
</svg>

  <text x="200" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#34495e">Ultra-HD Output  Wireless Connectivity</text>
  <text x="200" y="645" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="#34495e">8-Hour Battery  Smart Projection</text>
</svg>

    </g>

  <!-- Glow effect around button -->
  <defs>
    <filter id="glow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="5" result="blur" />
      <feComposite in="SourceGraphic" in2="blur" operator="over" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <circle cx="252" cy="280" r="20" fill="#e74c3c" opacity="0.5" filter="url(#glow)" />
  <circle cx="252" cy="280" r="15" fill="#e74c3c" opacity="0.3" filter="url(#glow)" />
  
  <!-- Activation rays -->

    <line x1="252" y1="300" x2="252" y2="310" />
    <line x1="222" y1="280" x2="232" y2="280" />
    <line x1="272" y1="280" x2="282" y2="280" />
    <line x1="232" y1="260" x2="242" y2="270" />
    <line x1="262" y1="290" x2="272" y2="300" />
    <line x1="232" y1="300" x2="242" y2="290" />
    <line x1="262" y1="270" x2="272" y2="260" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="200" y="100" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2c3e50">POWERING ON</text>
  
  <!-- Subtle device outline for context -->

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="#e6eaef" />
  
  <!-- Focus gradient -->
  <radialGradient id="focusGradient" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="60%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" />
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#e6eaef" />
  </radialGradient>
  <rect width="400" height="700" fill="url(#focusGradient)" />
  
  <!-- Device close-up -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 350) scale(1.5)">
    <!-- Device body -->
    <rect x="-80" y="-60" width="160" height="120" rx="5" fill="#34495e" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" />
    
    <!-- Screen with fatal error -->
    <rect x="-70" y="-50" width="140" height="100" rx="3" fill="#e74c3c" />
    
    <!-- Red X -->
    <g transform="translate(0, 0) scale(1.5)">
      <line x1="-20" y1="-20" x2="20" y2="20" stroke="white" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
      <line x1="20" y1="-20" x2="-20" y2="20" stroke="white" stroke-width="8" stroke-linecap="round" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Error message -->
    <text x="0" y="-25" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">SYSTEM FAILURE</text>
    
    <!-- Error code -->
    <text x="0" y="50" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">ERROR CODE: 0xDEAD</text>
    
    <!-- Control buttons (non-functional) -->
    <circle cx="-40" cy="75" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" opacity="0.5" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="75" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" opacity="0.5" />
    <circle cx="40" cy="75" r="8" fill="#7f8c8d" opacity="0.5" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Error effects -->
  <g>
    <!-- Glitch lines -->
    <line x1="100" y1="300" x2="300" y2="310" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.5" />
    <line x1="100" y1="350" x2="300" y2="340" stroke="white" stroke-width="3" opacity="0.5" />
    <line x1="100" y1="400" x2="300" y2="410" stroke="white" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.5" />
    
    <!-- Static noise -->
    <g fill="white" opacity="0.3">
      <rect x="120" y="320" width="5" height="5" />
      <rect x="150" y="380" width="8" height="8" />
      <rect x="200" y="330" width="4" height="4" />
      <rect x="240" y="370" width="6" height="6" />
      <rect x="280" y="340" width="7" height="7" />
      <rect x="180" y="410" width="5" height="5" />
      <rect x="220" y="290" width="4" height="4" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Pulsing error effect -->
  <circle cx="200" cy="350" r="120" fill="#e74c3c" opacity="0.1">
    <animate attributeName="r" values="120;130;120" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.1;0.2;0.1" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="200" cy="350" r="80" fill="#e74c3c" opacity="0.1">
    <animate attributeName="r" values="80;90;80" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.2;0.3;0.2" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="200" y="100" font-family="Arial" font-size="30" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#e74c3c">SYSTEM FAILURE</text>
  
  <!-- Subtitle -->
  <text x="200" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2c3e50">The presentation device has crashed</text>
  
  <!-- Failure message -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 600)">
    <rect x="-150" y="-40" width="300" height="80" rx="10" fill="#34495e" opacity="0.9" />
    <text x="0" y="-15" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">FATAL ERROR</text>
    <text x="0" y="15" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="#e74c3c">System recovery not possible</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Broken circuit effect -->
  <g stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.7" fill="none">
    <path d="M100,500 L150,500 L150,520 L200,520 L200,500 L250,500 L250,520 L300,520" />
    <circle cx="125" cy="500" r="5" />
    <circle cx="175" cy="520" r="5" />
    <circle cx="225" cy="500" r="5" />
    <circle cx="275" cy="520" r="5" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="550" width="400" height="150" fill="#b0b8c0" />
  
  <!-- Presentation screen (blank) -->

  <rect x="105" y="155" width="190" height="140" fill="#f8f9fa" />
  <text x="200" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#bdc3c7">NO SIGNAL</text>
  
  <!-- Podium -->

  <line x1="185" y1="450" x2="215" y2="460" stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="2" />
  <line x1="185" y1="460" x2="215" y2="450" stroke="#e74c3c" stroke-width="2" />
  
  <!-- Protagonist at podium -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 430)">

    <rect x="-20" y="-40" width="40" height="70" rx="10" fill="#3498db" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-55" r="20" fill="#f5d7b5" />

    <path d="M-7,-45 L7,-45" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->

    <rect x="5" y="30" width="10" height="40" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Audience members checking watches/leaving -->
  <!-- Row 1 (some standing) -->
  <g transform="translate(50, 480)">
    <!-- Standing, looking at watch -->
    <rect x="-10" y="-40" width="20" height="60" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="-55" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="15" cy="-30" r="5" fill="#bdc3c7" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(100, 480)">

    <path d="M-5,0 L5,0" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(150, 480)">
    <!-- Standing, turning to leave -->
    <rect x="-10" y="-40" width="20" height="60" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="-55" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <g transform="rotate(30)">
      <rect x="-5" y="-40" width="10" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(200, 480)">
    <!-- Seated, checking phone -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <rect x="-10" y="0" width="20" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <rect x="-5" y="10" width="10" height="15" rx="2" fill="#bdc3c7" />
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(250, 480)">

    <circle cx="-15" cy="-30" r="5" fill="#bdc3c7" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Row 2 -->
  <g transform="translate(75, 530)">
    <!-- Seated, disappointed face -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <rect x="-10" y="0" width="20" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <path d="M-5,5 Q0,0 5,5" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(125, 530)">

    <g transform="rotate(-30)">
      <rect x="-5" y="-40" width="10" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(175, 530)">
    <!-- Seated, looking at watch -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <rect x="-10" y="0" width="20" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="15" cy="10" r="5" fill="#bdc3c7" stroke="#7f8c8d" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(225, 530)">
    <!-- Standing, heading to exit -->
    <rect x="-10" y="-40" width="20" height="60" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="-55" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <g transform="rotate(20)">
      <rect x="-15" y="-30" width="10" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
      <rect x="5" y="-30" width="10" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <g transform="translate(275, 530)">
    <!-- Seated, disappointed -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="15" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <rect x="-10" y="0" width="20" height="30" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
    <path d="M-5,5 L5,5" stroke="#bdc3c7" stroke-width="1" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Exit sign -->
  <g transform="translate(350, 200)">
    <rect x="-30" y="-15" width="60" height="30" rx="5" fill="#e74c3c" />
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">EXIT</text>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="200" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2c3e50">AUDIENCE LEAVING</text>
  
  <!-- Failure message -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 600)">
    <rect x="-175" y="-30" width="350" height="60" rx="10" fill="#34495e" opacity="0.9" />
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">DISAPPOINTED ATTENDEES</text>
  </g>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

  <!-- Podium -->

  <!-- Protagonist with slumped shoulders -->

    <!-- Head slightly bowed -->

    <!-- Hair -->

    <!-- Sad expression -->

    <!-- Drooping arms -->

    <path d="M20,-20 C30,-10 40,10 35,20" stroke="#3498db" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Hands -->

    <rect x="5" y="30" width="10" height="40" rx="5" fill="#2c3e50" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Empty chairs (audience has left) -->

    <!-- Row 2 -->

    <rect x="90" y="520" width="25" height="30" fill="#34495e" />
    <rect x="130" y="520" width="25" height="30" fill="#34495e" />
    <rect x="170" y="520" width="25" height="30" fill="#34495e" />
    <rect x="210" y="520" width="25" height="30" fill="#34495e" />
    <rect x="250" y="520" width="25" height="30" fill="#34495e" />
    <rect x="290" y="520" width="25" height="30" fill="#34495e" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- A single remaining audience member in the back -->
  <g transform="translate(320, 480)">

  </g>
  
  <!-- Clock on wall showing late time -->
  <g transform="translate(350, 150)">
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="20" fill="white" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" />
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="-10" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" />
    <line x1="0" y1="0" x2="8" y2="8" stroke="#2c3e50" stroke-width="2" />
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="3" fill="#2c3e50" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="200" y="80" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#2c3e50">PRESENTATION FAILURE</text>
  
  <!-- Message banner -->

    <text x="0" y="15" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">PLEASE STAND BY</text>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#a6d8ff" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#d9f0ff" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="shadowEffect" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feGaussianBlur in="SourceAlpha" stdDeviation="4" />
      <feOffset dx="2" dy="4" />
      <feComponentTransfer>
        <feFuncA type="linear" slope="0.3" />
      </feComponentTransfer>
      <feMerge>
        <feMergeNode />
        <feMergeNode in="SourceGraphic" />
      </feMerge>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Blurred park background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#bgGradient)" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Friend's face close-up -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 350)">
    <!-- Head outline -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="150" fill="#f5d0a9" filter="url(#shadowEffect)" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-150,-20 C-140,-100 140,-100 150,-20 L150,0 C100,-50 -100,-50 -150,0 Z" fill="#6a5acd" />
    
    <!-- Eyes -->
    <g transform="translate(-50, -30)">
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="25" ry="15" fill="white" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1" />
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="10" fill="#4a5568" />
      <circle cx="0" cy="-3" r="3" fill="white" />
    </g>
    
    <g transform="translate(50, -30)">
      <ellipse cx="0" cy="0" rx="25" ry="15" fill="white" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1" />
      <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="10" fill="#4a5568" />
      <circle cx="0" cy="-3" r="3" fill="white" />
    </g>
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (furrowed) -->
    <path d="M-75,-60 Q-60,-75 -40,-60" stroke="#333" stroke-width="4" fill="none" />
    <path d="M75,-60 Q60,-75 40,-60" stroke="#333" stroke-width="4" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Nose -->
    <path d="M0,-20 Q10,0 0,20" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Mouth (downturned) -->
    <path d="M-40,60 Q0,30 40,60" stroke="#333" stroke-width="3" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Subtle tear -->
    <path d="M-60,0 L-65,20" stroke="#a0d2eb" stroke-width="2" opacity="0.6" />
    <circle cx="-65" cy="20" r="3" fill="#a0d2eb" opacity="0.6" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Speech bubble -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 150)">
    <path d="M-100,-50 L100,-50 C120,-50 140,-30 140,-10 L140,50 C140,70 120,90 100,90 L20,90 L0,120 L-20,90 L-100,90 C-120,90 -140,70 -140,50 L-140,-10 C-140,-30 -120,-50 -100,-50 Z" fill="white" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" />
    <text x="0" y="30" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="24" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">I didn't get the job...</text>
  </g>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Sky background -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#a6d8ff" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#d9f0ff" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="grassGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#7ac142" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#5da030" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="3" flood-opacity="0.3" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="blur">
      <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="2" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Background (blurred) -->
  <g filter="url(#blur)">
    <!-- Sky -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="500" fill="url(#skyGradient)" opacity="0.7" />
    
    <!-- Grass -->
    <rect x="0" y="500" width="400" height="200" fill="url(#grassGradient)" opacity="0.7" />
    
    <!-- Bench (partial) -->
    <g transform="translate(100, 480)" filter="url(#shadow)" opacity="0.7">
      <!-- Bench back -->
      <rect x="5" y="-30" width="110" height="10" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#8b5a2b" />
      <rect x="10" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
      <rect x="30" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
      <rect x="50" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
      <rect x="70" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    </g>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character shoulder (foreground, partially visible) -->
  <path d="M0,300 Q40,280 50,350 L0,350 Z" fill="#e17055" />
  <path d="M0,250 Q20,240 30,300 L0,300 Z" fill="#ffecd9" />
  
  <!-- Friend character (frustrated and disappointed) -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 350)">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="-40" y="0" width="80" height="120" rx="20" ry="20" fill="#6a8caf" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-50" r="50" fill="#f5d0a9" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-50,-70 C-40,-110 40,-110 50,-70 L50,-50 C30,-80 -30,-80 -50,-50 Z" fill="#6a5acd" />
    
    <!-- Frustrated face -->
    <line x1="-20" y1="-60" x2="-10" y2="-50" stroke="#333" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="-10" y1="-50" x2="-20" y2="-40" stroke="#333" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <line x1="20" y1="-60" x2="10" y2="-50" stroke="#333" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="10" y1="-50" x2="20" y2="-40" stroke="#333" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <path d="M-20,-20 Q0,-30 20,-20" stroke="#333" stroke-width="3" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (furrowed) -->
    <path d="M-30,-70 Q-20,-80 -10,-70" stroke="#333" stroke-width="3" fill="none" />
    <path d="M30,-70 Q20,-80 10,-70" stroke="#333" stroke-width="3" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arms gesturing -->
    <line x1="-40" y1="30" x2="-90" y2="0" stroke="#6a8caf" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="-90" y1="0" x2="-110" y2="40" stroke="#6a8caf" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <line x1="40" y1="30" x2="80" y2="-10" stroke="#6a8caf" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="80" y1="-10" x2="100" y2="10" stroke="#6a8caf" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <circle cx="-110" cy="40" r="10" fill="#f5d0a9" />
    <circle cx="100" cy="10" r="10" fill="#f5d0a9" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Speech bubble -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 180)">
    <path d="M-150,-50 L150,-50 C170,-50 190,-30 190,-10 L190,50 C190,70 170,90 150,90 L50,90 L30,130 L10,90 L-150,90 C-170,90 -190,70 -190,50 L-190,-10 C-190,-30 -170,-50 -150,-50 Z" fill="white" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" />
    <text x="0" y="30" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="22" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333">I really thought I had a chance.</text>
  </g>
</svg>

  <!-- Blurred background -->

    <circle cx="-5" cy="-25" r="25" fill="#f5d0a9" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-30,-35 C-25,-45 15,-45 20,-35 L20,-25 C10,-40 -20,-40 -30,-25 Z" fill="#6a5acd" />
    
    <!-- Face (turned away, only partial view) -->
