    <path d="M-25,-15 Q-15,-12 -5,-15" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arms crossed defensively -->
    <line x1="-25" y1="20" x2="0" y2="40" stroke="#6a8caf" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="25" y1="20" x2="0" y2="40" stroke="#6a8caf" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <line x1="-15" y1="80" x2="-40" y2="130" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="15" y1="80" x2="-10" y2="130" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character (remaining on bench) -->
  <g transform="translate(270, 400)">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="-25" y="0" width="50" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#e17055" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="0" cy="-25" r="25" fill="#ffecd9" />
    
    <!-- Face (realizing mistake) -->
    <circle cx="-10" cy="-30" r="3" fill="#333" />
    <circle cx="10" cy="-30" r="3" fill="#333" />
    <path d="M-10,-15 Q0,-20 10,-15" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (concerned) -->
    <path d="M-15,-35 Q-10,-40 -5,-35" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    <path d="M15,-35 Q10,-40 5,-35" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <line x1="-25" y1="20" x2="-40" y2="40" stroke="#e17055" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="25" y1="20" x2="40" y2="40" stroke="#e17055" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <line x1="-15" y1="80" x2="-30" y2="130" stroke="#636e72" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="15" y1="80" x2="30" y2="130" stroke="#636e72" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Physical distance visualization -->
  <path d="M160,400 L240,400" stroke="#333" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="5,5" opacity="0.5" />
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 400 700">
  <!-- Sky background (darker) -->
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="skyGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#5a7eac" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#99b0bf" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="grassGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#4a8112" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#3d7010" />
    </linearGradient>
    <filter id="shadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%">
      <feDropShadow dx="2" dy="4" stdDeviation="3" flood-opacity="0.3" />
    </filter>
    <filter id="darkMood" x="-10%" y="-10%" width="120%" height="120%">
      <feColorMatrix type="matrix" values="0.8 0 0 0 0  0 0.8 0 0 0  0 0 0.8 0 0  0 0 0 1 0" />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sky (darker) -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="500" fill="url(#skyGradient)" filter="url(#darkMood)" />
  
  <!-- Grass (darker) -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="400" height="200" fill="url(#grassGradient)" filter="url(#darkMood)" />
  
  <!-- Path -->
  <path d="M150 500 C 150 550, 250 550, 250 500 L 250 700 L 150 700 Z" fill="#a2946c" opacity="0.7" />
  
  <!-- Bench -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 450)" filter="url(#shadow)">
    <!-- Bench legs -->
    <rect x="-90" y="20" width="10" height="30" fill="#5e3a1c" />
    <rect x="80" y="20" width="10" height="30" fill="#5e3a1c" />
    
    <!-- Bench seat -->
    <rect x="-100" y="0" width="200" height="20" rx="3" ry="3" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    
    <!-- Bench back -->
    <rect x="-95" y="-30" width="190" height="10" rx="2" ry="2" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="-90" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="-70" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="-50" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="-30" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="-10" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="10" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="30" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="50" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="70" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
    <rect x="85" y="-30" width="5" height="30" fill="#8b5a2b" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Friend character (walking away alone) -->
  <g transform="translate(100, 400)">
    <!-- Body hunched -->
    <rect x="-25" y="0" width="50" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#6a8caf" transform="rotate(10)" />
    
    <!-- Head down -->
    <circle cx="5" cy="-25" r="25" fill="#f5d0a9" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M-20,-35 C-15,-45 25,-45 30,-35 L30,-25 C20,-40 -10,-40 -20,-25 Z" fill="#6a5acd" />
    
    <!-- Face (sad, looking down) -->
    <circle cx="-5" cy="-30" r="3" fill="#333" />
    <circle cx="15" cy="-30" r="3" fill="#333" />
    <path d="M-5,-15 Q5,-25 15,-15" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arms hunched -->
    <line x1="-25" y1="20" x2="-40" y2="40" stroke="#6a8caf" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="25" y1="20" x2="40" y2="40" stroke="#6a8caf" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Legs (walking away) -->
    <line x1="-15" y1="80" x2="-40" y2="130" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="15" y1="80" x2="-10" y2="130" stroke="#4a5568" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player character (still on bench, hand outstretched too late) -->
  <g transform="translate(270, 400)">
    <!-- Body leaning forward -->
    <rect x="-25" y="0" width="50" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#e17055" transform="rotate(-10)" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="-5" cy="-25" r="25" fill="#ffecd9" />
    
    <!-- Face (regretful) -->
    <circle cx="-15" cy="-30" r="3" fill="#333" />
    <circle cx="5" cy="-30" r="3" fill="#333" />
    <path d="M-15,-15 Q-5,-20 5,-15" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Eyebrows (concerned) -->
    <path d="M-20,-35 Q-15,-40 -10,-35" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    <path d="M10,-35 Q5,-40 0,-35" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
    
    <!-- Arm outstretched too late -->
    <line x1="-25" y1="20" x2="-80" y2="30" stroke="#e17055" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="25" y1="20" x2="40" y2="40" stroke="#e17055" stroke-width="12" stroke-linecap="round" />
    
    <!-- Hand -->
    <circle cx="-80" cy="30" r="8" fill="#ffecd9" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <line x1="-15" y1="80" x2="-30" y2="130" stroke="#636e72" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
    <line x1="15" y1="80" x2="30" y2="130" stroke="#636e72" stroke-width="15" stroke-linecap="round" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Message -->
  <g transform="translate(200, 630)">
    <rect x="-180" y="-25" width="360" height="50" rx="10" ry="10" fill="rgba(0,0,0,0.7)" />
    <text x="0" y="5" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="20" text-anchor="middle" fill="white">Words can wound deeper than silence.</text>
  </g>
</svg>

  <!-- Background -->

  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="url(#grad1)" />

    <linearGradient id="grad1" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#e6f7ff;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#b3e0ff;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="#f5f2eb" />
  
  <!-- Stage edge -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="400" height="200" fill="#d9c7a9" />
  <rect x="0" y="490" width="400" height="10" fill="#b09878" />
  
  <!-- Stage curtain side -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="40" height="490" fill="#8b2323" />
  <rect x="360" y="0" width="40" height="490" fill="#8b2323" />
  
  <!-- Player character (side view) -->
  <g id="player">
    <!-- Body -->
    <rect x="150" y="300" width="80" height="150" rx="20" fill="#4682B4" />
    
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="190" cy="250" r="50" fill="#ffd6cc" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M150,230 Q140,210 160,200 Q180,190 200,200 Q220,210 230,230 Q220,240 200,235 Q180,230 160,235 Q150,240 150,230" fill="#663300" />
    
    <!-- Eyes (closed in concentration) -->
    <path d="M170,250 Q180,245 190,250" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="2" />
    <path d="M210,250 Q220,245 230,250" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="2" />
    
    <!-- Mouth (neutral) -->
    <line x1="185" y1="280" x2="195" y2="280" stroke="#cc6666" stroke-width="2" />
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="180" y="300" width="20" height="20" fill="#ffd6cc" />
    
    <!-- Arms -->
    <rect x="120" y="320" width="30" height="80" rx="10" fill="#4682B4" />
    <rect x="230" y="320" width="30" height="80" rx="10" fill="#4682B4" />
    
    <!-- Hands -->
    <circle cx="135" cy="410" r="10" fill="#ffd6cc" />
    <circle cx="245" cy="410" r="10" fill="#ffd6cc" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="160" y="450" width="25" height="100" rx="10" fill="#191970" />
    <rect x="195" y="450" width="25" height="100" rx="10" fill="#191970" />
    
    <!-- Feet -->
    <ellipse cx="172" cy="550" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#8B4513" />
    <ellipse cx="207" cy="550" rx="15" ry="5" fill="#8B4513" />
    
    <!-- Chest (animated for breathing) -->
    <rect x="150" y="300" width="80" height="70" rx="20" fill="#4682B4">
      <animate attributeName="width" values="80;90;80" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
      <animate attributeName="x" values="150;145;150" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    </rect>
  </g>
  
  <!-- Podium in background -->
  <rect x="300" y="400" width="50" height="100" fill="#6b4226" />
  <rect x="310" y="390" width="30" height="10" fill="#8b6246" />
  
  <!-- Microphone on podium -->
  <line x1="325" y1="370" x2="325" y2="390" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="325" cy="370" r="5" fill="#333333" />
  
  <!-- Floor shadow -->
  <ellipse cx="190" cy="550" rx="60" ry="10" fill="#b09878" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Subtle lighting effect -->
  <circle cx="190" cy="250" r="150" fill="url(#radialGrad)" opacity="0.1" />
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="radialGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:white;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:white;stop-opacity:0" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  
  <!-- Sweat droplet (showing nervousness) -->
  <circle cx="150" cy="260" r="3" fill="#b3e0ff">
    <animate attributeName="cy" values="260;270;260" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

    <animateTransform attributeName="transform" type="translate" values="0 0;0 -5;0 0" dur="4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />

  <g>

  </g>
  
  <g>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

    <!-- Face (animated and engaged) -->

    <path d="M190,380 Q200,385 210,380" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="2" /> <!-- smile -->
    
    <!-- Neck -->
    <rect x="195" y="395" width="10" height="10" fill="#ffd6cc" />
    
    <!-- Both hands gesturing expressively -->
    <!-- Left hand -->
    <path d="M190,400 C170,380 150,370 140,350" fill="none" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="5" /> <!-- arm -->
    <circle cx="140" cy="350" r="8" fill="#ffd6cc" /> <!-- hand -->
    <path d="M135,345 L145,355 M135,355 L145,345" stroke="#ffd6cc" stroke-width="2" /> <!-- fingers -->
    
    <!-- Right hand -->
    <path d="M210,400 C230,380 250,370 260,350" fill="none" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="5" /> <!-- arm -->
    <circle cx="260" cy="350" r="8" fill="#ffd6cc" /> <!-- hand -->
    <path d="M255,345 L265,355 M255,355 L265,345" stroke="#ffd6cc" stroke-width="2" /> <!-- fingers -->
  </g>
  
  <!-- Microphone -->
  <line x1="200" y1="340" x2="200" y2="390" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="3" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="335" r="8" fill="#333333" />
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="335" rx="10" ry="5" fill="#444444" />
  
  <!-- Spotlight effect -->
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="400" rx="120" ry="150" fill="url(#spotlightGlow)" />
  <radialGradient id="spotlightGlow" cx="200" cy="350" r="150" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#fffaf0" stop-opacity="0.3" />
    <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#fffaf0" stop-opacity="0" />
  </radialGradient>
  
  <!-- Simplified audience silhouettes -->
  <rect x="70" y="530" width="260" height="150" fill="#555555" opacity="0.3" />
  <rect x="170" y="530" width="60" height="150" fill="#d9c7a9" opacity="0.5" /> <!-- aisle -->
  
  <!-- Exclamation point speech bubble -->
  <path d="M200,300 L215,270 L230,300 Z" fill="white" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="215" y="295" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="25" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333333">!</text>
  
  <!-- Motion lines to indicate animated speaking -->
  <path d="M140,340 Q130,335 120,340" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.1;0.5" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </path>
  <path d="M260,340 Q270,335 280,340" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.5;0.1;0.5" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </path>
  
  <!-- Energy lines around player -->
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="370" rx="35" ry="40" stroke="#ffecd1" stroke-width="1" fill="none" opacity="0.5">
    <animate attributeName="rx" values="35;40;35" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    <animate attributeName="ry" values="40;45;40" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </ellipse>
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="370" rx="45" ry="50" stroke="#ffecd1" stroke-width="1" fill="none" opacity="0.3">
    <animate attributeName="rx" values="45;50;45" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
    <animate attributeName="ry" values="50;55;50" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </ellipse>
</svg>

  </circle>
  <circle cx="220" cy="370" r="3" fill="#b3e0ff">
    <animate attributeName="cy" values="370;420;370" dur="1.4s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="160" cy="390" r="3" fill="#b3e0ff">
    <animate attributeName="cy" values="390;440;390" dur="1.6s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  <circle cx="240" cy="390" r="3" fill="#b3e0ff">
    <animate attributeName="cy" values="390;440;390" dur="1.7s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </circle>
  
  <!-- Note cards scattered on podium -->
  <rect x="170" y="395" width="30" height="20" fill="white" stroke="#cccccc" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(15, 170, 395)" />
  <rect x="190" y="400" width="30" height="20" fill="white" stroke="#cccccc" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(-10, 190, 400)" />
  <rect x="210" y="395" width="30" height="20" fill="white" stroke="#cccccc" stroke-width="1" transform="rotate(5, 210, 395)" />
  
  <!-- Simplified audience silhouettes looking uncomfortable -->
  <rect x="70" y="530" width="260" height="150" fill="#555555" opacity="0.3" />
  <rect x="170" y="530" width="60" height="150" fill="#d9c7a9" opacity="0.5" /> <!-- aisle -->
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="#f5f2eb" />
  
  <!-- Floor -->
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="400" height="200" fill="#d9c7a9" />
  
  <!-- Stage -->
  <rect x="50" y="450" width="300" height="50" fill="#c9b18f" stroke="#b09878" stroke-width="2" />
  <rect x="50" y="450" width="300" height="10" fill="#a08868" />
  
  <!-- Ceiling with lights -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="50" fill="#e8e3d9" />
  <circle cx="100" cy="40" r="15" fill="#fffaf0" stroke="#e8e3d9" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="40" r="15" fill="#fffaf0" stroke="#e8e3d9" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="300" cy="40" r="15" fill="#fffaf0" stroke="#e8e3d9" stroke-width="2" />
  
  <!-- Light beams -->
  <polygon points="100,40 80,450 120,450" fill="rgba(255,250,240,0.1)" />
  <polygon points="200,40 180,450 220,450" fill="rgba(255,250,240,0.1)" />
  <polygon points="300,40 280,450 320,450" fill="rgba(255,250,240,0.1)" />
  
  <!-- Podium -->
  <rect x="175" y="400" width="50" height="50" fill="#6b4226" />
  <rect x="185" y="390" width="30" height="10" fill="#8b6246" />
  
  <!-- Microphone on podium -->
  <line x1="200" y1="370" x2="200" y2="390" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="370" r="5" fill="#333333" />
  
  <!-- Empty chairs -->
  <g id="chair" opacity="0.8">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="20" height="5" fill="#555555" />
    <rect x="2" y="5" width="16" height="15" fill="#444444" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Row 1 -->
  <use href="#chair" x="70" y="530" />
  <use href="#chair" x="95" y="530" />
  <use href="#chair" x="120" y="530" />
  <use href="#chair" x="145" y="530" />
  
  <!-- Row 2 -->
  <use href="#chair" x="70" y="560" />
  <use href="#chair" x="95" y="560" />
  <use href="#chair" x="120" y="560" />
  <use href="#chair" x="145" y="560" />
  
  <!-- Row 3 -->
  <use href="#chair" x="70" y="590" />
  <use href="#chair" x="95" y="590" />
  <use href="#chair" x="120" y="590" />
  <use href="#chair" x="145" y="590" />
  
  <!-- Row 4 -->
  <use href="#chair" x="70" y="620" />
  <use href="#chair" x="95" y="620" />
  <use href="#chair" x="120" y="620" />
  <use href="#chair" x="145" y="620" />
  
  <!-- Chairs - right section -->
  <!-- Row 1 -->
  <use href="#chair" x="235" y="530" />
  <use href="#chair" x="260" y="530" />
  <use href="#chair" x="285" y="530" />
  <use href="#chair" x="310" y="530" />
  
  <!-- Row 2 -->
  <use href="#chair" x="235" y="560" />
  <use href="#chair" x="260" y="560" />
  <use href="#chair" x="285" y="560" />
  <use href="#chair" x="310" y="560" />
  
  <!-- Row 3 -->
  <use href="#chair" x="235" y="590" />
  <use href="#chair" x="260" y="590" />
  <use href="#chair" x="285" y="590" />
  <use href="#chair" x="310" y="590" />
  
  <!-- Row 4 -->
  <use href="#chair" x="235" y="620" />
  <use href="#chair" x="260" y="620" />
  <use href="#chair" x="285" y="620" />
  <use href="#chair" x="310" y="620" />
  
  <!-- Center aisle -->
  <rect x="170" y="530" width="60" height="120" fill="#d9c7a9" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Person template -->
  <g id="person">
    <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="5" />
    <rect x="-4" y="5" width="8" height="12" rx="2" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Sparsely populated audience -->
  <!-- Left section -->
  <use href="#person" x="80" y="528" fill="#D2B48C" />
  <use href="#person" x="130" y="528" fill="#8B4513" />
  
  <use href="#person" x="80" y="558" fill="#F5DEB3" />
  
  <use href="#person" x="105" y="588" fill="#B87333" />
  
  <use href="#person" x="130" y="618" fill="#F5DEB3" />
  
  <!-- Right section -->
  <use href="#person" x="245" y="528" fill="#F5DEB3" />
  <use href="#person" x="295" y="528" fill="#8B4513" />
  
  <use href="#person" x="270" y="558" fill="#D2B48C" />
  
  <use href="#person" x="245" y="588" fill="#F5DEB3" />
  
  <use href="#person" x="270" y="618" fill="#8B4513" />
  
  <!-- People whispering to neighbors with connecting speech bubbles -->
  <!-- Whispering pair 1 -->
  <g>
    <use href="#person" x="105" y="558" fill="#8B4513" />
    <use href="#person" x="130" y="558" fill="#F5DEB3" />
    <path d="M110,550 Q118,545 125,550" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <circle cx="118" cy="545" r="5" fill="white" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Whispering pair 2 -->
  <g>
    <use href="#person" x="245" y="558" fill="#D2B48C" />
    <use href="#person" x="295" y="558" fill="#F5DEB3" />
    <path d="M250,550 Q270,540 290,550" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <circle cx="270" cy="540" r="7" fill="white" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- People checking watches -->
  <g>
    <use href="#person" x="80" y="588" fill="#D2B48C" />
    <circle cx="75" cy="590" r="3" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <line x1="75" y1="590" x2="75" y2="588" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <line x1="75" y1="590" x2="77" y2="590" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
  </g>
  
  <g>
    <use href="#person" x="295" y="588" fill="#D2B48C" />
    <circle cx="290" cy="590" r="3" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <line x1="290" y1="590" x2="290" y2="588" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
    <line x1="290" y1="590" x2="292" y2="590" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="0.5" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Player visible at podium (simplified) -->
  <g id="player">
    <circle cx="200" cy="385" r="10" fill="#ffd6cc" />
    <rect x="190" y="395" width="20" height="30" fill="#4682B4" />
  </g>
</svg>

<svg viewBox="0 0 400 700" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background with subdued colors -->
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="400" height="700" fill="#f5f2eb" />
  <rect x="0" y="500" width="400" height="200" fill="#d9c7a9" />
  
  <!-- Side of stage view -->
  <rect x="50" y="450" width="300" height="50" fill="#c9b18f" stroke="#b09878" stroke-width="2" />
  <rect x="50" y="450" width="300" height="10" fill="#a08868" />
  
  <!-- Player profile with head bowed -->
  <g id="player">
    <!-- Body (slumped) -->
    <rect x="175" y="450" width="40" height="50" rx="5" fill="#4682B4" transform="rotate(-5, 195, 450)" />
    
    <!-- Head (bowed) -->
    <circle cx="195" cy="400" r="20" fill="#ffd6cc" />
    
    <!-- Hair -->
    <path d="M175,390 Q185,375 215,390" fill="#663300" />
    
    <!-- Face (profile, defeated) -->
    <ellipse cx="190" cy="400" rx="2" ry="3" fill="#333333" /> <!-- eye -->
    <path d="M185,410 Q190,408 195,410" fill="none" stroke="#cc6666" stroke-width="2" transform="rotate(180, 190, 409)" /> <!-- frown -->
    
    <!-- Shoulders slumped -->
    <path d="M175,430 Q195,420 215,430" fill="none" stroke="#4682B4" stroke-width="10" />
    
    <!-- Arms (hanging) -->
    <rect x="180" y="430" width="8" height="30" rx="4" fill="#4682B4" transform="rotate(10, 180, 430)" />
    <rect x="202" y="430" width="8" height="30" rx="4" fill="#4682B4" transform="rotate(-10, 202, 430)" />
    
    <!-- Legs -->
    <rect x="180" y="500" width="10" height="40" rx="3" fill="#191970" />
    <rect x="200" y="500" width="10" height="40" rx="3" fill="#191970" />
    
    <!-- Shadow -->
    <ellipse cx="195" cy="540" rx="25" ry="5" fill="#b09878" opacity="0.3" />
  </g>
  
  <!-- Stage exit direction -->
  <path d="M230,490 L280,490" fill="none" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.5" />
  <polygon points="280,490 275,485 275,495" fill="#333333" opacity="0.5" />
  
  <!-- Sparse, polite applause (minimal motion lines) -->
  <line x1="100" y1="530" x2="110" y2="520" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.3;0.1;0.3" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </line>
  
  <line x1="150" y1="540" x2="160" y2="530" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.3;0.1;0.3" dur="2.5s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </line>
  
  <line x1="250" y1="530" x2="260" y2="520" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.3;0.1;0.3" dur="2.8s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </line>
  
  <line x1="300" y1="540" x2="310" y2="530" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.3">
    <animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.3;0.1;0.3" dur="3.2s" repeatCount="indefinite" />
  </line>
  
  <!-- Simplified audience silhouettes (sparse) -->
  <rect x="70" y="530" width="120" height="150" fill="#555555" opacity="0.2" />
  <rect x="210" y="530" width="120" height="150" fill="#555555" opacity="0.2" />
  <rect x="170" y="530" width="60" height="150" fill="#d9c7a9" opacity="0.5" /> <!-- aisle -->
  
  <!-- Podium in background -->
  <rect x="300" y="400" width="50" height="50" fill="#6b4226" />
  <rect x="310" y="390" width="30" height="10" fill="#8b6246" />
  
  <!-- Microphone on podium -->
  <line x1="325" y1="370" x2="325" y2="390" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="2" />
  <circle cx="325" cy="370" r="5" fill="#333333" />
  
  <!-- "Next time..." caption -->
  <rect x="120" y="300" width="160" height="40" rx="20" fill="rgba(255,255,255,0.8)" stroke="#999999" stroke-width="2" />
  <text x="200" y="325" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="16" text-anchor="middle" fill="#333333">Next time...</text>
  
  <!-- Subtle spotlight fading -->
  <circle cx="195" cy="400" r="50" fill="url(#fadingSpotlight)" opacity="0.3" />
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="fadingSpotlight" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:white;stop-opacity:0.5" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:white;stop-opacity:0" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
</svg>
